div.div: Euangelia vnd
Epiſteln / aus dem deud-
ſchen in vndeudſche Sprache gebracht / ſo
durchs gantze Jar / auff alle Sontage vnd fürnem-
ſten Feſte / in den Kirchen des Fürſten-
thumbs Churlandt vnd Semigallien in
Lieffland vor die vndeudſchen
geleſen werden.
Mit der Hiſtorien des Lei-
dens / vnd Aufferſtehung vn-
ſers HErrn Jeſu Chriſti /
aus den vier Euange-
liſten.
Gedruckt zu Königsperg in Preuſſen / bey
Georgen Oſterbergern.
M, D. LXXXVII.
Die Epiſtel des Er-
ſten Sontags des Aduents / zun
Römern am 13. Capitel.
VNde äſto / ka mhes to ſzynnam
ar wärde to laike / ka ta ſtunde
tuwe klät gir / auxam czeltes nho to Mege
(peetcz to ka muſſe peſtiſchenne nu
tuwake gir / neeka mhes to titczeyam) Ta nacktz
gir pagaiuſſe / beth ta Dene gir adgaiuſſe. Thad
laideth mums nolickt tös darbes täs tumpßibes /
vnd apwilckt tös Brunniges täs Gaiſybes. Laydeth
mums godige ſtaygäth / kha py Dene / Nhe exkan
ryſchenne / vnde leke czerſchenne / nhe exkan kammerims
vnde neeſſkyſtibe / nhe exkan Baarſchenne
vnde Enaydibe / Beth apwelceth to Kunge Jeſum
Chriſtum / Vnde ßargath to Meße / ka tha gayßinne
nhe thope.
Euangelium am Erſten Sonta-
ge des Aduents / Matth. 21. capit.
VNd kad the nu tuwe py Jeruſalẽ
nätcze / py Bethphage py tho Olyekalne / no
ßuutye Jeſus no ßouwims maetceklims duewe / vnd
ßatcy vs tems / No eyget exkan to Jelgouwe / kattra
prexan yums gir / Vnde tudelyn yuus attraſſeth
peſete wene Eſelemate / vnd wene kummelle py täs /
atrayßet thös / vnde at weeddet thös py man / Vnd
khad yums kaſlabban ko ßatcys / tha ßacket / Tam
kungam gir thös wayage / tudelyn thas thös yums
palaidys. Beth tas noticke wueſſenotalle / ka pepueldytcz
tapte / kas tur ßatcytcz gir czourczourto to Prophete
/ katters tur treeße / Szacket tay Meyte Zion /
Rouge / tows Köninx nake py thöw leenpratyx /
vnd yaye vs wene Eſel / vnd vs wene kummelle täs
naſte neſſetayes Eſellemates.
Te Maetcekle nogaye / vnd darrye / ka tims Jeſus
pawheleys by / vnd atwedde to Eſelle mathe
vnd to kummelle / vnd licke ßouwes dreebes tur wuerßon
/ vnd ßeedenaye to tur wuerßon. Beth doudcze
loudis yſplattye ßouwes dreebes vs tho czelle. Te
czitte czirte Szarres no tims kokims / vnd kayßy
thös wuerßon to czelle. Beth te loudys kattre papreſche
gaya vnd peetcz ſtaigaya / breetcze vnd ßatcy
: Hoſianna tham Dauids Dhelam. Slaweetcz
gir tas katters tur nake / exkan to wärde tä kunge /
Hoſianna exkan to auxtibe.
Die Epiſtel am andern Sontage
des Aduents / Rom. cap. 15.
MYlige Brale / Beth kas paprexke raxtitcz gir
tas gir mums pär maetczibe raxtytcz / ka
mhes czour patczeſchenne / vnd precibe to
Raxte / wene Czerribe dabbuyam. Beth Dews
thäs patczeſchennes vnd täs precibesprecibees / dode
yums /
ka yuus wen pratige eſſet / ſtarpan yums / peetcz Jeſu
Chriſto / ka yuus wene lidtczige ar wene Mutte
teitczet / Dewe to Thewe muße Kunge Jeſu Chriſti /
Tapeetcz ſayemmettes wene to otre / lidtcz ka yums
Chriſtus gir ſayemis py Dewe ßlawe.
Beth es ßack / ka Jeſus Chriſtus gir wens kalps
buewys thäs abgreſchennes thäs Dewe taiſnybes /
py apſtipproſchennes täs peßatciſchennes thems
Thewems notitczis. Beth ka te Pagane Dewe
teitcz thäs Szeeleſtibes puſſes / Ka tur raxtytcz
ſthawe. Tapeetcz grib es thöw teickt ſtarpan tems
paganems vnd touwamtoumam wärdam czedath. Vnde
whel wenne kärth treß thas pretczetes yums yuus
Pagane / ar ßouwims loudims. Vnde whel wenkärth
: Szlaweeth to Kunge wueſſe Pagane / vnd
teitczeth to wueſſe loudis. Vnd whel ßack Eſaias.
Tur buus buuth thay Szackne Jeſſe / vnd katteers
tur auxkam czelßees / py waldiſchenne pär tems
Paganems / vs to te Pagane czerrees. Beth Dews
täs Czerribes / pepueldena yums ar wueßade precibe
vnd mere / exkan titczybe / ka yums wene pepulnige
czerribe gir / czour to ſpeeke thä ſweete Garre.
EuangeliumEuandelium auff den andern Son-
tag des Aduents / Luc. 21. cap.
VNd tur notitczys / Symes py to Soule / vnd
Mhenes / vnd Swayſnims / vnd wuerßon
Semmes / buus tims loudems baile / vnd
taps Jſſamiſſuſſche / Vnd ta Jure / vnd te Vdenne
Wylne koutczys / vnd te czilwheke nobaddos no ißabyſchenne
/ vnd no ßagaidyſchen thäs lethes / kattrims
tur näckt buus wuerßon Semmes. Aeſto
arridtczan te ſtipprumme to debbeſſe ßöw kuſtenaſes
/ Vnd tad te redtczees to Czilwheke Dele nakamme
exkan to paddebeſſe / ar lele ſpeeke vnd godibe.
Beth kad ſchis eſaax notickt / tad lukoyet auxam /
vnd paczelleth yuuſſes Galwes / tapeetcz / ka ßöw
yuuſſe peſtyſchenne tuwe kläth gir.
Vnd thas ßatcy tems wene Lydtczibe / Rougeth
vs to vygekoke / vnd wueſſems kokems / tudelin
kad the Jſlouzaas / thad redtczath yuus py tems /
vnd nomanneth / ka ta Waſſara tuwe klathe gir.
Ta yuus arridtczan / kad yuus to wuſſe redtczeeſeeth
notekamme / tad ſinnath ka ta Dewe walſtibe
tuwe klathe gir. Patteſe / es ßack yums. Schis
Radtcz nhe iſſuddys tekams ſchis wueſſe notix.
Debbes vnd Semme paßuddys / beth manne Wärde
nhe ßuddys.
Beth ßargates yums / ka yuuſes Szyrdes / nhe
thope abgrutenate ar riſchenne / vnd leke czerſchenne
/ vnd ar Gadybims täs vſturreſchennes / vnd ſcha
dene nake pepeſſche pär yums. Aeſto lydtcz ka wens
ſlaſte Walx thas natczys / pär wueſems kattre
wuerſom Semmes czywo. Tha eſſet nu modrige
allaßyn / vnd luudczet / ka yuus czenige warreet
tapt / yſbeeckt wueſſems ſchems / kattrems notickt
buus / vnd prexkan to Czilwheke Dhele ſthaweet.
Die Epiſtel auff den Dritten Son-
tag des Aduents 1. Corinth. 4.
MYlige Brale / pär tadems thur mums yckwens
/ ar wärde / pär Chriſtus kalpems vnde
Namme thurretayems / pär Dewe apßleepybe
/ Nu nhe thope wayrs meckleetz py tems Nammethurretayems
/ kawen tas / ka the petitzamme attraſte
thope. Beth es thur to pär maſſe lethe / ka es
nho yums teſatcz thope / ieb nho wene Czilwhekige
Dene. Es arridtczan nhe teſayos man pattim.
Es man neeneke apßinnos / Beth tur exkan nhe eſme
es tayſnootcz. Beth thas Kunx gir kas man teßa.
Tapeetcz nhe teſaath prexkan to layke / tekam tas
Kunx näx / katteers arridtczan preſchan to gaiſme
neſſis / kas exkan tumpßibe apßleeptcz gir / vnd to
ßirdesßirdeſ dome / ßinnamme darrys / tad buus ickwenam
/ no dewe ßlawe notickt.
Euangelium auff den dritten Son-
tag des Aduents / Matth. 11. cap.
BEth kad Johannes / exkan to cetumme tös brinummedarbes
Chriſti czirdey / no ßuutye thas
no ßouwims Maetceklims duewe / vnd licke
tham ßatcyth : Eſ tuEſtu kattram tur näckt buus / ieb
buus mums wene citte pagaidyt ? Jeſus adbildey
vnd ßatcy vs tems / no eyeth / vnd ßacket Johanni
atkal / ko yuus redtczath vnd czirdatßirdat / Te Ackle
redtcze / vnd te Tyſle edth / te Spittalige thope ſkyſte /
vnde te kurle czirde / te Muerrone czelyas auxkam /
vnd tems Nabbagems thope tas Euangeliums
maetcytz. Vnd ſweetcz gir tas / katteers ßöw Py man
nhe abgreetczyas.
Kad te nogaye / eſaka Jeſus / treßeet / vs tems
loudems no Johanne / ko eſſet yuus yſgaiſche exkan
to Tuxniſſe tur redczeeth ? Gribbet yuus wene Nedre
redczeeth / kattre tas Wheys turpe vnd ſchurpe
ſchoube ? Jeb ko eſſeth yuus yſgayſche redczeeth ?
Gribbeeth yuus wene Czilwheke exkan myxtims
dreebims redczeeth ? Rouget / kattre tur myxthas
dreebes neßa / te gir exkan tims köninge Nammims.
Jeb ko eſſet yuus yſgaiſche tur redtczeeth ? Gribbeth
yuus wene Prophete redtczeeth ? Ja es ßack yums /
katteers arridtzan wayrs gir neka wens Prophetz.
Aeſto ſchis gir / no kattre raxtytz ſthawe / Rouge /
es ſuute manne Engel prexkan thöw / kattram
touwe Czelle / preſchan thöw ßattaiſith buus.
Die Epiſtel auff den vierden Son-
tag des Aduents Phillip. 4. capit.
MYlige Brale / preceetes yums exkan to kunge
allaßin / vnde whel wene kärte ßacke es / preceetes
yums / Juuſe Laipnybe laideth ßinnamme
buuth wueſſims czilwhekims / Tas kunx gir
tuwe klathe / Nhe gadayeth neeneke / Beth exkan
wueſſims letims / laydeth yuuſe Lueckſchenne exkanexan
noluckſchenne vnd peßouckſchenne / ar patteiczibe
prexkan Dewe ßinnamme tapt / vnd thas Dewe
Mers / katters auxtax gir neeka wueſſa ßappraſſchen
/ paſſarge yuuſſes Szirdes vnd prathe exkan
Chriſto Jeſu.
Euangelium auff den vierden Son-
tag des Aduents / Johan. 1. cap.
VNde ta gir ta ledtcybe Johannis / kad te Judde
no Jeruſalem Baſnicekunges vnd Leuites
ſuty / ka te tam joutate / kas eſ tueſtu ? Vnde thas
adßinne vnd nhe ayſledtcze to. Vñ täs adßinne / Es
nhe eſmeeeſme Chriſtus. Vnd te joutaya tam / kas tad ?
Eſ tuEſtu Elias ? Thas ßatcy / es nhe eſme : Estu wens
Prophetz ? Vnd thas adbildeye / Nee. Tad ßatcye
the vs tho / kas eſ tueſtu tad ? ka mhes wene adbildeeſchen
dodam / tims / kattre mums yßutyſche gir / Ko
ßack tu no thöw pattim ? Thas ßatcy / Es eſme wena
ſoutctzamme balexnis wene Maetczetaye exkan
to Tuxniſſe / Darreth tho czelle tha Kunge tayſne /
ka tas Prophetcz Eſaias ßatcys gir.
Vnde te kattre tur yßutite bye / te bye no tims
Phariſeerims / tad youtaye te tam vnd ßatcy vs to /
kapetcz chruſty tu tad / ka tu Chriſtus nhe eße / nedtcz
Elias / nedtcz wens Prophetcz : Johannes adbildey
tims / vndvndſatcye ßatcye / es chruſty ar Vdenne / Beth
täs gir wueddon ſtarpan yums egays / kattre yuus
nhe paßyſteet / tas girre / katteers peetcz man nätcys
katteers prexkan man buewis gir / kattre es czenix
nhe eſme / ka es winge kurpeßixnes attraiſſe.
Schis noticke py Bethabara / vs winge puſſe to
Jordane / kur Johannes chruſtye.
Die Epiſtel am heiligen Chriſtage
Tito am 2. capit.
AEſto ta Dewe ßeeleſtibe gir paſpideiſſe wueſſims
Czilwhekims / vnd pammace mums / ka
mums buus aiſleckt / to beſdewige buuſchen /
vnd to paſſoulige egribbeſchenne / vnd gaddige / taiſnige
vnd ſwetige cziwoyam / exkan ſcho paſſoule / vnd
gaydam vs to ßeelige czerribe / vnd paſpydeſchenne /
täs godibes tha lele Dewe / vnd muße peſtitay Jeſu
Chriſti / katters ßöw pattim preſchan mums no
duewis gir / ka täs mums atpeſtite no wueſſe netaiſnibe
/ vnd ßöw pattim ſkyſtite wenes loudes py
paſſche pederreeſchen / kattre tyckuſſche buute py labbems
darbems. To treße vnd pemin / vnd ßode ar
wueſſe prate / nhe ledtcz thöw nhe no wene ſaymoth.
Euangelium am heiligen Chri-
ſtage / Luc. am 2. cap.
BEth tas notickas ßöw py to layke / ka wens
Boußlis no to Keiſere Auguſto Jſgaya / ka
ta wueſſe paſſoule mheſlota tapte. Vnd ſcha
mheſloſchenne by ta wueſſe pirmaka / vnd noticke py
to layke / kad Kyrenius Semmeßoge exkan Syrien
by. Vnd Jckwens nogaya / ka the ßöw mheſlotes
lickte / yckwens exkan ßouwe Pille.
Tad nogay arridtczan Joſeph no Galilea / aran
täs Pilles Nazareth / exkan to Judde ſemme / vs to
Pille Dauid / kattra tur dheweey Bethlehem / Tapeetcz
ka tas no to Namme vnd Radde Dauid by /
vs to / ka täs ßöw mheſlote lickte / ar Maria ßouwe
ßaloulata Gaſpaſſche / kattra tur apgrutenata by.
Vnd kad the tur path by / nätce tas laix ka thay peczimpt
by. Vnd tha peczimme ßouwe pirmoye Dhele
/ vnd tinne to exkan autims / vnd licke to exkan wene
Szille. Aeſto thems nhe by czittur neewena
weta exkan to Maiawete.
Vnd tur by Ganne exkan to patte wete / tur
prettybe wuerßon to louke / te gannye py to Nackte
ßouwes lopes. Vnd Rouge / tas Engels tha kunge
apſpydey tös / vnd the iſſabyas ßöw lote / Vnd
tas Engels ßatcy vs tems / nhe yßabyates yums /
Rougeth / Es paßluddena yums lele precibe / kattra
wueſſems loudems notitczys. Aeſto yums gir ſchodene
tas Peſtitays peczimmis / katters gir Chriſtus
tas Kunx exkan to Pille Dauid. Vnde to yemmet
pär Syme / juus to Beerne attraſſeet exkan autims
etythe / vnd exkan wene Szille gullite. Vnd tudelin /
by tur py to Engele / ta kopybe täs Debbeſſes
droudczibes / te ßlawey Dewe / vnd ßatci / Gode gir
Dewam exkan tho auxtibe / vnd mers wuerßon
Semmes / vnd tims Czilwhekims wens labs pratcz
Die Epiſtel in der andern Chriſt-
meſſen. Tito 3. cap.
BEth tad parradyas ta myleſtibe / vnde louſcho
milibe thä Dewe muſſe peſtitaye. Nhe to darbe
deele täs Taiſnybes / kattre mhes darriſche
byam / Beth peetcz ßouwe ßeeleſtibe / darrye thas
mums ſweetes / czour to peſtiſchenne thäs atczimpſchennes
vnd paiounaſchennes tha ſweete Garre /
kattre täs baggatige Jſleys gir pär mums / czour
Jeſum Chriſtum muſſam Peſtitayam. Vs to ka
mhes czour to patte ßeeleſtibe tayſne vnde Bherne
eſſem täs mußiges cziwibes / peetcz tho czerribe / tas
gir yo teſcham teſe.
Euangelium in der andern Chriſt-
meſſen Luc. 2. cap.
VNd kad te Engele no timsnotims vs debbeſſe broutcze
/ treſſey te Ganne ſtarpan ßöw / laydeet
mums nu noedth vs Bethlehem / vnd to
redtczeet katters tur notitcis gir / ka mums tas kunx
gir ßinnamme darrys / Vnd te näetcze pepeſche /
vnd attrade abbe Mariam vnd Joſeph / vnd to
Bherne exkan to Szillite gullite. Beth kad te to
redtczeiſche by / Jſplattye te to Wärde / ka vs tems /
no ſcho Bherne ßatcytz by / vnd wueſſe kur tas prexkan
nätce / ißabrinoyas te ßöw / pär to Wallode /
kattra tems te Ganne ßatcyſche by. Beth Maria
patturrhey wueſſes ſchos Wärdes / vnd apdomaya
thos exkan ßouwe Szirde. Vnde te Ganne atgreſches
/ patteitcze vnd ßlawey Dewe / pär wueſſe / ko
te czirdeiſche vnd redtczeiſche by / kha tad vs tems
ßatcytz by.
Die Epiſtel in der dritten Chriſt-
meſſen / Ebre. 1. cap.
PEetcz to ka exkan preſchelaikims Dews
doudtczeduodtcze kärth vnd vs daſſchade mhere treßeys
gir / vs tems Thewems / czour tems Prophetems
/ gir täs peedige exkan ſchims denims vs
mums treßeys / czour to Dhele / kattre täs eſthadys
gir pär Manteneke pär wueſſe lethe / czour kattre
thas arridtczan to Paſſoule darrys gir. katteers /
peetcz to kärte ka thas gir tas ſpidums winges Godybes
/ vnd ta lydtcze Waix winges buuſchennes /
vnd nes wueſſe lethe / ar ßouwe ſpetczige wärde /
vnd gir darrys to ſkyſtiſchenne muſſes greekes /
czour ßöw pattim / gir thäs ßöw ſeedes py to labbe
roke thäs auxtas godibes / exkan to auxtibe / Ta
doudcze labbäx tappis / neeka te Engele / tha wueſtym
doudtczake thas wene auxtake wärde preſchan
tems mantays gir.
Aeſto vs kattre Engele gir täs kadekärte ßatcys /
tu eße mans Dhels / ſchodene eſme es thöw peczimmis
? Vnd whel wene kärte / es buſſcho winge Thews
vnd thas buus mans Dheles. Vnd atkal kad thas
tho pirme peczimpte ewedde exkan to Paßoule / ßatcy
thas / vnd to buus wueſſe Dewe Engelims peluckt
no timsnotims engelims treß tas teſchã / thas dar ßouwes
engeles garres / vndvũ ßouwes kalpes vggunneleſmes.
Beth no to dhele Dews touws kreeßls palleke no
mußibe mußam. Ta ſpeetcibe touwestuowes walſtibes / gir
wene taiſnige ſpetczibe. Tu es myleis to taiſnybe / vñ
enydeys to ne taiſnybe / Tapeetcz gir thöw / O
Dews / ſchwaidys tows Dews / ar tho Olye täs
Lyxmibes / pär touwems lydtcz bedrigims.
Vnd tu Kunx es no Eßakumme / to Semme
duebbenays / vnd te Debbeſſe gir touwes Rokas
darbe. Te patte paßuddys / beth tu pallix / Vnde te
wueſſe no whetzaas / kha wena drebe / vnd ka Wadmalle
tu thös younas / vnd the ßöw pawerſees.
Beth tu eße tas patz / vnd touwetuowe gadde
neemitteeſes.
Euangelium in der dritten Chriſt-
meſſen / Johannis 1. cap.
EXkan eßakumme by tas Wärdtcz / vnd tas
Wärdtcz by py Dewe / vnd Dews by tas
Wärdtcz. Tas patcz by exkan Eßakumme
py Dewe Wueſſa letha gir czour to patte / darryta /
vnd bes to patte neneke darrytcz gir. Exkan to
by ta Cziwibe / vnd ta cziwibe by ta gaiſme to czilweke
/ vnd ta gaiſmegayſyme ſpydeye exkan tho tumpßybetumpzybe /
vnd ta tumpßybe nhe gir to aptwheruſſe.
Tur tappe wens czilwhex no Dewe Jſſutytcz
tas dhewe Johannes. Tas patz naetce pär ledczibe /
ka thas no tho gaißme / ledtczibe dothe / ka the wueſſe
czour tho titczeete. Tas nhe by ta gaiſme / beth ka
thas ledtczybe dothe no to gaiſme. Ta by ta patteſe
gaiſme / kattra wueſſes czilwhekes abſkaydro / kattre
exkan ſcho paſſoule nake. Tas by exkan tho paſſoule
/ vnd ta paſſoule gir czour tho patte darrita / vnd
ta paſſoule nhe paſinna tho.
Tas naetce exkan ßouwe paſſche paddomibe /
vnd te ßouwe nhe peyeme to. Beth czeke doudcz to
vſſyeme / tims döwe thas ſpeeke Dewe beernes tapt /
kattre tur exkan winge Wärde titcz. Katteers nhe
no tho aſſen / nedtcz no tho gribbeſchenne thäs meſes
/ nedtcz no tho gribbeſchenne wena wyra / beth
no Dewe peczimmuſſche gir. Vnd tas Wärdtcz
tappe Meßa / vnd cziwoye ſtarpan mums / vnd
mhes redczeyam wynge godybe / wene godybe / kha
tha wene peczimpte Dhele no Dewe /puelns ßeeleſtibe
vnde taiſnibe.
Die Epiſtel am tage des heiligen
Stephani / Act. am 6. vnd 7. cap.
BEth Stephanus puelns thäs Titczibes vnd
ßpeeke darrye Brinumme vnd lelas Szimes
ſtarpan tems loudems. Tad czheles czitte
auxkam / no tho Skole / kattre tur dhewe tho Libertiner
/ vnd tho Kyrener / vnd to Alexanderer vnd
tho / kattre no Cilicia vnd Aſia bye / vnd apioutayas
ßöw ar Stephano. Vnd the nhe pawarrey prettibe
ſthaweeth tay guddribe / vnd tam Garram katters
tur treßey.
Tad yeme te cittes wyres / te ßatcy / mhes eſſem to
czirdeiſſche newiges wärdes treßote / prettibe Moſe
vnd prettybe Dewe. Vnd kuudenay tös loudes vnd
tös whetczakös / vnd tös RaxtmaetcetaiesRaxtmaetcetates / vnd gaye
tur klathe / vnde rawe to nohſt / vnd wedde to preſchan
tems Runne kungems. Vnd atwedde wiltiges
letzenekes preſchan / te ßatci Schis Czilwhex
nhe mittas treſſhet ßaimiges wärdes prettybe ſcho
ſweete wete vnde to Boußle. Aeſto mhes eſſeme to
czirdeiſche ßacköte / Jeſus no Nazareth ſcho wete
Jſpöſtys / vnd pär wärtis tös dotes Boußles / kattre
mums Moſes doeuwis gir. Vnd te lukoyas
vs to / wueſſe te / kattre exkan to Runne ſeedeeye /
vnd redtczey winge wayge / ka wene Engele wayge.
Kad te ſcho czirdeye / gaye tas tims czour to
Szirde / vnd ßackode tös Sobes. Beth khad thas
puelns tha ſweete Garre by / lukoya thas vs tho
Debbes / vnd redtczey to Dewe godybe / vnde
Jeſum ſtawote py Dewe labbe roke / vnd ßatcy /
Rougeth / es redtczo to Debbeſſe atwarre / vnd to
Czilwheke Dhele py to Dewe labbe roke ſtawote.
Beth te breedtcze ſkannige vnd ayſturrey ßouwes
außes / vnde mette wene lidtczige vs to / vnd Jſſtume
to aran Pillis / vnd ackmenoya to. vnd te Ledtczeeneke
nolicke ßouwes dreebes py tems kayems
wene Maetcekle tas dhewey Saulus. VndVud ackmenoya
Stephanum / Tas ßoutce vnd ßatcy : Kunx
Jheſu / vs yem manne Garre. Beth tas mettes
ßöw czellos / vnd breetcze ſkannige / Kunx nhe pelagadi
tims ſchös greekes. Vnd khad thas to ßatcys
by / ayſmigga thas.
Euangelium am tage S. Stepha-
ni / Matth. 23. cap.
TApeetcz rougeth / es ſuute py yums Prophetes
vnd Guddres / vnd Raxtmaetcetayes /
vnd no tims pattims yuus czittes nokoußeet /
vnd kruſtan ßittiſet / vnd czittes yuus ſchoutiſeth
exkan yuußims Skolims / vnd tös wayiaſeeth / no
wenas Pillis exkan to otre / ka par yums nake
wueſſe tas taiſnyx aßens katteers iſledtcz gir wuerſon
Semmes / no to Aſſenne tha tayſne Abels / isjs
to aſſenne Zacharie tha Dhele Barrachie / kattre
yuus nokouwuſſche eſſeth / ſtarpan tho Baſnice
vnde Altare. Patteſe es ßack yums / ka tas wueſſenotol
pär ſcho Radde naetczys.
Jeruſalem / Jeruſalem / kattra tu nokow tös
Prophetes vnd ackmenna tös / kattre py thöw ßutite
gir. Czekärt eſſeme es touwes Bhernes gribbeis
ßackraath / lydtcz / kha wena Wueſte ßouwes czalyſches
ßackray appeſkan ßouwems ſpaarnems / vnd
yuus nhe eſſet gribbeiſſche ? Rougeth / yuuſe Nammam
buus pooſte atſtatam tapt. Aeſto es ßacke
yums / yuus man no ſcho laike nhe redtczeeſeth /
tekams / ka yuus ßatcyſhet / Slaweetz gir tas / katteers
tur nake exkan tho Wärde tha kunge.
Die Epiſtel am tage Johannes / des
Apoſtels vnd Euangeliſten / Eccleſ. 15. cap.
SCho dar neewens / beth tas kas tho kunge byſthas
/ vnd kas ßöw py Dewe wärde thurras
/ tas attrode to. Vnd ta to ßaſtaps kha
wena Mathe / vnd to ßayems kha wena youna
Brute. Ta to ehdenas ar Mayße thäs ſappraſſchennes
/ vnde to czirdenas ar Vdenne thäs guddribes
/ czour to taps thas ſtiprsſtirps / ka thas ſtippre
ſtawhet war / vnd ßöw py thäs thurreeßes / ka thas
kounan nhe thope. Ta to paauſtenas / pär ßouwe
tuwake / vnde tham winge Mutte atwhers exkan
to droudtczibe. Ta to apkrones ar precibe vnd lyxmibe
/ vnde ar wene mußige wärde apdawenas.
Beth te Jecke nhe attrode to / vnd te Beeſdewige to
nheſaredtczes / aesto ta gir tale no timsnotims greeſnims /
vnd wiltenekems / vnd nhe ßin no thäs
Euangelium am tage Johannis des
Apoſtels vnd Euangeliſten / Johan. 21. cap.
BEth kad tas to by ßatcys treſſey thas vs tho /
ſtayga man peetcz. Beth Petrus greſhes
ßöw apkaarth / vnde redtczey to Maetcekle
peetcz ſtaygayote / kattre Jeſus myle thurrey / katters
arridtczan py winge kruute py Wackarree edene
gulleis by / vnd ßatcys by / Kunx / kas gir / kas
thöw pewils ? Kad Petrus ſcho redtczey / ßatcy
tas vs Jeſu / Kunx / beth ko buus ſchim ? JeſusJeſns ßatcy
vs to / kad es gribbe / ka thas pallecke / tekams ka es
nako / ko bheda tu pär to ? Staiga tu man peetcz.
Tad Jſgaya wena wallode ſtarpan tems Bralems /
Schis Maetceklis nhe muerſt / Vnd Jeſus nhe
ßatcy vs to / Tas nhe muers / beth ka es gribbe ka tas
palleck / tekams ka es nako / ko bheda tu par to ?
Schis gir tas Maetceklis / katteers no scho
lethe ledtczibe dode / vnd gir ſcho raxtys / vnde mhes
ßinnam / ka winge ledtczybe teſa gir.
Die Epiſtel am tage nach dem
Chriſtage / Gala. 4. cap.
BEth es ßack / tickylge ka thas Mantenex wens
Bherns gir / thad nhe gir ſtarpan tho vnd wene
kalpe neewene ſtarpybe / Ja tomher thas
wens Kunx gir wueſſes Paddomybes / Beth thas
gir apeſkan tims Paglabegims / vnd Szargims /
tekams iſ toiſto nolickte layke no Thewe. Ta mhes arridtczan
/ kad mhes Bherne byam / tad byam mhes
cetumman appeſkan tims ßargims no eſtadibems.
Beth kad thas Layx pepueldytcz tappe / ßuutye
Dews ßouwe Dhele peczimpte no wenas ſewes /
vnd appeskan to Boußle nolickte / ka tas tös / kattre
appeſkan tho Boußle by / peſtyte / ka mhes to Bherne
mantybe dabbutem. Tapeetcz ka yuus tad
Bherne eſſet / gir Dews to Garre ßouwe Dhele
ſuutys exkan yuuſims ßirdims / tas breetcz Abba /
myleis Thews. Ta peetczpeettz nhe gir nu ſcheitan neewens
kalps wayrs / beth Bherne wene. Beth gir
the nu Bherne / tad gir the arridtczan Dewe walſtibes
Manteneke / czour Chriſtum.
Euangelium am Sontage nach dem
Chriſtage / Luc. am 2. cap.
VNde winge Thews vnde Mathe Jſbrinoyas
ßöw to / katteers no tho ßatcytz tappe / Vnde
Simeon ſweetye thös / vnd ßatcy vs Mariam
winge Mathe / Rouge / ſchis thope licktz pär
wene krittumme / vnd auxkam czelſchenne doudczims
exkan Jſrael / vnde pär wene Syme / kattram prettibe
treſſeetcz tope. Vnd wens Sobens taps czour
touwe Dhweſel ſpeſtz / ta peetcz ka doudtcze ßirdige
damaſchennes ßinnamme thope.
Vnd tur by wena Prophetinna Hanna / wena
Mheite Phanuel / no tho radde Aſer / ta by wetczyga
/ vnd by ßeptinge gadde cziwoyſſe ar ßouwe Wyre
/ no ßouwe Jumprowibe / vnd by wene Attraite
py aſtonedeſmette vnd czeetre Gaddems / ta nhe
naetce neewenkärth no tho Baſnice / kalpoye Dewam
ar gauweſchenne vnd peluckſchenne / Dene
vnd nackte. Ta patte gaye arridtzan tur klathe py
to patte ſtunde / vnd teytze to kunge / vnd treßey no
to vs wueſſems / kattre vs to peſtiſchenne exkan
Jeruſalem gaidye.
Vnd kad the wueſſes lethes pabeyguſſche by /
peetcz tho Boußle tha Kunge / greſhes the ßöw
atkal vs Galileam / exkan ßouwe Pille Nazareth.
Beth tas Bherns auga / vnde tappe ſtippris exkan
Garre / puelns guddribe / vnd Dewe ßeeleſtibe by
py tho.
Die Epiſtel am Newen Jarsta-
getage / Galat. 3. cap.
BEth pirms ta Titczibe naetcze / tappam mhes
appeſkan tho Boußle paſſargathe vnd apßleeckte
/ vs to tytczibe / kattra tur bye ßinnamme
tapt. Ta gir tas Boußlis muſſe maetcetais vs
ChriſtumEhriſtum / ka mhes czour to tytczibe tayſne thopam.
Beth nu ta Tytczibe nakuſſe gir / tha eſſem mhes
nhe wayrs appeſkan tho czetige maetczetaye. Aeſto
yuus eſſet wueſſe Dewe Bheerne / czour to tytczibe
exkan Chriſto Jeſu. Aeſto ceke yuus chriſtite eſſet /
the gir Chriſtum apwilkuſſche. Scheit nhe gir
neewens Judtz nedtcz Grekis / Scheit nhe gir neewens
kalps nedtcz Swabbadcz / ſcheit nhe gir neewens
Wyrs nedtcz Sewa. Aeſto yuus eſſet wueſſe
notal wene exkan Chriſto Jeſu. Beth eſſet yuus
Chriſti / thade eſſet yuus noyo Abrahams Szeekla /
vnd peetcz to peßatcyſchenne Manteneke / ieb Dewe
Beerne.
Euangelium am newen Jarsta-
ge / Luc. 2. cap.
VNde kad te aſtone dene ſeetzẽ by / ka tas bherns
apgreſtz tapte / tad tappe winge wärdtcz dheweetcz
Jeſus / katters dhewetcz by no tho engele
/ pirms thas exkan Mathe meße eyemptz tappe.
Die Epiſtel am tage der heiligen drey
Könige Eſaie am 60. cap.
VSmodes thöw / thope gaiße / aeſto touwa
gaiſma nake / vnd ta kunge godibe vs eth pär
thöw / aeſto rouge tumßibe apkla to Semme
/ vnd kreeßlybe tös loudes / Beth par thöw vſedth
tas kunx / vnde winge godibe paſſpide pär thöw / vnd
te pagane exkan touwe gaiſſibe ſtaigaas / vnd te
loudes exkan ſkaydrumme kattra pär thöw vs
edth / paczel touwes atczes / ſkattes apkart / ſche
wueſſe ßackrate nake py thöw / touwe Dehle no thalenes
ſchur naetczys / vnde touwes Mheites py tho
Sane taps vs autczenate / Tad tu touwe Joucibe
redtczees / vnd touwa Syrdtcz ßöw Jſbrinoſſes /
vnd Jſplattyſſes / kad ßöw ta doudtczibe py Jures
py thöw atgreſſäs / vnd ta warre tho pagane py
thöw nake / aeſto ta doudtcybe to kammele te thöw
apklaas / vnd te tetczetaye aran Midian vnd Epha /
the aran Saba wueſſe naetczys / Selte vnde Wyrock
atneſſis / vnde tha kunge Slawe paßluudenaas.
Euangelium am tage der heiligen
drey Könige Matth. am 2. cap.
KAd Jeſus peczimmis by / exkan Bethlehem
exkan Judeſemme / py to layke ta Köninge
Herodis / Rouge / tad naetce te Guddre / no
auſtrumme ſemmes exkan Jeruſalem / vnde ßatcy /
kur gir tas youns peczimptcz Köninx to Judde /
Mhes eſſem winge Swaiſſene redtczeiſche / exkan
auſtrumme ſemme / vnde eſſem nakuſſche to peluckt.
Kad to tas Köninx Herodes czirdey / Jſbyas
thas / vnd ar to ta wueſſewneſſe Jeruſalem. Vnde
licke
ßackraat wueſſes auxtes Baſnice Kunges vnd
Raxtmaetcetayes ſtarpan tems loudems / vnd Jſwaytczaya
no tims / kur Chriſtum by peczimptam
tapt. Vnd te ßatcy tham : Exkan Bethlehem exkan
Judde ſemme. Aeſto tha ſtawe tur raxtytz czour
to Prophete. Vnde tu BethlehemBethleyem exkan Judde
ſemme / es neenekade tha maſſaka ſtarpan thems
lele kungems Juda / aeſto aran thöw buus man
nackt / tham Kungam / katteers pär mannems loudems
Jſrael wens Kunx buus.
Tad aytczenaye Herodes tös Guddres paßleppen
py ßöw / vnde maetcye tickuſſche no tims / kad ta
Swayſne paſſpideyſe bye / vnd radye tös vs Bethlehem
/ vnde ßacye : Noeyet / vnd Jſwaitczayet tickuſſche
peetcz to Beerninge. Vnd kad yuus to attraſſeth
/ thad atßackat to man / ka es arrydtczan nako /
vnd peludtcze to.
Kad the nu to Köninge czyrdeiſche by / no gay
the. Vnd rouge / ta Swayſſene / kattre the exkan
auſtrumme Semme redtczeyſche by / gay tems paprexke
/ tekams ka tha naetce / vnde ſthawey tur
wuerßon / kur tas Beerninx by.
Kad te to Swayſſene redtczeeyreedtczeey / tappe the warren
eprecenate. Vnde gay exkan to Namme / vnde
attradde to Beerninge ar Marien winge Mathe /
vnde kritte ſemmen / vnd peludtze to. Vnde atwhere
ßouwe Bagatibe / vnde abdawenaye to ar Selte /
Wyrock vnd Myrren. Vnd Dews pawheley tims
exkan Szapne / ka thems nhebye ßöw atkal py Herodem
greeſtes. Vnde gaye czour wene czitte czelle
atkal exkan ßouwe Semme.
Die Epiſtel am erſten Sontage nach
der heiligen drey Könige tage / Rom. 12. cap.
MYlige Brale / es peminno yums / czour to
Dewe ßeeleſtibe / ka yuus yuuſe Meße nododeth
par vpperre / katters tur cziwe / ſweete /
vnde Dewam papratige gir / kattra gir yuuſe ßapprattige
dewe kalpoſchenne / vnde nhe thurretes
yums lydtcze ſcho paſſoule / beth pawhertetes yums
czour payounaſchenne yuuſe pratthe / ka yuus ßayuſth
warreth / katteers tur gir / tas labbes / tas
patykams / vnde puelnige Dewe prätcz.
Aeſto es ßack czour to ßeeleſtibe / kattra man dota
gir / Jckwenam ſtarpan yums / ka neewens wayrack
no ßöw thurras / ka tam peklayas thurretes /
beth ka thas gaddyge ßöw thurras. Jckwens / peetcz
tho ka Dews yſdallys gir / to Mhere täs Titczybes.
Euangelium am erſten Sontage nach
der heiligen drey Könige tage / Luc. 2. cap.
VNde winge whetczacke gaye jck gadde vs Jeruſalem
/ vs to leledene ſweetke. Vnd kad tas
duewe paddeſmette gadde whetz by / nogay the
vs Jeruſalẽ / peetcz to erraddumme thös ſweetkes.
Vnd kad thaſe denes pabeicktes by / vnd the atkal tur
mayas gay / pallicke tas bherns Jeſus exkã Jeruſalẽ /
vnd wynge Whetczake to nhe ßynnaye : Beth te
czerrey / ka buute tas ſtarpan thems Czellenekems /
vnde naetce wene dene brouckſchen / vnd meckleye
to ſtarpan tems drougems / vnd paßiſtammems.
Vnd kad the to nhe attradde / gaye the atkal vs Jeruſalem
/ vnd meckley to. Vnde tas noticke peetcz
trims denims / attradde the to exkan Baſnice ſeedamme
/ ſtarpan thems Maetcetayems / ka thas
tös czyrdeete / vnde Joutate. Vnd wuſſe kattre to
czyrdey / Jſſabrinoyas ßöw pär wynge ßappraſchenne
/ vnd atbildeeſchenne. Vnd kad the to redtczey
/ Jſſabyas the ßöw.
Vnde wynge Mathe ßatcy vs tho / Mans Dhels /
kapeetcz eſ tueſtu mums to darrys ? Rouge tows Thews
vnde es / eſſem thöw ar ßuſteſchenne meckleiſche. Vnde
tas ßatcy vs thems / kas gir tas / ka yuus man
meckleiſche eſſeth ? nhe ßinneth yuus / ka man buus
buuth / exkan tho katters manna Thewa gir ? Vnde
the nhe ßappratta to wärde / kattre tas ar tims treſſey
: Vnd tas gaya ar tims ſemmen / vnde naetce exkan
Nazareth / vnd by tims packlouſyx. Vnd wynge
Mathe patturrey wueſſes ſchös wärdes exkan
ßouwe ßirde. Vnd Jeſus peyemhe exkan Guddribe
/ Whetzibe / vnde ßeeleſtibe py Dewe vnde thems
Czilwhekems.
Die Epiſtel am andern Sontage
nach der heiligen drey Könige / Rom. 12. cap.
AEſto lydtcz ta / ka mums exkan wene Meße
doudtcze lodzekle gir / beth wueſſems lodtczeklems
nhe wenade darbe gir. Ta eſſem mhes
doudcze wena meßa exkan Chriſto / beth ſtarpan wenotre
gir wens ta otre lodtczeklis. Vnd gir daſſchade
dawane / peetcz to ßeeleſtibe / kattra mums dota
gir. Gir kadã paprexke ßluddenaſchenne / thad laide
to tay titczibe lydtcze buuth. Gir kadam wens Ammatcz
tad ßarge thas to Ammatte. Maetcze kaſlabban
/ thad ßarge tas to maetczybe. Peminne kaſlabban
/ thad ßarge tas to peminneeſchenne. Dode
kaſlabban / thad dode tas weneteßige. Walde kaſlabban
/ thad buus tam tickuſcham buuth. Parrade
kaſlabban ßirdeßrde ßeeleſtibe / thad dar thas to
ar
labbe prate.
Tay mylibe nhe buus wyltige buut. Enideth
to loune. Pekarreth tam labbem. Tay bralige
mylibe ſtarpan wenotre buus ßirdduebbenige
buuth. Wens nake tam otram prexkan ar gode
parradiſchenne. Nhe eſſet kuutre exkan tho / ko yums
darryth buus. Eſſet vgunige exkan Garre. Szattaiſetes
yums exkan to layke. Eſſet lyxme exkan
czerribe / preczyge exkan noſkummybe. Nhe mittet
no luckſchennes. Peyemmetes thös ſweetes bhedeczetiges.
Maioyeth labprath. Swetiget kattre
yums pulga. Swetyet vnde nhe ladeth. Preceetes
yums ar tims preczigyms / Vnde roudeth ar tims
roudamims. Thurret wenadige prathe ſtarpan
wenotre. Nhe gadhat peetcz auxtems lethems / beth
thurretes yums py thems Szemmoſkems.
Euangelium am andern Sontage
nach der H. drey Könige / Johan. 2. cap.
VNde than treſſchan denan tappe wena kaaſa
exkan Cana Galilea / vnd tha Mathe Jeſu
by tur. Beth Jeſus vnd wynge / Maetcekle /
tappe arridtczan kaaſas aytcenathe. Vnd kad
tims Wyns petruke / ßatcy tha Mathe Jeſus vs to.
Thems nee gir Wyna. Jeſus ßatcye vs täs / Sewe
kas gir man ar thöw Jadar ? Manna ſtunda nhe
gir whel nakuſſe. Wynge Mathe ßatcye vs tems
kalpems / ko thas yums ßack / to darreth. Beth tur
by lickte ſeſſche ackmenne vdenne Kruſes / peetcz to
Eraddumme tho Juddige ſkyſtiſchenne / vnde exkan
ickwene gaye / py duewe ieb triß Mhere.
Jeſus ßatcye vs tems / pueldeth thäs Vdennekruſes
ar Vdenne. Vnde the pueldye thös Jſmallems
puelne. Vnd thas ßatcye vs tems eleyth nu /
vnd neſſet to tham Barribe ſargam. Vñ the no neſſe
tham. Beth kad tas Barribeſſarx to Wyne boudye
katters Vdens buewis by / vnd nhe ßinnaya no
kurrenes thas naeckte / Beth te kalpe ßinnaya to /
kattre to vdenne ſmheluſſche by / aitcenaye tas Barribe
ſargs to Brudegam / vnd ßatcy vs tho / Jckwens
dode pirmack labbe Wyne / vnde kad the czeeruſſche
tappuſſche gir / ka tad to planako. Tu eſſe to labbe
Wyne Jſ ſchimJſſchim ßoudtczeys.
Ta gir ta pirma Syme / kattre Jheſus darrye
/ vnde noticke exkan Cana Galilea / vnde parradye
ßouwe Godibe. Vnde wynge Maetcekle titczey
exkan tho.
Die Epiſtel am dritten Sontage
nach der heiligen drey Könige / Rom. 12. cap.
NHe thurretes yums paſſchems pär Guddres.
nhe atmaxayeth loune ar lounibe. Parradeth
tickuſſche godibe prettibe yckweno. Ja
tas ta war buuth / tick doudtcz ka exkan yums gir /
thad thurret ar wueſſims Czilwhekims Mere.
Nhe reedetes yums paſſchems / manne mylige / beth
dodeth wete tay Dewe duſmibe. aeſto tur ſthawe
raxtytz / ta Reediſchen gir manna / es grib atmaxath
ßacke tas Kunx.
Kad nu touwam enaidenekam Jßalckeſt / thad
baryo to / Twyxth tham / thad czirdena to. Kad tu
tho darre / thad tu queeleines Ogles wuerßon wynge
Galwe ßakraas. Nhe layde thöw to loune pär
warreeth / beth pär war tu to loune ar tho labbe.
Euangelium am dritten Sontage
nach der heiligen drey Könige / Matth. 8. cap.
BEth kad tas no tho kalne gaye / ſtaigaye tham
doudtcze loudes peetcz. Vnd rouge / wens
Spittals wyrs naetce / vnde peludtce to / vnde
ßatcy / Kunx / kad tu grib / war tu man ganne ſkyſtyth
Vnde Jeſus iſſtepe ßouwe Roke / aiſkaare to / vnde
ßatcy / Es grib darryth / thope ſkyſtytcz. Vnde ta tudeline
by tas no ßouwe Spittalibe ſkyſtcz. Vnde
Jeſus ßatcy vs to / perouge / nhe ßack to newenam.
Beth no ey / vnde rades thöw tam Baſnicekungam /
vnde vppere to Dawane / kattre Moſes pawheleis
gir pär wene letczibe pär thems.
Beth kad Jeſus gaye exkan Capernaum / gaye
wens Galwenex py to tas ludtcze to / vnde ßatcy
Kunx / Mans kalps gulle tur mayas / vnd gir mehlmene
ßerdczyx / vnde thope warren wärdtcenaatz.
Jeſu ßatcy vs tho / Es grib näckt / vnde tho wheſſelle
darryth. Tas Galwenex adbildey / vnde ßatcy /
Kunx es ne eſme czenyx / ka tu appexkan manne
Jumpte eſe. Beth ßack wene wärde / thad taps mans
kalps / wheſſels aeſto es eſme wens Czilwhex / vnd to
wuerſeneke kalpenex / vnd appeſkan man gir karye
Wyre / Beth kad es ßacke vs to whene / no ey / thad
nö edth thas. Vnd vs to Otre / nätce ſchur / tad nake
thas. Vnde vs manne kalpe / dar to / thad dar
thas tho.
Kad tho Jeſus czirdey / Jſſabrinoyas thas ßöw /
vnde ßatcy vs tems / kattre tham peetczſtaigaya /
Patteſe es ßack yums / thade tytczibe nhe eſme es
exkan Jſrael attraddis. Beth es ßack yums /
doudtce nätczys / no tho auſtrumme / vnd no tho
wackare puſſe / vnd ar Abraham vnd Jſaac / vnd
Jacob / exkan debeſſe walſtibe ſhedees. Beth te
Beerne täs walſtibes / taps aran Jſtumpte exkan
to tumpßibe / tur buus roudaſchenne / vnde Sobetriſeſchenne.
Vnd Jeſus ßatcy vs tho Galweneke /
No ey / thöw no teke / ka tu titczeys eſſe. Vnde wynge
kalps / tappe wheſſels tan pattan ſtundan.
Die Epiſtel am vierden Sontage
nach der H. drey Könige tage / Rom. 13. cap.
NHe eſſet newenam neeneke parradam / ka wen /
ka yuus yums ſtarpan wenotre myle thurreetes.
Aeſto kas to otre myley / tas gir to Boußle
pepueldys. Aeſto ka tur ßatcytz gir / Töw nhe
buus loulibe pär louſt / töw nhe buus no kouth /
Töw nhe buus ſackt / Töw nhe buus nhe wene wyltige
lydtczibe dhot / Töw nhe buus neneke ekarotes.
Vnd Ja tur wens citz Boußlis wayrs gir /
tas thope exkan ſcho wärde aptwhertz / Töw buus
touwe Tuwake myleeth ka thöw pattim. Ta mylibe
nhe dar tam tuwakam loune. Ta gir nu ta mylibe
thäs Boußlibes pepueldiſchenne.
Euangelium am vierden Sontage
nach der H. drey Könige tage / Matth. 8. cap.
VNnde thas kaape exkan to laiwe / vnd winge
Maetcekle ſtaigaye tham peetcz / vnd Rouge /
tur paczelees ßöw wena lela whedra exkã jures
/ tha / ka arridtczan ta laywinge ar wilnims apklata
tappe. Vnde thas gulley te Maetcekle gaye py
tho / vnde modenaye to auxkam / vnde ßatcye Kunx /
pallydtcze mumsmuns / mhes grimſtã. Tad ßatcy thas
vs
thems / Juus Maſſetitzige / kapeetcz eſſet yuus tha
Jſſabiuſſche ? Vnde czelees auxkam / vnde apdroudye
to Wheye vnde to jure / Tad tappe tas wueſtyme
kluſſe. Beth the Czilwheke Jßabrinoyas ßöw /
vnde ßatcye / kas gir tas par Wyre / ka tham tas
Wheys vnde ta jure packlouſſyge gir ?
Die Epiſtel am fünfften Sontage
nach der heiligen drey Könige /
Coloſſ. am 3. cap.
THad apwheltzet nu / ka te Jſredtczeete tha
dewe Sweete / vnd milige / Syrdtczduebbenige
/ ßeeleſtibe / laipnibe / Semmoſkybe / Lehenpratybe
/ patczeſchenne / vnd wens pannes to otre.
Vnde pammetteet yums wenotre / kad kadam ßuudceſchenne
prettibe to otre gir / lydtz ka yums Chriſtus
pammettis gir / tha yuusyus arridtczan. Beth pär
to wueſſe apwelcet to mylibe / katteers tur gir tas
Saytcz täs puelnibes. Vnde tas Dewe mers
walde exkan yuuſims ßirdims / py kattre yuus arridtczan
aitczenate eſſet exkan wene Meße. Vnd
eſſet patteitczige. Laidet to wärde Chriſti baggatyge
ſtarpan yums cziwoth / exkan wueſſade gudrybe
pammacetes vnde peminneethes yums paſſchems
ar dzeſmims vnde patteitczybems / vnde garrigims
miligims dzeſmims / vnd czedethſczedeth tham kungam
exkan yuuſims ßirdims. Vnde wueſſe notalle ko
yuus darreeth / ar wärdims ieb ar darbims / to darret
exkan tho wärde tha Kunge Jeſu / vnde patteitczeth
Dewam / vnd tham Thewam czour tho.
Euangelium am fünfften Sonta-
ge nach der heiligen drey Könige
Matth. 13. capit.
Thas doeuwe tims wene czitte Lydtczibe preſchan
/ vnde ßatcy / Ta debeſſe walſtybe gir
lydtcz wenam Czilwekam / katters labbe
Szeeckle vs ßouwe Tyrumme ßeeye. Beth kad te
loudes gulley / naetce wynge Enaidenex / vnde ßeeye
nickme Sale ſtarpan thems Queſchems / vnde gaye
tur noſt. Kad nu ta Sale auga / vnde augles neſſe /
tad atraddas aridtczan ta nickma Sale. Tad gaye
te kalpe py tho Nammethewe / vnde ßatcy / Kunx /
nhe eſ tueſtu labbe ßeeckle / vs touwe Tyrumme ſeegys ?
No kurrenes gir tad ta nickme Sale ? Tas ßatcy
vs tims / to gir tas Enaidenex darrys. Tad ßatcy
te kalpe / grib tu tad / ka mhes no etham / vnd to yſrawheyam
? Tas ßatcy / Nee / tapeetcz ka yuus nhe
lydtcz tös Queſches nhe jſpluutczeeth / kad yuus to
nickme Sale Jſrawhet. Laydeth thös abbe auckte /
ys tho plauyamme laike. Vnde tan plauyamman
laykan / grib / es vs tems Plawhegyms ßatcyth /
ßackrayeth pirmacke to nickme Sale kopan / vnde
ßeneth to exkan naſtinims / ka ta ſaddetczenata
thope. Beth thös Queſches ßackrayeth man exkan
manne Sckune.
Die Epiſtel am Sontage Septua-
geſima / 1. Corinth. 9. vnd 10. cap.
Nhe ßinneth yuus / ka te kattre tur ßadoeuwuſſches
gir / te teck wueſſe / beth wens dabbuy to
alge. Titczeth nu tha / ka yuus to dabboyet.
Beth yckwens katters tur czyxtaas no thurras ßöw
no wueſſenade lethe / wynge tha / ka the wene krone
dabbu / beth mhes wene nhe paſſuddige. Beth es tecko
tha / nhe kha vs to neſſinnamme. Es ßitto tha / neh
tha ka tas / katters exkanexan to Gayſſe ßitte. Beth es no
tirpena manne Meße vnde ßlaapeyo to / ka es nhe
tims czittims maetczo vnde patcz nomhettyx thope.
Beth es nhe grib yums / mylige Brale / to apßleepthe
/ ka muſſe Thewe wueſſewueſſc gir appeſkan tho
paddebbeſſe buewuſſche / vndvud gir wuſſe czour to Jure
gayuſſche / vnde gir wueſſe appeſkan Moſen chruſtyte
/ ar tho paddebbeſſe / vnde ar to Jure / vnde gir
wueſſe Wenade garryge Barribe ehduſſche /
vnde gir wueſſe wenade garryge Czerreſſe czheruſſcheczheſczheruſſche
. Beth te czhereßhere no to garryge Ackmenne / katters
peetcz ſtaigaya katters Ackmens by Chriſtus.
Beth py doudtczems nhe by Dewam wens labs
prätcz / aeſto the gir paßiſte exkan to Tuxniſſe.
Euangelium am Sontage Sep-
tuageſima / Matth. 20. cap.
TA debbeſſe walſtybe gir lydtcz wenam Nammethewam
/ katteers py ryte aggrumme Jſgaye
/ darbeloudes derreth exkan ßouwe Wyne
kalne. VndeVndc kad thas ar tims Darbenekims
ßadderreye / pär wene groſſche / pär dene alge / noßutye
thas thos exkan ßouwe Wynekalne. Vnd Jſgaye
apkärth to treſſche ſtunde / vnde redtczeye whel
czittes / py tho Tyrge bes darbe ſthawites / vnde ßatcy
vs tems / No eydth yuus arridtczan exkan tho
Wynekalne / Es grib yums dote kas teſe gir. Vnde
the no gaye. Atkal Jſgaya thas apkärth to Szeſte /
vnde döuwite ſtunde / vnd darrye lytcz tha. Beth
apkärth to wene paddeſmette ſtunde gaye thas
aran / vnd attradde whel czittes bes darbe ſthawites
/ vnde ßatcy vs tems / ko yuus ſcheit to wueſſe
dene bes darbe ſtaweth ? The ßatcyßacy vs tho / mums
nhe gir newens ßadderreis. Tas ßatcy vs tems /
No eyeth yuus arridtczan exkan to Wynekalne /
Vnde kas teſe buus taps yums dootz.
Kad tas nu wäkars tappe / ßatcy tas Kunx
tha Wynekalne / vs ßouwe Perouge / ßoutce tös
darbe loudes / vnde dode tims to alge / vnde eſätcze /
no tems peedigems js tims pirmakims. Tad nätce
te kattre apkärth to wenepaddeſmette ſtunde ßadderrethe
by / vnde yckwens dabbuye ßouwe Groſſche.
Beth kad te pirmake nätce / czerrey the wairack
dabbuuthe / vnde the dabbuye arridtczan yckwens
ßouwe Groſſche. Vnd kad the to dabbuye / kurneye
te prettibe to Namme thewe / vnde ßatcy / Sche peedige
gir wene ſtunde ſtradayſche / vnde tu eſſe thös
mums lydtcz darrys / kattre mhes täs denes naſthe /
vnde to karſtumme czetuſſche eſſem.
Beth thas adbildey / vnde ßatcy vs to wene
ſtarpan thems / Mans droux. Es nhe darro thöw
nhe patteſe / Nhe eſ tueſtu ar man ßadderreys / pär wene
Groſſche ? Jem kas tows gir / vnde ey noſth / Beth
es grib ſchim peedygam doth lydtcz kha thöw. Jeb
nhe gir man walya darrith / ko es grib / ar to manne
? Lukoyes tu tapeetcz greyſe / ka es ta labs eſme ?
Ta taps te peedige te pirmake / vnde te pirmake te
peedige. Aeſto doudtcze gir aytczenate / beth maſſe
gir yſredtczhete.
Die Epiſtel am Sontage Sex-
ageſima / 2. Corinth. 11. cap.
AEſto yuus czeſchat tös Jeckes ieb nhe ßapprattiges
/ labpraath / peetcz to ka yuus guddre eſſet.
Juus ceſchat kad yums kaſlabban pär kalpeems
dar / kad yums kas labban dyra / kad yums
kaſlabban exkan tho wayge ßytte. To ßack es peetcz
tho neegode / kha butem mhes waaye tappuſſche.
Kur nu kaſlabban droſchis wuerßon gir (Es
treſſe exkan nhe ſappraſſchenne) tur eſme es arridtczan
droſchis wuerßon. The gir Ebreer loudis / Es
arridtczan / The gir Jſraeliter / Es arridtczan / The
gir Abraham Szeekla / Es arridtczan / The gir kalpe
Chriſti / (Es treſſe jeckyge) Es eſme whel wayraack
/ Es eſme wairaack ſtraddais / Es eſme wairaack
ßittenes czetis / es eſme daſſchekärte guuſtytcz /
daſſchekärtige exkan nawigims bhedims buewis /
No tims Juddims eſme es pece kaarte dabbuys czettredeſmette
ßittenes bes wene. Es eſme tris kärth
ſchouſtz / Wenekärt ackmennhotz. Tris kaarth eſme
es ar laywe vdenne bhedes cetis / Dene vnde
Nackte es exkan tho czillumme täs Jures buewis.
Es eſme daſſchekaarth broukais / Es eſme exkan
breſmibe buewis vs vdenne / Exkan bhedims
ſtarpan thems Szlepkouwems / Exkan bhedims
ſtarpan thems Juddems / Exkan bhedims ſtarpan
thems pagane loudems / Exkan bhedims exkan tims
pillems / Exkan bhedims exkan to tuxniſſe / Exkan
bhedims vs to Jure / Exkan bhedims ſtarpan thems
wiltigems Bralems / Exkan Bhede vnde Darbe /
exkan doudtze nomodybe / exkan Jßalckſchenne / vnd
Jſtwyckſchenne / exkan doudtcze Gaweeſchen / exkan
ßaltybeßaltyhe vnd nodzibe.
Bes to kas ßöw whel czittade notekaas / ar
wärde / ka es deniſke thope pär tetceetz vnde nheſſo
gadaſchenne pärpärwueſſe wueſſe droudtczybe. Kas gir wagis
/ vnde es nhe thope ways ? Kas thope apgreetcytz
/ vnde es nhe deggo ? Ja kad es man lelothe
/ Tad grib es man mannes waybes lelotes.
Dews vnde tas Thews muße Kunge Jeſu Chriſti /
katters tur ßlaweetz gir mußige / ſin ka es nhe mello.
Exkan Damaſco tas Semmeßoge ta Köninge
Areta / paßargaye to pylle tho Damaſcer / vnd
grybbey man guuſtyth. Vnd es tappe exkan wene
kurwe czour to Logo aran pär to Mure nolayſtz /
vnde yſbhego aran wingims rokims.
Ta leloſchenne nhe gir man yo lab / Tomher
grib es näckt vs tems redtczammems / vnde paradytims
letims ta Kunge. Es paßyſte wene Czilweeke
exkan Chriſto / pirms czetterpaddeſmette gaddems
gir tas exkan to Meße buewis / tad es to nhe
ßinno / ieb gir tas aran to Meße buewys / thad es
to arridtczan nhe ßin / Dews ßin to / tas patcz tappe
noroutcz / exkan to treſſhe debbes. Vnde es paßiſte
to patte Czilwheke / ieb tas exkan to Meße ieb aran
tho Meße buewis gir / to es nhe ßinno / Dews ßin
to. Tas tappe noroutcz exkan to Paradis / vnde
czirdeye nhe jſtreſchammes wärdes / katters newens
czilwhex ßatcyt war. No tho grib es man lelotes.
Beth no man pattim / nhe grib es man lelotes / beth
wene mannes waybes. Vnd kad es man lelotes
gribbete / nhe darryth es tapeetcz jeckige / aeſto es
gribbeth to teſcham ßatcyth. Beth es no thurros
man to tapeetcz / ka man neewens auxtake tur / neka
tas no man redtczreedtcz / ieb no man czyrde.
Vnde ka es man thös auxtiges paradiſchennes
nhe paauxtenayos / gir man dotcz wens Meetz
exkan Meße / ar wärde ta Satanna Engels / katters
man ar duurims ßith / tapeetcz ka es man nhe
pa auxtenayos. Pär kattre es tad to Kunge tris
kaarth ludtczis eſme / ka tas no man bhekete. Vnd
tas gir vs man ßatcys Layde thöw manna ßeeleſtibe
wayrack buth / aeſto manna ſpeetczibe gir exkan
tims wayms warrena. Ta peetcz gribes man
wueſſe wairake lelotes mannes wagibes / ka tas
Speex Chriſti py man czywo.
Euangelium am Sontage Sex-
ageſima Luc. 8. cap.
KAd nu doudtcze loudes wenan kopan by /
vnd aran tims pillims py to ſteidtczees / ßatcy
tas czour wene Lydtczibe. Wens Szeyeis
Jſgaye ßouwe Szeeckle ßhet / Vnd exkan to kad tas
ßeye / kritte czitta py to Czelle vnd tappe ßamita / vnd
te Putne appeſkan to Debbes / aprye to. Vnd czitta
kritta wuerſſon to Ackmenne / vnd kad ta vſdiga /
ßackalta ta / tapeetcz / ka tay newene ßlappybe by.
Vnd ta czitta kritta wueddon ſtarpan thems Ehrſchims
/ vnd te Ehrſche vſdiga lydtcz / vnd abßlapeye
to. Vnde zitta kritta wuerſſon wene labbe ſemme /
vnde ta vs diga / vnde neſſe ßumpt kaartiges augles
/ kad tas to ßatcy / ßoutce tas / kam außes gir czirdhet
/ tas czirde.
Beth winge Maetcekle youtaya tham / vnde
ßatcy / kas ſcha lydtczibe gir. Beth thas ßatcy /
Jums gir dota / ßinnath tho apßlepſchenne tho
Dewe walſtibe / beth tims czittims exkan lydtczibims
/ ka the to nhe redtcze / ieb the tho yow redtcz vnd
nhe ßapprooth / ieb the tho yow czirde.
Beth ſcha gir ta Lytczibe / ta Szeekla gir tas
Dewe wärdtcz. Beth ta / kattra py to czelle gir / te
gir / kattre to czirde. Turpeetcz nake tas Whelns /
vnde yem tho wärde no winge ßirdims. Tapeetcz
ka the nhetitcz / vnde ßweete thope. Beth the wuerßon
to Ackmenne / gir the / kad the to czirde / vs yem
the to wärde ar precibe / vnde thems nhe gir neewena
Szacknes. Wene maſſe laike / titcz the / vnde py tho
layke tho kardenaſchenne no kryt the. Beth kattra
ſtarpan thems Ehrſchims kryte / gir the / kattre to
czirde / vnde no edth appeſkan tims gadaſchennims /
thäs Bagatibes vnde karybes täs czywybes / vnde
apßlaape / vnde neeneeſſe newenes augles. Beth
kattra wuerßon tho labbe ſemme / gir te / kattre to
wärde czirde / vnde pattur to exkan wene labbe
Szyrde / vnde neeſſe augles exkan paceſchenne.
Die Epiſtel am Sontage Quin-
quageſima oder
Eſto mihi /
1. Corinth. 13.
KAd es ar Czilwheke vnde Engele mhelims
treſſeete / vnde man nee buute ta myleſtibe /
Thad buute es ka wens ſkanyes warris / ieb
ka wens ſkannyge Szwarguls. Vnd kad es warrethe
paprexke ſluddenath / vnde ßinnate wueſſe apßlepſchenne
/ vnde wueſſe atßiſchenne vnde man
buute wueſſe Titczibe / tha / ka es wueſſes kalnes
warreethe / vs czitte wete ſtattyth / vnde man
nhe buute ta myleſtibe / Thad buute es neeneke.
Vnde kad es wueſſe manne Bagatybe tems Nabbagems
dothe / vnde lickte manne Meße deckte / vnde
nhe buute ta myleſtibe / Thad nhe buut tas man
neeneke labbe.
Ta myleſtibe gyr lhenpratige vnd laypnige / ta
myleſtibe nhe gir ſkaudiga / ta myleſtibe nhe dar bleedibe
/ ta ßöw nhe vſpuuſchäs / ta ßöw nhe turras
nettickle / ta nhe mecklemeeckle ßouwe Gode / ta ßöw nhe lekas
ßabargooth / ta nhe gada peetcz loune / tha nhe
preczayas ßöw thäs nhe tayſnybes / Beth ta preczayaspreczaprczayas
ßöw thäs teſnibes / Tha pannes wueſſe lethe /
ta titcz wueſſenade / Tha czerre wueſſe lethe / Ta peczeſche
wueſſe lethe. Ta myleſtibe nhe tope pekuſſuſſe
/ ka tomher ta preſche ſluddenaſchenne nomitteeſſes
vnde täs Wallodes nomitteeſſes / vnde ta atßiſchnne
arridtczan no mitteeſſes.
Aeſto muße ßinnaſchenne gir gabballedarbs /
Vnde muße ßluddenaſchen gir gabballedarbs /
Beth kad nätcys ta puelnybe / thad tas gabballedarbs
mitteeſſes. Kad es wens Beerns by /
tad treſſeye es ka wens Beerns / vnde by guddris ka
wens Beerns / vnde by berniga dabba. Beth kad es
wens Wyrs tappe / no licko es kas bherniga by.
Mhes redtczam nu czour wene Spegel / exkan wene
pakreeſlige wärde / Beth tad no Wayge py wayge.
Nu atßyſto es to ka wene gabballedarbe / beth tad es
to atßiſteeſcho / iten ta ka es atſytz eſme. Beth nu
pallecke ta Titczybe / Czerrybe / Myleſtibe / ſche tris /
Beth ta myleſtibe gir ta lelaka ſtarpan tems.
Euangelium am Sontage Quin-
quageſima / oder Eſto mihi. Luc.18. cap.
BEth JeſusJheſus yeme tös duewepaddeſmette py
ßöw / vnde ßatcy vs tems / Rougeth / mhes noetam
vs Jeruſalem / vnde tas taps wueſſenotal
pepueldytz / katters tur raxtitz gir czour thems
Prophetems / no tho Czilwheke Dhele / Aeſto thas
taps no dhotz tims paggane loudims / vnde thas
taps apmhedytz vnde Newaatcz / vnde apſploudytz /
vnde the tho ſchoutys / vnde nokows / vnde than treſſchan
denan thas atkal auxkam czelſſes. Beth the
neeßapprate no tho neeneke. Vnde ta walloda by
tims apßleepta / vnde nhe ßinnaye kas tas ßatcytz
by.
Beth tas noticke kad tas tuwe klathe py Jericho
nätce / ßedeye wens py tho czelle / vnde dedelleye. Beth
kad thas tös loudes czyrdeye / kattre tur ſetczã gaya
Jſwaytczaye thas / kas tur buute ? Tad paßluddenaye
the tham / Jeſus no Nazareth edth tur ſetczen.
Vnde thas ſoutce vnde ßatcy / Jeſu tu Dhels Dauide
/ abßeelo thöw mannis. Beth kattre paprexke
gaya / abdroudye to / tham bye kluſſe czeſth. Beth
thas breetce whel wayrack / Tu Dauide Dhels / abßeelo
thöw mannis. Beth Jeſus ſthawey kluſſe /
vnde pawheley tho py ßöw daweeſt. Beth kad the
to tuwe klathe py to dawedde / youtaya tas tham /
vnde ßatcy / ko grib tu / ka man thöw darryth buus ?
Thas ßatcy / Kunx / ka es redtczeeth warre. Vnde
Jeſus ßatcy vs tho / thope redtczyx / Touwe tytczibe
/ gyr thöw pallydtczeis. Vnde tha tudelin tappe
thas redtczyx / vnde ſtaygaya tham peetcz / teytczeteytczee
Dewe. Vnde wueſſe te loudes / kattre to redtzey
Slawey Dewe
Die Epiſtel am erſten Sontage in
der Faſten / 2. Corinth. 6.
BEth mhes peminnam yums ka lydtcz palligus
/ ka yuus to Dewe ßeeleſtibe nhe whelte
yemmäth. Aeſto thas ßacke / Es eſme thöw exkan
tho peyemtige layke packloußys / vnde eſme thöw
py to dene täs peſtiſchennes pallydtczeys. Rougeth
/ nu gir tas precyx layx Nu gir ta dene täs peſtiſchennes.
Beth nhe laydeth mums neewenam kade
abgreetczibe doth / ka muße ammatz nhe thope ſaimootz
/ Beth exkan wueſſims letims laydeth mums paradytes
/ ka te Dewe kalpe.
Exkan lele paceſchenne / exkan noſkumſchen /
exkan bhedibe / exkan bailybe / exkan ßittenims / exkan
czetummims / exkan ſoribims / exkan darbims exkan
nomodibe / exkã atßiſchenne / exkan lhenpratybe /
exkan myleſtibe / exkan tho ſweete Garre / exkan neewiltige
myleſtibe / exkan tho wärde tho taiſnibe exkan
tho Dewe ſpeeczibe. czour brunge täs taiſnibes /
pa labbe vnd pa kreyſe roke / czour gode vnde koune /
czour loune ßlaweßlaawe / vnde labbe ßlawe.
Ka tös wiltenekes vnde tomher teſiges / ka te
neepaßyſtamme / vnd tomher paßyſtamme. Ka te
nomuerſtamme / vnde rougeth mhes cziwoyam.
Ka te noßodyte / vnde tomher nhe nokoute. Ka te
noſkummuſſche / beth allaßin lyxme. Ka te Nabbage
/ beth kattre tomher doudcze bagates dar. Kattrims
neeneke gir / vnde tomher wueſſa letha gir.
Euangelium am erſten Sontage in
der Faſten oder
Inuocauit
Matth. 4. cap.
TAd tappe Jeſus no Garre exkan to Tuxniſſe
wheſtz / ka tas no tho Whelne kärdenaatz tapte.
Vnde kad thas czetterdeſmette denes vnd
nacktes gaweys by / Jßalcka tham. Vnde tas kärdenatais
gaye py tho / vnde ßatcy / Eſ tuEſtu Dewe Dhels /
tad tres / ka ſche Ackmennes Mayſes thope. Vnde
thas adbildey vnde ßatcy / tur ſthawe raxtytz / tas
Czilwhex necziwo nhe wene no tho Mayſe beth no
yckwene wärde / katters czour to Dewe mutte edth.
Tad wedde to tas WhelnsWeelns ar ßöw / exkan tho
ſweete Pille / vnde ſtadye to wuerßon to galle thäs
Baſnices vnde ßatcy vs to / Eſ tuEſtu Dewe Dhels /
thad nolaides thöw / ſemmen / Aeſto tur ſtawe raxtitcz
/ thas ßouwims Engelims pär thöw pawheleſchenne
dhos / vnde the thöw vs ßouwems
rokems neſſys / aeſto ka tu nhe touwe kaye
py wene Ackmenne nodouſſe. Tad ßatcy Jeſus vs
tho / arridtczan ſthawe atkal raxtytz / thöw nhe buus
Dewe touwe Kunge kärdennaath.
Atkal / wedde to tas Whelns ar ßöw / vs wene
lothe auxte kalne / vnde radye tham / wueſſe Baggatibe
thäs paſſoules / vnde winge Godybe / vnde ßatcy
vs tho / To grib es thöw wueſſe notal dhot / Ja tu
ſemmen krittys / vnde peludtczys man. Tad ßatcy
Jeſus vs tho / Bhedtz nohſt no man Sathan / aeſto
tur ſthawe raxtitz / thöw buus Dewe touwe Kunge
peluckt / vnde tham wene kalpooth. Tad pallayde to
tas Whelns / vnde rouge / tad gaye te Engele py tho /
vnde kalpooye tham.
Die Epiſtel am andern Sontage
in der Faſten / 1. Theſſalo. 4. cap.
JO proyam / mylige Brale / ludczam mhes
yums vnde peminnam exkan to Kunge Jeſu /
peetcz tho ka yuus no mums dabbuiſſche eſſet /
ka yums ſtaigaath buuſe / vnde Dewam patickt /
ka yuus allaßyn puelnige thopet. Aeſto yuus ßinnath
/ kades Boußles mhes yums döwuuſche eſſem /
czour to Kunge Jeſum. Aeſto tas gyr tas Dewe
praatcz yuuſe ſweetybe / ka yuus noturrates no
Moutzybe / vnde ka yckwens no yums / ßouwe Meße
ßinne turreth exkan ſweetybe vnde godibe / vnde nhe
exkan to kaare ßeerdtczybe / ka te pagane loudis / kattre
no Dewe neeneke ßin. Vnde ka newens nhe talake
ßnedtcze / nedtcz ßouwe Brale pewyl exkan
pretczeſchenne. Aeſto tas Kunx gir tas Szodetays
pär to wueſſe / ka mhes yums papreſche ßatcyſche
vnde ledtczibe döwuſſche eſſem. Aeſto Dews
nhe gir mums aitczenays py neeſkyſtibes / beth py
ſweetybes. katteers nu polga / tas nhe polga wene
czylwheke / beth Dewe / katteers ßouwe ſwete Garre
exkan yums döwis gir.
Euangelium am andern Sontage
in der Faſten oder Reminiſce. Matth. 15.cap.
VNde Jeſus js gaya no turrenes / vnde atſthayas
prettibe Tyro vnde Sydon. Vnde rouge
/ wena Cananeiſche Sewe js gaya aran
to patte Eßhe / vnde breetcze tham peetcz / vnde ßatcy
/ O kunx tu Dauide dhels abßeeloyes / thöw mannis
/ manna Meythe thope lothe no tho Whelne
wardtczenatawardrczenata . Vnde tas nhe adbildeye tay neewene
wärde. Tad gay winge MaetcekleMaetckle py tho / ludtce to /
vnde ßatcy / layde tho no thöw / aeſto ta breedtce
mums peetcz. Beth Jeſus adbildeye / vnde ßatcy /
Es nhe eſme ſuutitz / ka wen py thems paßuſtems
auwems / no tho Namme Jſrael. Beth ta naetce /
vnde kritte prexkan tho Semmen / vnde ßatcy / kunx /
pallydtcz man. Beth tas adbildeye vnde ßatcy / tas
nhe gir lab / ka tims bhernims winge Mayſe yempta
thope / vnd prexkan tims Szunnims mheſtha.
Ta adbildeye / Ja Kunx / Beth tomher ehde te Szunniſche
no tims druſkynims / kattre no winge kunge
galdims kryte. Tad adbildeye Jeſus / vnde ßatcy vs
thäs / O Sewe / touwe Tytczibe gir lela / Thöw noteke
ka tu grib. VndeBnde täs Meyte tappe weſſele / py
to patte ſtunde.
Die Epiſtel am dritten Sontage
in der Faſten oder Oculi / Epheſ. 5. cap.
Eſſet nu Dewe peetcz ſthaygataye / ka te mylige
Bherne vnde ſthaygayeth exkan to mylibe /
ka Chriſtus mums myleis gir / vnde ßöw pattim
no doeuwes pär mums / pär dawane vnde vppere
/ Dewam pär wene ßalde Ooſnybe. Beth Moutcybe
vnde wueſſe neeſſkyſtibe / ieb neegouſſibe / nhe laideth
no yums ßatcytz tapt / ka tims ſweetims peder.
Arridtczan neeganiges wärdes / vnde jeckige treſſeſchenne
/ ieb gloudaſchenne / kattre yums nhe peklayaas
/ beth doudtczedodtcze wayrack / patteitcibe ßatciſchenne.
Aeſto tho buus yums ßynnath / ka neewens
Moutczenex ieb neeſſkyſtz / ieb neegoußyx (katters
tur gir wens Elkedewe kalps) neewene dallibe gir /
exkan tho walſtybe Chriſti vnde Dewe.
Nhe laideth yums nhe no wene pewilth / ar tuxſchims
/ ieb ar wiltygims wärdims. Aeſto tapeetz nake
/ ta Dewe duſmibe pär tems Bhernems thäs
neettitczybes / Tapeetcz / nhe thopet winge bedredrouge.
Aeſto yuus byeth czitkärth tumpßibe. Beth nu
eſſeth yuus wena Gayſme exkan tho Kunge. Staygath
ka te Bheerne täs Gayßybes. Tas auglis
tha Garre gyr wueſſenade laipnybe / vnde taiſnybe
/ vnde teſibe.
Euangelium am dritten Sontage
in der Faſten oder Oculi / Luc. 11. cap.
VNd tas Kunx Jeſus Jſcinna wene Whelne /
tas by mhems. Vnde tas noticke / kad tas
Whelns yſ broudtce / tad treſſeye tas mhems /
vnde te loudis yßabrinoyas ßöw. Beth czitte no
tims ßatcy tas Jſcenne tös Whelnes czour Beelzebub
/ to wuerſeneke tho Whelne / Beth te czitte kärdenaye
to / vnd meckleye wene Syme no tho no debbes.
Beth tas nomannie winges domaſchennes /
vnd ßatcy vs tems / yckwena walſtyba / kad ta ar ßöw
pattim enaidan thope / ta thope pooſta / vnde wens
Nams kryte wuerßon to otre. Gir tad tas Sathanas
arridtczan ar ßöw pattim enaidan / ka grib tad
wynge walſtybe paſthaweet ? Peetcz to ka yuus
ßacketh / es js czenne tös Whelnes czour Beelzebub.
Beth kad es tös Whelnes czour Beelzebub
Jſczenno / czour kade Jſczen thös tad yuuſe Bherne
? Tapeetcz buus thems yuuſe noteſetayems
buuth. Beth kad es czourzour to Dewe pyrſte tös Whelnes
yſczenno / tad nake / yo ta Dewe walſtybe py
yums.
Kad wens ſtippraax abbrunyotz ßouwe pille
paßarge / tad pallecke wynge pils ar mere. Beth kad
wens ſtippraax pär to nake / vnde vſwar to / tad payem
thas tham wynge Brunnige / vs kattre thas
ßöw pallaidees / vnde Jſdalle to Loupiſchenne. Kas
ar man neegir / tas gir prettibe man. Vnde kas
neeßakra ar man / tas Jsbaarſte.
Kad tas neskyſtz Gars no tho Czilwheke Jsbroudtcze
/ tad czour ſtaiga tas ßackaltuſſches wetes
/ meckle duſſeſchenne / vnde nhe attrode tho. Tad
tres tas / Es grib atkal greſtes exkan manne Namme
/ kur es Jſgays eſme. Vnd kad tas nake / thad attrode
thas to ar Szlotims mheſto vnde ſkiſtite. Tad
no edht thäs / vnde yem ßeptinges Garres py ßöw /
kattre nickmake gir / neeka thas patz. Vnde kad the
tur exkan nake / cziwo the tur / vnd tad thope peetcz
ar to patte czilwheke nickmake nhe ka papreſche.
Vnde tas notickas ßöw / kad thas tha treſſeye /
czele wena Sewe ſtarpan tems loudems ßouwe
Balxne auxam / vnde ßatcy vs tho / Sweeta gir ta
Meßa / kattra thöw neſſuſſe gir / vnd te krutis kattres
tu ßydis es. Beth tas ßatcy / Ja ſweete gir te /
kattre tho Dewe wärde czirde / vnd paßarge to.
Die Epiſtel am vierden Sontage in
der Faſten oder Letare / Gal. 4 cap.
SZacket man / kattre yuus appeſkan tho Boußle
gribbath buut / Nhe eſſet yuus to Boußle
czyrdeiſche ? Aeſto tur ſthawe raxtytz / ka Abraham
duewe dhele by / tas wens no thäs kalpunes /
tas oters no thäs ſwabbaddes. Beth tas katterskattees
no thäs kalpunes by / gir peetcz tho Meße
peczimmis / beth tas no thäs Swabbades / gir
czour tho peßatcyſchenne peczimmis. Te wärde
eſymo ko lab / aeſto te gir te duewe Eſtadyumme.
Wens no tho kalne Sinai / katters py kalpoſchen
peczem / kattra gir Agar. Aeſto Agaragar dhewa
exkan Arabia tas kalns Sina / vnd ſtepyas js Jeruſalem
kattra py ſcho laike gir / vnde gir wene
wußige Werdtczybe ar ßouwims Bhernims.
Beth tha Jeruſalem / kattra tur auxkam gir /
ta gir ta attwallote / ta gir muße wueſſe Mathe.
Aeſto tur ſthawe raxtytz / Es lyxma tu neeauglyga /
kattra tu nhe czeem / vnde Jſloußes vnde ßoutce / kattra
tu nhe eſſe abgrutenata / aeſto tay wenteſyge ieb
atſtate / gir doudtce wairack Bherne / neka tay / kattre
tas Wyrs gir. Beth mhes / mylige Brale / eſſem
Jſaacs / peetcz to peßatcyſchenne Bherne.
Beth lydtcz ka py tho laike / katters peetcz tho
Meße peczimptz by / polgaye to / katters peetcz to
Garre peczimmis by : tha noteke tas nu arridtczan.
Beth ko tres tas raxtz ? Stum to kalpune
tur aran / ar ßouwe Dhele / aeſto täs kalpunes dhelam
nhe buus mantooth / ar tho dhele täs atwallotes
Sewes. Thad eſſem mhes nu / mylige Brale /
nhe täs kalpunes Bherne / beth täs atwallotes ieb
Swabbades Sewes.
Euangelium am vierden Sontage
in der Faſten oder Letare / Johan. 6. cap.
PEetcz to broudtce Jeſus nohſt pär to Jure / vs
to Pille Tyberias exkã Galilea / vnde doudtce
loudes ſtaygaye tham peetcz / ta peetcz ka the
täs Simes redtczeye / kattres tas py thems neeweſſelems
darrye. Beth Jeſus gaye / vs wene kalne /
vnde paßeedas ßöw tur ar ßouwims maetceklims /
beth ta leledene tho Judde Sweetke / by tuwe klathe.
Tad paczeele Jeſus ßouwes atczes / vnde redtczey
/ ka tur doudtcze loudes / py to nätcze / vnde ßatcy
vs Philippo / kur pirkam mhes Mayßes / ka ſche
ehde ? Beth tho ßatcy tas / to kärdenadams / aeſto
thas ganne ßynnaye / ko thas darryth gribbeye.
Philippus adbildeye tham / pär duewe ßuempte
kouſe Mayßes nhe gir ganne ſtarpan thems / ka
Jckwens no timsnotims maſſe war dabbuth. Wens winge
Maetceklis Andreas tas Bralis Simonis Petri
ßatcy vs tho / Scheit gir wens Puißis / tam gir
pece Meſche mayßes / vnde duewe ſuewis / beth kas
gir tas ſtarpan tick doudtczems ? Beth Jeſus ßatcy
darreth / ka ßöw te loudes paßedhas beth tur by doudtce
Sales py to Wete. Tad paßedhas ßöw py pece
tuuſtoſche Wyre. Beth Jeſus yeme tös Mayßes /
patteytce / vnde döwe thös tims Maetceklims / Beth
te Maetcekle tims / kattre ßöw paſſeeduſſchees by.
Ta lydtcz arridtczan no tims Suewims / tickt
doudtce ka thas gribbye.
Beth kad the peeduſſche by / ßatcy tas vs ßouwims
Maetceklims / Szackrayeth tös atlicktes druſkes
kopan / ka no tims neeneke / Jsbaarſthas. Tad
ßackraye te / vnde pueldye duewepaddeſmette kurwes
ar druskims / no tims pece Meſche Mayßems /
kattre tur pär pallicke / tims / kattre ehdenate tappe.
Kad nu te Czilwheke tho Syme redtczeye / kattre
Jeſus darrye / ßatcy the / tas gyr patteſe thas Prophetcz
/ kattram exkan to paſſoule naackt buus. Kad
nu Jeſus nomannye / ka the naackt gribbey / vnde /
tho guuſtyth / ka the to pär Köninge darryte / atſthayas
thas atkal / vnde gaye tas patz wens wuerßon
to kalne.
Die Epiſtel am fünfften Sontage
in der Faſten / oder Judica / Ebre. 9. cap.
BEth Chriſtus gir naetcis / ka thas gir wens
Auxtzbaſnicekunx / thäs nakammes paddomibes
/ czour wene lelake vnde puelnake ziwokle /
kattra nhe gir ar to roke darrita / tas gir / kattra tha
nhe taißita gir / nedtcz arridtczan czour to aazo ieb
Telle aſſenne / beth tas gir czour ßouwe patte Aſſenne
/ wenekärth exkan to Sweetumme egays /
vnde gir wene mußige peſtiſchenne nopelnys.
Aeſto ka tho Wherſche vnde tho aazo
aſſens / vnde te Pelne no täs Gowis apßlatcita / tös
neeſkyſtes ſwety / py tho meßige ſkyſtybe / ka doudtcze
wairack tad tas Aſſens Chriſti / katters ßöw
pattim bes wueſſe neeſkyſtibe / czour to ſweete Garre /
Dewã vppeereyes gir / muſſe ßinnaſchenne ſkyſtys /
no tims nomuerruſchims darbims / py kalpoſchen
tham czywigam Dewam ? Vnde tapeetcz gir tas
arridtzan wens Wueddetays thäs jounes Eſtadiſchennes
/ aeſto ka thas czour tho nawe / kattra notickuſſe
gir / py to atpeſtiſchenne no timsnotims pärkaaptims
letims (kattre appeſkan tho pirmako Eſtadyumme
by) te kattre tur aytczenate gir / to peßatcyte
mußyge Mantibe / enackt.
Euangelium am fünfften Sontage
in der Faſten oder Judica / Johan. 8. cap.
KAs gir tur ſtarpan yums / kas man war
wenes greekes pär treſſeet. Beth kad es yums
nu teſcham to ßacko / kapeetcz nhe titczaath
yuus tad man ? Katters no Dewe gir / tas czirde
Dewe wärde. Tapeetcz nhe czirdeth yuus / aeſto
yuus nhe eſſet no Dewe. Tad adbildeye te Judde /
vnde ßatcy vs to / Nheßackam mhes teſcham / ka tutu-
wens Samariters eße / vnde töw gir tas Whelns ?
Jeſus adbildey / Man nhegirnehgir neewens Whelns /
beth es gode Manne Thewe / vnde yuus neegodeth
man. Es neemeckleyo manne Gode. Beth tur gir
wens / katters to meckleye / vnde teſa.
Patteſe / patteſe / es ßack yums / ja kas manne wärde
thurrees / tas to Nawe mußam nheredtczees. Tad
ßatcy te Judde vs to / Nu atßiſtam mhes / ka töw
tas Whelns gir / Abraham gir nomuerris / vnde te
Prophetes / vnd tu ßack / Ja kas lab manne Wärde
tur / tas tho Nawe mußam nhe boudys. Es tu wayrack
neeka muße Thews Abraham ? katters nomuerrys
gir / vnde te Prophetes gir nomuerruſſche /
ko dar tu no thöw pattim ?
Jeſus
adbildeye / kad es man patthe godhete
khad nhe gir mans goodtcz neeneke. Beth
tur gir mans Thews / kas man godee / kattre yuus
ßackath / tas gir yuuſe Dews / vnde nhe paßiſteth
to. Beth es paßiſt to. Vnd kad es ßatcyte / Es nhe
paßiſte to / thad tapte es wens MhelkullisMhekullis / lydtcz ka
yuus eſſet. Beth es paßiſte tho / vnde thurre winge
wärde.
Abraham yuuſe Thews tappe lyxmis / ka thas
manne dene redtczeete. Vnde thas redtczeye to /
vnde epreceyas ßöw. Tad ßatcy te Judde vs tho /
tu nhe es whel peecedeſmette Gadde whedtcz / vnde
es Abraham redtczeis ? Jeſus ßatcy vs tems / patteſe
/ patteſe / es ßacke yums / pirms Abraham tappe /
eſme es. Tad yeme te Ackmennes auxam / ka the vs
tho mheſte. Beth Jeſus paßlepees ßöw / vnde Jſgaye
aran to tho Baſnice.
Die Epiſtel auff den Palm-
tag / Philip. 2.
ESſet Jckwens tadan pratan / ka Jeſus Chriſtus
arridtczan by / katters ka tomher thas
exkan dewige buuſchen by / nhe thurreye tas
parr wene loupyſchenne Dawam lydtcz buuth / beth
ßemmoyaas ßöw pattim / vnde vs ieme wene kalpe
buuſchenne / tappe lydtcz ka wens citcz Czilwhex /
vnde no prate kha wens Czilwhex attraſtz / ßemmoyas
ßöwßüw pattim / vnde tappe pakloußyx js tho nawe /
ya js tho Nawe py tho kruſte.
Tapeetcz gir tho arridtzan Dews paauxtenays /
vñ gir tam wene wärde doeuwys / katters pär wueſſems
Wärdems gir / ka ßöw exkan tho Wärde Jeſu
lodczyth buus / wueſſe the czelye / kattre exkan
Debbes vnde wuerßon Szemmes / vnde appeſkan
tho Semme gir / vnde wueſſems Mhelems atßyth
buuſe / ka Jeſus Chriſtus tas Kunx gir pär gode
Dewe tho Thewe.
EuangeliumEuangelum am Palmtage Matth. 21.
Cap. ſuche dort oben Erſten Son-
tage des Aduents.
Die Epiſtel am grünen Donner-
ſtage / 1. Corinth. 11. cap.
ES eſme to no tho Kunge dabbuys / kattre es
yums doeuwys eſme. Aeſto tas Kunx Jeſus
exkan thäs nactz / kad thas tappe pewyltz / yeme
thas to Mayſe patteitcze / vnde pär louſe to / vnde
ßatcy / yemmet / ehdet / ta gir manna meße kattra pär
yums pär louſta thope / to darreth py manne peminneſchenne.
Ta lydtcz arridtczan to Bickere / peetcz
to wackarre ehdenne / vnde ßatcy / Schis Bickers gir
tas youns Eſtadiums exkan manne Aſſenne / To
darreth / czekärth yuus to ſczerrethſerreth / py manne peminneſchenne.
Aeſto czekärth kha yuus no ſcho Mayſe
ehdath / vnde no ſcho Bickere ſczerſeth / buus yumsynms
ta Kunge Nawe paßluddenath / tekams ka thas
naetcys. Katters nu neecenige no ſcho Mayſe
ehde / ieb no tho Bickerre tha Kunge ſczers / tas gir
noſedczis / py tho Meße vnde Aſſenne tha Kunge.
Beth tas Czilwhex apdoma ßöw pattim / vnde ta
ehde tas no ſcho Mayſe / vnde ſczerre no ſcho Bickerre.
Aeſto kas neeczenige eede / vnde ſczerye / tas
ehde vnde ſczeerye ßöw pattim to ßodybe / ar to / ka
thas nhe noſſkyr / to Meſſe tha Kunge.
Euangelium am grünen Donner-
ſtage / Johan. 13.cap.
BEth prexkan tho ſweetke to leledene kad Jeſus
atßynne / ka winge layx nätczis by / ka thas
aran ſcho Paſſoule edth py Thewe / lydtcz ka
thas by myleis thos ßouwes / kattre exkan tho paſſoule
by / tha myley thas thos js tam gallam. Vnd
peetcz tho wackarre ehdene / kad thas Whelns yow
by tam Juda Simonis Jſcharioth exkan ßirde
edoeuwis / ka thas tho pewilte / ſinnaye Jeſus ka
tham thas Thews by wueſſes lethes exkan wynge
roke doeuwis / vnd ka thas no Dewe nätczis by /
vnde py Dewe ete / Czeeles thas no tho Wackarre
ehdene auxkam / no licke ßouwes dreebes / vnde yeme
wene aute / vnd apyoſees ßöw. Peetcz to leeye thas
Vdenne exkan wene Beckenne / vnd eſaka tims maetceklims
thos kayes maſgaath / vnd ßouſenaye thos /
ar tho apyooſte aute / ar kattre tas apyooſtz by.
Tad nätce thas py Simon Petro. Vnd tas ßatcy
vs to / kunx / buus thöw man mannes kayes maſgath
? Jeſus adbildey / vnd ßatcy vs tho / ko es dar to
nhe ßin tu nu. Beth tu to peetcz ßayus. Tat ßatcy
Petrus vs to. Neemußam buhs thöw man tös kayes
maſgaath ? Jeſus ßatcy vs to / kad es thöw nhe
maſgathe / thad neegir thöw neewene dallibe ar
man. Simon Petrus ßatcy vs tho / Kunx nhe wene
thos kayes / beth arridtczan täs rokas / vnde to
Galwe. Jeſus ßatcy vs tho / kas maſgaatz gir / tam
ne gir wairs wayage / ka wen tös kayes / beth thas
gir wueſtim ſkyſtz / vnde yuus eſſet ſkyſte / beth nhe
wueſſe. Aeſto thas ßinnaye ßouwe Wilteneke gan /
tapeetcz ßatcy thas / yuus ne eſſet / wueſſe ſkyſte.
Kad thas nu winge kayes maſgays by / yeme
thas ßouwes drebes py ßöw / vnde paſeedäs ßöw /
vnde ßatcy atkal vs thems / ßinneth yuus / ko es
yums darrys eſme ? Juus dheweet man Meyſter
vnd Kunge / vnde ßacketh tho teſcham / aeſto es eſme
arridtczan / Ja es nu yuuſe Kunx vnde Meyſters
yums tös kayes maſgays eſme / Ta buus yums arridtczan
ſtarpan weneotre tös kayes maſgath.
Wene Lydttzybe eſme es yums doeuwis / ka yuus
darreth / lydtcz kha es yums darrys eeſmhe.
P A S S I O
Von dem Leiden vnd
Sterben vnſers HErn vnd Heilan-
des Jeſu Chriſti nach den vier Euangeliſten.
Aus Deudſcher Sprache in Vn-
deudſche gebracht/ Durch
Godthard. Reymers Predi. zum Bouſchenburg.
Anno 1587.
Klauſſet laſſam no to
Mocybe vnd Nomuerſchenne muſze
Kunge Jeſu Chriſti / ka mums appraxte
te ſweete Maetcetaye ar Wärde.
Mattheus 26. Marcus 14. Lucas 22. vnd Johannes 13. wetan.
VNde kad the to Patteitcibe
czeſme ßatcyſche bye / gaya Jeſus aran
peetcz ßouwe Eraddumme / par to Vppe
Kidron py to Olyekalne. Beth winge
Macekle ſtaigaye tham peetcz. Tad ßatcy tas vs
tems : Exkan ſcho Nacte yuus wueſſe py man apgreeczenaſes.
Aeſto tur ſtawe raxtytcz /Es to
Ghanne ßittiſcho / vnde te Auwes thäs Gannibes
ßöw Jsbärſtiſes / Beth kad es atkal auxkam czelſchos
/ grib es prexkan yums no edth exkan Galileã.
Beth Petrus adbildeye / vnde ßatcy vs tho / Ja kad
the arridtczan wueſſe ßöw py thöw apgreetczenate /
thad neegrib es man mußam apgreetczenates. Jeſus
ßatcy vs tho : Patteſe es ßack thöw / Schodene
exkan ſcho Nacte / pirmack tas Gaylis duewekärte
czedas tu man triſkärth ayſledtczys. Beth thas
ßatcy whel wairack : Ja kad man arridtczan ar thöw
muerth buthe / tad nhe gribbethe es thöw ayſleeckt.
Ta lydtcz arridtczan ßatcy wueſſe Maetcekle.
Tad nätce Jeſus ar tims / py wenas Muyßas /
ta dhewey Getſemane / tur by wens Därſis / tur exkan
gaya Jeſus vnd winge Maetcekle. Beth Judas
katters to pewile / ßinnay arridtczan to Wete / aeſto
Jeſus ßackrayas ßöw daſſchekärte tur patte ar ßouwims
Maceklims. Tad ßatcy Jeſus vs tims : ßedeth
yuus ſcheit / tekams ka es no emo vnd luudtczo.
Vnde yeme py ßöw Petrum vnde Jacobum vnde
Johannem tös duewe Dheles Zebedei/ vnde eßaka
bhedates / tryſeeth vnd bayloth. Vnde ßatcy vs
tims : Manna Dhweſſelle gir Noſkummuſſe lydtcz
tay Nawe / palledtczet ſcheit/ vnde eſſeth modige ar
man/ luudtczet / ka yuus exkan kärdenaſchenne neeekrytet.
Vnde thas wherſees ßöw no tims py wene ackmenne
mettenne täl / vnde meetthes czellos / vnd kritte
vs ßouwe Wayge vs to Semme / vnde luddtcze /
Ja tas tha warreth buuthe / ka ta ſtunde ſedtczen
edthe / vnde ßatcy : Abba mans Thews / tu war
wueſſes lethes darryth / Jem ſcho Bickerre no man /
beth nhe tha kha es grib / beth kha tu grib. Vnde thas
nätcze py ßouwems Maetceklems / vnde attradde
thös gullites / vnde ßatcy vs Petro Simon gultu ?
Nhe war tu newene Stunde ar man modhet ? Eſſet
modige vnde luudtczet / ka yuus exkan kärdenaſchen
ne ekritet. Tas gars gir labpratyx / beth tha meße
gir beſſpeetczige.
Oteran kärtan gaya tas atkal / luudtcze vnde ßatcy
Mans Thews / war tas ta buut/ ka ſchis Bickerrys
no man edthe / es ſczerre tad to / thad noteke tows
prätcz. Vnde thas nätcze vnde attradde thös whel
wene kärth gullites / vnde winge Atczes by puelne
Mege / vnd nhe ßinnaye / ko the tham adbildeye. Vnd
thas licke thös ar mere / vnde gaye whel wene kärth /
vnde luudtcze than treſſchan kaartan / tös pattes
Wärdes vnde ßatcy : Thews grib tu / thad yem ſcho
Bickere nho man / Tomher nhe mans / beth tows
Prätcz noteke.
Beth tam paradyas wens Engels / no Debbes
/ vnd eſtipprenaye to. Vnde tas notickas / ka
thas ar to Nawe czyxteye / vnd luudtcze ſtipprake.
Beth winge Swedre tappe Aſſenne laſſes / te kritte
wuerßon to Semme.
Vnde thas czeeles auxkam no to Luuckſchenne
/ vnde nätcze py ßouwems Maceklems/ vnde attradde
thös gullites / no Noſkumſchennes vnd ßatcy
vs themsthcms : Ach gribbeth yuus nu gulleeth vnde duſſeeth
? ko gulleth yuus ? Tas gir ganne. Rouget /
ta ſtunde gir nakuſſe/ kha tha Czilwheke Dhels
taps nodootcznddootcz exkan tims Greetczeneke rokims.
Czelletes auxkam / laydeth mums edthe Rougeth /
kas man pewilß gir tuwe klathe / Beth luudtcet/ ka
yuus exkan kärdenaſchenne nhe kritet.
Vnde tudelyne kad thas whel treßeye / Rouge /
Judas wens no tims Duewepaddeſmettims / kad
tas nu py ßöw yemis by to kope / vnde karyekalpes /
thös Auxtebaſnicekunges vnd Phariſeeres / thös
Wetczakes vnde Raxtmacetayes / gaya thas
prexkan tho droudtcze / vnde nätcze tur / ar vggunne
ſwetczims / vnd ar Sobennims / vnde ar
daſſchadems Erotczems.
Beth tas Wiltenex by tems wene Syme doeuwis
vnde ßatcys/ kattre es ſkupſtiſcho/ tas gir to
guuſteth / weddeth vnde thurreth to ſtippre. Kad nu
Jeſus ſynnaye wueſſes letees kas tam notickt bye /
gaya thas aran / vnde ßatcy vs tems : Ko meckleyet
yuus ? The adbildey tam Jeſum no Nazareth. Jeſus
ßatcy vs tems : Es eeſme.
Beth Judas / kas to pewile / ſthawey arridtczan
py tems. Kad nu Jeſus vs tems ßatcy / Es eeſme /
kritte the atpackal py Semmes. Tad youtaye thas
tems whel wen kärte / ko meckleyet yuus ? Beth the
ßatcy : Jeſum no Nazareth. Jeſus adbildey es
eſme yums ßatcys / ka es tas eeſme. Meckleyet yuus
man thad laydet ſchös edth / ka tas Wärdtcz pepueldytcz
tapte / kattre thas ßatcy / Es nhe ehſſeme no
tims nee wene paſſuddys / kattres tu man doeuwis
eſſe.
Vnde Judas ſteyczes ßöw py Jeſu ka thas to
ßkupſtyte / vnde tudelin gaya thas py tho / vnd ßatcy :
Summenatcz eſ tueſtu Rabbi Vnde ßkupſtye tho. Beth
Jeſus ßatcy vs to / mans Droux / kapeetcz eſ tueſtu ſcheit
nätczys / O Juda / pewil tu ta Czilwheke Dhele /
ar wene Szkupſtiſchenne ? Tad gaye the py to / vnde
pelicke täs Rokes py Jeſum / vnde guſtye to.
Beth kad te redtczeye / kattre py to bye / kas tur
notickt gribbey / ßatcy the vs tho : Kunx / buus mums
ar to Sobenne tur ſtarpan ßiſt ? Tad bye Simon
Petrum wens Sobens / vnde Jſwilke to / vnde ßitte
peetcz to Auxtebaſnitczekunge Kalpe / vnde no czirte
tham winge labbe Auße / Vnde tas Kalps dhewey
Malchos.
Beth Jeſus adbildey vnde ßatcy vs Petro /
Baaſe touwe Sobenne exkan to Maxte / aeſto kas
to Sobenne yem tam buus czour to Sobenne ßamaitatam
tapt. Jeb czerre tu / ka es mannam Thewam
nhe warreethe luuckt ? ka thas man ßutite /
wairack neka duewepaddeſmette Legion Engel ?
Nee buus man to bickeerre ſczeert kattre man mans
Thews doeuwis gir ? Beth ka tapte tas Raxtz pepueldytcz
? Tam buus ta notickt / Vnde thas aiſkare
winge Auße vnde czedenaye to.
Py to ſtunde ßatcy Jeſus vs tems Auxtbaſnitczekungems
vnde Galwenekems thäs Baſnitczes /
vnde tems Whetczakems / kattre py to nakuſſche bye /
Juus eſſet lydtcze kha py wene Szlepkouwe ar Sobenims
/ vnd ar Skeepims / jſgayſche / man guſtythgu ſtyth
Es eſme deniſke py yums ßedeis/ vnde eſme
macys exkan Baſnitczes / vnde yuus nhe eſſeth neewene
Roke py man dalickuſſche. Beth ta gir yuuſe
Stunde / vnde ta Näcktz thäs tumſſibes / ka the raxte
pepueldite tapte. Beth tas gir wueſſe notal notitczis
/ ka te Raxte thös Prophetes pepueldite tapte.
Tad pallayde to wueſſe Maetcekle vnd beedtcze.
Vnde tur by wens Maetceklis / tas ſtaigaye
tham peetcz tas by ar Lynne wadmalle aptherptcz /
vs to kayle Meße / vnde te Kalpe guuſty to / beth
thas licke to Lynnewadmalle ſpruckth / vnde beetcze
Nöx no timsnotims.
BethBBeth ta kopa vnde wuerſegalweneke vnd te
Kalpe/ tho Juddelouſcho / yeme Jeſum / vnde
ßeie to / vnde wedde to wueſſe pirmacke py
Hannas / tas by Caiphas ßnodtcz katters to Gadde
Auxtebaſnitczekunx by. Beth Caiphas by tas /
katters tems Juddeloudems paddome doeuwe / tas
buute labbe / ka wens Czilwhex tapte no mäcktcz
par tems loudems.
Vnde te wedde to py to Auxtebaſnitczekunge Caiphas
(tas gir / py to auxtekunge ieb wuerſeneke tos
baſnitczekunges) kur ßöw wueſſe auxtebaſnitczekunge
/ vnde Raxtmaetcetaye vñ whetczake ßagaiuſſche
by. Beth Simon Petrus ſtaigaye Jeſum peetcz /
no talenes / vnd wens czitcz Maetceklis / Js to
Namme tha Auxtbaſnitczekunge. Tas patcz by
tham Auxtebaſnitczekungam paſſiſtams vnde gaya
ar Jeſu exkan / exkan to Auxtebaſnitczekunge Namme.
Beth Petrus ſtawey aran prexkan to Durwe.
Tad gay tas oters Maetceklis / katters tham Auxtam
baſnicekungam paßiſtams by / aran / vnde treßey
ar tho Durwe ßargetaya / vnd wedde Petrum
exkan.
Beth the Kalpe vnde Szullaine ſtaweye vnde
by wene ogle vggunne darriſche / ſemmen wueddon
exkan to Namme / aeſto tas py auſte vnde ßildyas
ßöw. Beth Petrus ſtawey py tims vnde ßildyas
ßöw / ka thas redtczeete / kas ſcheitan gribbeete notickt.
Beth ta Kalpune / tha Auxte baſnitczekunge /
ta Durwe Szargataya redtczey Petrum py to
Gaiſme / kad thas ßöw ßildyas / vnde lukoyas vs to/
vnd ßatcy : Vñ tu by arridtczan ar ſcho Jeſu no Galilea
/ Nhe eſ tueſtu arridtczan ſcha Czilwheke Maetceklis
wens ? Beth thas ayſledtcze to prexkan wueſſims
/ vnde ßatcy / Szewes waardtcz / es neepaßiſte
to es arridtczan nhe ßinno / ko tu ßack.
Beth tas Auxtz baſnitczekunx Joutaye Jeſum /
pär winge Maceklims / vnde pär winge Macibe.
Jeſus adbildey tham / Es eſme ßwabbadde vnde
ſkaidre treßeis prexkã to paſſoule / es eſme allaßin
macys exkan to Skole/ vnde exkan to Baſnitcze kur
wueſſe Judde loudis kopan nätcze / vnde nhe ehſſeme
neeneke exkan to kackte treßeys / ko youta tu man
peetcz to ? Jouta tems kattre man czirdeiſche gir /
ko es treßeys ehſſeme / Rouge / te paſſche ßin ko es
ßatcys ehſſeme. Beth kad thas ta treßey / doeuwe
wens Szullains / katters tur klathe ſtawey Jeſum
wene Wayge ßittenne / vnd ßatcy / buus thöw tham
Auxtebaſnicekungam ta adbildeeth ? Jeſus adbildey
ehſſeme es loune treßeis / tad parade to / ka tas
nhe taiſne gir / beth eſme es teſcham treßeys / ka peetcz
ßitte tu man tad ? Vnde Hannas ßutye to ßaſſete /
py tho Auxtebaſnitczekunge Caiphas.
Simon Petrus ſthawey vnde ßildyas ßöw / vnd /
pär wene maße bryde (peetcz to pirmake ayſleckſchenne)
khad thas tur aran gaya / exkan to preſche
ßeete / czedaye tas Gailis. VndeVmde wene czitta Kalpune
redtczeye to / vnde eßaka atkal ßatcyth / tims /
kattre tur kläth ſtawey / Schis by arridtczan ar
Jeſu no Nazareth. Tad ßatcy the vs to / Nhe es tu
winge Maetceklis wens ? Vnde wens czytcz ßatcy
tu eße no tims arridtczan wens. Vnde thas ayſledtczeayſayledtcze
whel wenkärth / dewe minnedams vnde ßatcy /
Czilwhex es nhe eſme/ vnde es nhe paßiſte arridtczan
to Czilwheke.
Vnde pär wene maße bryde / py wene ſtunde /
apſtippreye to wens czytcz ar tims/ kattre tur ſtaweye
/ vnd ßatcy / Patteſe / tu es arridtczan wens
aeſto tu es wens Galileers / vnde touwe Wallode
pewil thöw. Ta Auxtebaſnitczekunge Kalps / wens
droux tha kattram Petrus to Auße noczirtis by /
ßacke / ka nhe redtczeye es thöw exkan Därſe py to ?
Tad eſaacke thas ßöw no ladeetes vnde Dewe minneth
/ Es nhe paßiſte to Czilwheke / no kattre yuus
ßackath.
Vnde tudelin / kad thas whel treßey/ czeday tas
Gailis tan otran kärtan. Vnde thas Kunx greßhees
ßöw apkärth / vnde vs lukoye Petrum.
Tad egadayas Petrus py to Wärde Jeſu / kha thas
vs to ßatcys by / pirms tas Gailis duewekärte czede
/ tu man trys kärte ayſlex / vnde Jſgaye / vnde roudaye
gauſche.
Beth te Auxtebaſnitczekunge vnde te Weetczake
/ vnd te wueſſe Runneskunge / meckleye wiltige
Ledtczybe prettibe Jeſum / ka te to nokoute / vnde nhe
attradde neewene wayne / ja tomher doudtcze wiltige
Ledtczeneke / kläth nätcze / aeſto winge Ledtczibe nhe
by wenade. Peedige nätcze duewe wiltige Ledtczeneke
klathe / vnde doeuwe wiltige Ledtczybe prettibe
to / vnd ßatcy : Mehs ehſſem czirdeiſche : ka thas
ßatcy / Es war vnde grib to Dewe Baſnitcze / kattra
ar Rokims darrita gir / ßalouſt / vnde exkan
trims Denims wene czitte tayßith / kattra nhe gir ar
Rokims darrita. Beth winge Ledtczybe nhe by
wenade.
Vnde tas Auxtebaſnitczekunx czeelees auxkam
ſtarpan tims / vnde Joutaye Jeſum vnde ßatcy : adbilde
tu neeneke vs to / ka ſche prettibe thöw ledtczena ?
Beth Jeſus czete kluſſe / vnde nhe adbildey neeneke.
Tad youtaye tham tas Auxtzbaſnitczekunx whelwenekärte
/ vnde ßatcy vs tho : Es tu Chriſtus / tas
Dhels ta auxte teitczamme ? Es peſpeſche thöw py
to cziwe Dewe / ka tu mums ßacke / Ja tu eße Chriſtus
/ tas Dewe Dhels. Jeſus ßatcy / tu ßack to / es
eſme. Tomher ßack es yums / no ſcho Layke yuus
to Czilwheke Dhele ßeedithe redtczeßeth / py to labbe
Roke ta Speeke / vnde nakamme exkan to paddebbeſſe
tho Debbes.
Tad ßapleeße tas Auxtebaſnitczekunx ßouwes
Drebes / vnde ßatcy / thas gir Dewe ßaimois / kade
gir mums wairack Ledtczibe wayage. Rouget tagadin
ehſſeth yuus winge Dewe ßaimoſchenneßannoſchenne czirdeiſche
