? Ko domath yuus ? Beth the paßudenaye
to wueſſe / vnde ßatcy : thas gir to Nawe noßedtczis.
Beth te Wyre kattre Jeſum turreye apmhedye to /
vnde ſplawe aran exkan winge Wayge / vnde ßitte
to ar Durems. Beth te czitte ayßklaye to / vnde
ßitte tham exkan winge Wayge / ßawiſke te Kalpe /
vnde ßatcy / Szacke mums Chriſte / kas tas gir /
kas thöw ßitte ? Vnde doudtcze czitte Szaimoſchenne
/ ßatcy the prettibe to.
Beth tan Rytan / ßagaye wueſſe Auxtebaſnitczekunge
/ Raxtmaetczetaye / vnde Weetczake tho
Louſcho / vnd te wueſſe Runnekunge / vnde thurrey
wenes Runnes pär Jeſum / ka the to nokouthe / vnd
wedde to auxkam prexkan ßouwems Runnes kungems
/ vnde ßatcy : Es tu Chriſtus ? Szacke
mums / Beth thas ßatcy vs tems : Szacke es to
yums / tad nhe titczeeth yuus / Beth youtaye es
yums / tad nhe adbildeth yuus man / vnde nhe laideth
man tomher ßwabbade. Tapeetcz no ſcho Layke
ßeedees tha Czilwheke Dhels / py to labbe Roke /
tho Dewe Speeke. Tad ßatcy the wueſſe/ Eße tu
tad Dewe Dhels ? Thas ßatcy vs tims / juus ßacketh
/ aeſto es eſme. Beth the ßatcy / kas wayage
mums wayrackwyrack Ledtczibe ? Mhes eſſem paſſche czirdeiſche
aran winge Mutte.
VNde ta wueſſe kopa czeeles auxkam / vnde ßaßeye
Jeſum / wedde to prexkan Caipha / prexkan
to Szodibe Namme / vnde nodoeuwe to
tham Semmeßoyam Pontio Pilato/ vnde tas
by whel aggre.
Kad to Judas / kas to pewylis by / redtczey / ka
thas paſſuddenatcz / by tay Nawe / by tas tham ßeele /
vnde atneſſe tös triſdeſmette Szueddrabe koußes
tems Auxtebaſnitczekungems vnde tems Weetczakems
atkal / vnde ßatcy : Es eſme loune darrys / ka
es neenoßeguſſche Aſſenne pewylis eſme. Te ßatcye /
ko pe edth / tas mums ? Tu peluko tho. Vnde thas
mhette tös Szuddrabe koußes exkan to Baſnitcze /
gaya no turrenes noſth / vnd packarees ßöw pattim /
vnd gir wueddon puſſche ſpradtczis / vnde gir ßouwe
Exſche jſkrattis.
Beth te Auxtebaſnitczekunge yeme tös ßuddrabbe
koußes /vñ ßatcy tas nhe der / ka mhes tös exkan
to Dewe ſkirſte dodam / aeſto ta gir aſſenne Nouda.
Beth the thurrey wenas Runnas / vnde pirke
par tems Szuddrabbe koußems / par to neetaiſnige
Alge wene Podeneke tyrumme par aprackſchenne /
thös ßweſſchenekes. Vnde tas gir ßinnams tappis /
wueſſems kattre exkan Jeruſalem cziwo / tha / ka tas
pattz Tyrums / dhewetcz thope / vs Judiſke wallode /
Hakeldama / tas gir /wens Aſſenne tyrums / Js ſcho
patte dene. Tha gir pepueldytcz / katters tur ßatcytcz
gir / czour to Prophete Jeremiã / lydtcz ka thas
ßacke / the gir yemuſſche triſdeſmette Szueddrabe
koußes / ar kattre thas pärdodtcz vnd nomackßatcz
tappe / kattre the pirke / no tems Beernems Jſrael /
vnde gir thös doeuwuſſche par wene Podeneke tyrumme
kha man tas Kunx pawheleis gir.
Beth te Judde loudis nhe gaye exkan to Szodibenamme
ka the neeſkyſte nhe thapte / beth to Leledene
yeere ehſt warreeth. Tad gaye Pilatus py
tims aran / vnde ßatcy : Kade Szuudczibe atneßeth
yuus prettibe ſcho Czilwheke ? The adbildey vnde
ßatcy vs tho / Nhe buuthe ſchis newens Loune darritays
/ mhes neebutem to thöw nodoeuwuſſche
Tad ßatcy Pilatus vs tims / tad yemmeth yuus to
vnde ßoddigeth to peetcz yuuſe Boußle : Tad ßatcy
te Judde loudis vs tho / Mhes needriſtam neewene
nokouth. Ka pepueldytcz thapte tas Wärdtcz
Jeſu / kattre thas ßatcy / kad thas Jſlicke / kade Nawe
tam muerth by.
Tad eßake te Auxtebaſnitczekunge vnde te Whetczake
to lote apßuudtczeet / vnde ßatcy / Scho attrodam
mhes ka thas thös Loudes nogreſche / vnde
ayſledtcze to Muyte tam Keyſeram nhe doth. Vnd
ßack / ka thas gir Chriſtus / wens Köninx. Tad
gaya Pilatus atkal tur exkan to Szodibenamme /
vnde ſoutce Jeſum / vnde youtaye tham / vnde ßatcy :
Eße tu to Juddelouſche Köninx ? Jeſus ſtaweye
prexkan tho / vnde adbildey / treſtu to no thöw pattim
/ ieb gir thöw czitte no man ßatcyſche.
Pilatus adbildey / Eſme es wens Judtcz ? Touwe
/ loudys vnde te Auxtebaſnitczekunge gir thöw
man nodoeuwuſſche / ko ehſſe tu darrys ? Jeſus
adbildey : Manna Walſtibe nhe gir no ſchäs Paſſoules
/ buuthe manna Walſtibe no ſchäs Paſſoules
buewis / manne Szullaine pär to Czyxteete ka es
tems Judde loudems nhe tapte nodootcz / Beth nu
nhe gir manna Walſtibe no ſchäs Paſſoules. Tad
ßatcy Pilatus vs to / tad eſ tueſtu tomher wens Köninx
? Jeſus adbildey / tu ßack to / Es eſme Jo wens
Köninx Es eſme vs to peczimmis vnde exkanexan ſcho
Paſſoule nätcis / ka man to tayſnibe abledtczenath
buus. Kas aran Taiſnibe gir/ tas czirde manne
Balexne. Pilatus ßatcy vs tho / kas gir Taiſnibe ?
Vnde kad tas to ßatcys by / gaya thas atkal
aran py tems Juddeloudems / vnd ßatcy vs tems.
Es nhe attrome nhe wene Wayne py to. Vnde kad
thas apſuudtczetz thappe no tims Auxtims baſnitczekungims
/ vnde Whetczakims / nhe adbildeye thas
neeneke. Pilatus youtay tam whel wenkärth / vnde
ßatcy : Nee adbilde tu neeneke ? Rouge / ka warrenne
te thöw apſuudtcze / nhe czirde tu ? Vnde thas
Neeadbildey tham vs nhe wene Wärde / lydtcz tha /
ka ßöw arridtczan tas Semmeßoge lothe Jßabrinoyas.
Beth te nhe nomitteyas / vnde ßatcy / thas gir
thös Loudes pär treßeis / ar tho / kur thas macys
gir / ſchurp vnde thurp exkan wueſſe Judde ſemme /
vnde gir exkan Galilea eßatcys Js ſcho wete.
Beth kad Pilatus Galileam czirdey / Joutaye
thas jeb thas aran Galilea by / vnd kad thas nomanny
/ ka thas apeſkan Herodes walſtiibe pederrey /
ſuuty thas to py Herodes / katters exkan tims pattims
denims arridtczan exkan Jeruſalem bye
Beth kad Herodes Jeſum redtczeye / tappe thas
lothe lyxmis / aeſto thas gribbeye tho Jow ßenne labprate
redtczeeth / aeſto thas by doudtcze no to czirdeys
/ vnde czeereye / ka thas wene Szime no to redtczeete
/ vnde thas Joutaye tham daſſchades lethes.
Beth thas nhe adbildeye tham neeneke. Beth te
Auxtebaſnitczekunge vnde Raxtmacetaye ſtawey
vnde apßuudtczeye to lothe warrenne. Beth Herodes
ar ßouwe Muyße ßayme Szaimoye vnde apmhedye
to / apwilke tham wene balte Dreebe / vnde
ßuuty to atkal vs Pilato. Vs to dene tappe Pilatus
vnd Herodes drouge atkal kopan / aeſto paprexke by
the ſtarpan ßöw Enaydeneke.
Beth Pilatus ßoutce tös Auxtebaſnitczekunges
vnde Wuerßenekes / vnde tös Loudes wenan
kopan / vnd ßatcy vs tims : Juus eſſet ſcho Czilweke
py man atwedduſſche / kha wene / katters tös Loudes
nogreſche / vnd rouget / es eſme to Jſklouſis / vnd
nhe attrome / py to Czilwheke / no to Waine / ar kattre
yuus to apßuudtczath / nedtcz arridtczan Herodes
/ aeſto es eſme tho py yums ßutys / vnde rougeth
te nhe gir neeneke warreyſche par to ßuudtczeth /
ka thas to Nawe pelnis gir / Tapeetcz grib es to
pammacyth / vnde to ßwabbade laiſth.
Beth vs to Leledene Sweetke / bye tham Semmeßoyam
peetcz tho Eraddumme / tems Loudems
wene guuſtite ßwabbade doth / kattre the gribbey.
Beth tham by than laykan / wens Czetuman /
tas by lothe apkudenätcz / ar wärde / wens lounedarritays
vnd Szlepkous / tas dhewe Barrabas /
katters ar tims Lounedarritayems by exkan to
Czetumme emeeſtcz / katters exkan Dumpe / kattre
exkan tho Pille noticke / wene Szlepkouwibe darrys
by. Vnde te Loudis gaya auxkam vnde luudtcz / ka
thas darrithe / kha thas eraddys by. Vnde kad the
ßagaiuſſche by / adbildey Pilatus / jums gir wens
Eraddums / ka es yums vs leledene wene ßwabbade
domo ? kattre gribbeth yuus / ka es yums ßwabbade
domo ? Barrabam / jeb Jeſum to Köninge tho
Judde louſcho / kattre the Chriſtum Dhewe ? Aeſto
thas ßinnaye ganne / ka to te Auxtebaſnitczekunge
aran Enidybe nodoeuwuſſchenodoeuwuſlche bye.
Vnde kad thas vs tho Szodibe Kreeßele ßedeye
ßuutye winge Gaſpaſſche py to / vnd licke tham ßatcyth.
Töw nhe buus neeneke darryth ar ſcho Tayſnige
/ Es eſme ſchodene doudcze czetuſſe exkan ßapne
/ no winge puſſes.
Beth te Auxtebaſnitczekunge / vnde te Whetczake
pär treßeye vnde ßayudyeßakudye tös loudes / ka tems
pär Barrabam luuckt bye / vnde Jeſum nokoute.
Tad adbildey thas Semmeßoge / vnd ßatcy vs
tims / kattre gribbeth yuus no ſchims duewims kattre
es yums ßwabbade buhs doth ? Tad breedtcze
ta wueſſe Kopa / vnd ſatcy / Noſth ar ſcho / vnde dode
mums Barrabam ßwabbade. Tad ßoutce Pilatus
whel wene kärth vs tims / vnde gribbeye Jeſum
ßwabbade layſt / vnde ßatcy : ko buus man tad darrith
ar Jeſu / katters Chriſtus Dehwe ? Te breedtcze
whel wairack / ßitte to kruſtan/ ßitte to kruſtan.
Beth thas ßatcy treſſchan kärtan / ko gir thas tad
loune darrys ? Es nhe attrome nhe wene Waine
täs Nawes py tho / tapeetcz grib es to pammacyt /
vnd ßwabbade layſth. Beth te bredtcze whel wayrack
/ vnde ßatcy : ßitte to kruſtan. Vnde the ſpede to
lote ar lele breeckſchenne / vnde gribbeye ka tas kruſtan
ßiſtz thaptethaptc / Vnde winge / vnde tho Auxtebaſnitczekunge
breeckſchenne yeme vs warreeſchenne.
Tad yeme Pilatus Jeſum vnde ſchoute to / beth
te Karyekalpe tha Semmeßoges / wedde to exkan to
Szodibe namme / vnde ßoutce kopan / to wueſſe kope /
vnde wilke to aran / vnde licke tham wene darge
Szide Mhetelle apkärth / vnde pinne wene Krone
no Ehrſchims / vnd licke tho tam vs winge Galwe /
vnde doeuwe tham wene Nedre exkan winge labbe
Roke / vnd lotczye tös czeels preſchan to / vnd apmhedye
to / vnde eßake to Szummenath / vnde ßatcy
Dews ßummena thöw / tu myleis Köninx to Judde.
Vnde ßitte tham exkan Wayge vnde vs ſplawe to /
vnde yeme tho Nedre / vnde ßitte ar to winge Galwe /
vnde kritte vs tems Czellems / vnde peluudtcze to.
Tad gaya Pilatus atkal aran / vnde ßatcy vs
tims / Rougeth es jſwedde to py yums arã / ka yuus
adßiſteth / ka es nhe wene Waine py to attrome.
Ta gaya Jeſus aran / vnde neſſe wene Eherſke krone
/ vnde wene Sydedrebe. Vnde thas ßatcy vs
tims / Rougeth / kätz Czilwhex. Kad to te Auxtebaſnitczekunge
vnde te Szullaine redtczey / breedtcze
the vnde ßatcy : ßitte to kruſtan Pilatus treß vs
tims / yemmeth yuus to / vnde ßitteth to kruſtan /
aeſto es nhe attrome nhe wene Wayne py to. Te
Judde adbildey tam / mums gir wens Boußlis
vnd peetcz to Boußle buus tam muerth / aeſto thas
gir ßöw pattim par Dewe Dhele darrys.
Kad Pilatus to wärde czirdeye / Jßabias
thas ßöw / whel wairack / vnde gaya atkal tur exkan
/ exkan to Szodibe Namme / vnde ßack vs Jeſu /
no kurrenes eſ tueſtu ? Beth Jeſus nhe adbildey tam neeneke.
Tad ßatcy Pilatus vs to/ Nhe treß tu neeneke
ar man / neeßin tu / ka man walle gir thöw
Kruſtan ßiſt / vnde walle gir thöw ßwabbade doth ?
Jeſus adbildey : Thöw nhe buuthe neewene warre
pär man / kad ta thöw nhe buuthe nonu auxſchas dota /
Tapeetcz katters man thöw nodoeuwis gir / tam
gir lelake Greeke. No to layke gadaye PilatusPilaus
peetcz to ka thas tho ßwabbade laiſte. Beth te Judde
loudis breedtcze vnde ßatcy / Laidys tu ſcho
ßwabbade / tad nhe ehße tu tha Keyſerre drouxdrouxa / aeſtoeſto /
kas ßöw par wene Köninge darre / tas gir prettibe
to Keyſerre.
Kad Pilatus to wärde czirdey / whedde thas
Jeſum aran / vnde ßedas ßöw vs to Szodibe kreeßle
/ exkan to wete / kattra dhewe ta Auxtaweta / vnde
vs Juddiſke Gabbata. Beth ta by ta ßataiſama
dena täs leledenes / apkärth to Szeſte ſtunde / vnde
thas ßatcy vs tems Judde loudems / Rougeth / tas
gir yuße Köninx. Beth the breetcze / Nöſth / nöſth /
ar ſcho / ßitte to kruſtan. Pilatus ßack vs tims /
buus man yuſſe Köninge kruſtan ßiſt ? Te Auxtebaſnitczekunge
adbildey / mums nhe gir neewens
köninx / ka wen tas Keyſers.
Beth kad Pilatus redtceye / ka thas neeneke
warreye darryth / Beth ka tur wairack wene lelake
dumpis neetapte / Domaye thas thems Loudems
Jſtickt / vnde noßodyt ka winge LuuckſchenneLunckſchenne notickte
/ yeme Vdenne / vnde maſgaye täs Rokas prexkan
thems Loudems vnde ßatcy / Es eſme neenoßedtczyx
py ſcho Aſſenne tha Tayſne/ pelukoyeht
yuus to. Tad adbildeye wueſe te Loudis / vnde ßatcy :
Winge Aſſens gir pär mums / vnde pär/ mußems
Beernems.
Tad doeuwe thas to Barrabam ßwabbade / katters
to Dumpe vnde to ßlepkouwibes peetcz / exkan
to Czetumme emheſtcz by / pär kattre the luudtcze.
Beth Jeſum ßa ſchouſte / vnde apmhedite nodouwe
thas exkan winge gribbeſchenne / ka thas kruſtan
ßiſtz tapte.
TAd yeme te Karyekalpe Jeſum / vnde jſwilke
tham to Sydedrebe vnde apwilke tham winge
paſſche drebe / vnde js whedde to / ka the to kruſtan
ßiſte / vnd tham by ßouwe pattepatke kruſte neſt.
Vnde exkan to kad the tur aran gaye / attradde the
wene Czilwheke / katters tur ſetczenne gaya / no Kyrene
ar wärde Simon / katters no to louke nätce /
katters wens Thews by Alexandri vnd Ruffi to
ſpede the / ka tham winge kruſte neſt bye / vnd the licke
to kruſte vs to / ka thas to Jeſum peetcz neſte.
Beth tham ſtaygaya peetcz wena lela kopa
Loudes / vnde Szewes / te abßeeloyas vnde aproudaye
to. Beth Jeſus greſhes ßöw apkärth vs tems
vnde ßatcy : Juus Meytes no Jeruſalem nhe roudeth
pär man / Beth roudeth pär yums pattems /
vnde pär yuuſe Beernems. Aeſto rougeth / thas
layx nätczys / exkan kattre the ßatcys / Sweete gir te
Neeauglige / vnd thäs Meßes / kattre nhe peczimmuſſche
gir / vnd thäs krutes / kattre Neeßidamme
buewuſſche gir. Aeſto tad the eſatcys ßatcyth vs
tems Kalnems / Kryttet vs mums vnde vs tems
maßems kalnems / apklayet mums. Aeſto Ja te nu
to darre / py to Szalye koke/ kas grib tad py to
Szackaltuſſche notickt ?
Beth tur tappe arridtczanarridtczau noweſte doeuwe
czitte Lounedarritaye / ka the ar tho nokoute tapte.
Vnde the wedde to py to Wete / kattra Dhewe vs
Judde wallode Golgatha / tas gir vs muße Wallode
/ tas Karrattekalns / vnd the doeuwe tham Eticke /
ar Myrrhen exkan Wyne ſczeerth / ar Sulckte
Szamaißite. Vnde kad thas to boudy / nhe gribbey
thas ſczerdth. Vnde the ßitte to Kruſtan / py to wete
Golgata / vnde duewe Lounedarritayes to /
wene py to labbe Roke / vnd wene py to kreyße Roke.
Beth Jeſum tur wueddon. Vnde tas Raxtcz
gir pepueldytcz / katters ßacke. Tas gir ſtarpan
tems Lounedarritayems lagadytcz. Vnd ta by ta
treſſche Stunde / kad the to Kruſtan ßitte. Beth
Jeſus ßatcy.
Thews pammethyammeth to tims aeſto the
nhe ſzin ko the darre : Beth Pilatus raxty wene
Wuerße raxte / tur by exkan raxtytcz / ta Wayne
winges Nawes / vnde kade Wayne the tham doeuwe
/ vnde licke tho wuerßon to Kruſte / wuerßon py
winge galwe. Beth tur by tha raxtytcz Jeſus no
Nazareth tho Judde Köninx. Scho
Wuerßeraxte laßy doudtcze Judde loudis / aeſto ta
Wete by thuwe py tho Pille kur Jeſus kruſtan
ßyſtcz by / Vnde tas by raxtytcz / vs Juddiſke / Grekiſke
/ vnde vs Latiniſke wallode. Tad ßatcy te AuxtebaſnitczekungeAuxtebanitczekunge
to Judde vs Pilatum / Nhe raxte /
tho Judde Köninge / BethBeh ka thas ßatcys gir / Es
eſme tho Judde Köninx. Pilatus adbildeye / ko es
raxtys eſme / to eſme es raxtys.
Te Karye kalpe / kad te Jeſum kruſtan ßittuſſche
by / yeme the winges Drebes / vnde darrye czettres
dalles / Jckwenam Karyekalpan wene dalle / vnde
arridtczan tös Szwärkes. Beth te Szwarke by
neeſchute / vnd by no wuerße auſte czour vnde czour.
Tad ßatcy the ſtarpan ßöw / Nelaideth mums tös
ßagreſth / beth par tems kouletes kam the pederrees /
Ka tas Raxtcz tapte pepueldytcz / katters ßack / the
gir mannes Drebes ſtarpan ßöw dalliſche vnde gir
pär mannems Szwärkems kouleſches / Vnde ßeedey
/ tur vnde paßargaye to. To darrye te Karyekalpe
/ vnde te loudis ſthaweye vnde peluuckoye.
Beth tur ſtaweye py to kruſte Jeſu winge Mathe
/ vnd winge Mathes Maßa Maria Cleophas
gaſpaſſche / vnde Maria Magdalena kad nu Jeſus
ßouwe Mathe redtczeye / vnde tho Macekle tur
kläth ſtawote / kattre thas myle turreye / ßack thas
vs ßouwe Mathe :
Szewe rouge tas gir touws Dhels.
Peetcz to ſzack thas vs to Maetcekle.
Rouge ta gir touwa Mathe : Vnde no to
patte Stunde / yeme tas Maceklis to py ßöw.
Beth te kattre ſetczen gaye / ßaimoye to / vnde
krattye ßouwes Galwes / vnde ßatcy Phy thöw ka
kräßene ßalouße tu to Baſnitcze / vnde vs tayſe to
exkan trims Denims atkal / pallidtcze thöw nu pattim.
Eſ tuEſtu Dewe Dhels / tad kape ſemmen no to
kruſte. Ta lydtcz apmhedye to arridtczan te Auxtebaſnitczekunge
ſtarpan ßöw ar tims Raxtmacetayems
/ vnde Whetczakems ar tims Loudims / vnde
ßatcy : Tas gir czittems Loudems pallydtczeys /
vnde neewar ßöw pattim pallydtczeth / Gir thas
Chriſtus tas Köninx Jſrael / tas Dewe Jsredtſhetcz
/ Tad pallidtcze thas ßöw pattim / vnde nokape
no to kruſte / ka mhes to redtczam / vnd tham tytczam.
Thas gir Dewam titczeys / tas peſty to nu / tyke tas
tham / aeſto thas gir ßatcys / es eſme Dewe Dhels.
Ta lydtcz ßaimoye to arridtzan te Szlepkouwe /
kattre ar to kruſtan ßiſte by. Arridtczan apmhedy
to te Karyekalpe / gaye py tho / vnde neſſe tham
Etick vnde ßatcy : Eſſe tu tho Judde Köninx / tad
pallydtcz thöw pattim.
Beth wens no tems Loune darrytayems / kattre
pa kaarte by / ßaimoyeßaimyeo to / vnd ßatcy : es tu
Chriſtus
thad pallidtcze thöw / vnde mums arridtczan. Tad
adbildeye tas Oters / ßodye to / vnde ßatcy : vnde tu
nhe byſtes thöw arridtczan prexkan Dewe / katters
tu lydtczige exkan to paſſuddenaſchenne eße / Vnde
pattheſe mhes eſſem teſcham tur exkan / aeſto mhes
dabbuyam / ko mhes pelniſche ehſſem / Beth ſchis gir
neeneke loune darrys / vnde ßatcy vs Jeſu / Kunx
pemin mannis / kad tu exkan touwe walſtibe näxnaäx.
Vnde Jeſus ßatcy vs tho :
Patteſe es ſzacke thöw / Schodene
buus thöw ar man exkan tho Paradyſe
buuth. Vnde apkärth to ßeſte Stunde / tappe
wena Tumſſiba pär to wueſſe Semme js to doeuwite
Stunde / vnde ta Soule paßuudde ßouwe Spidumme.
Vnde apkärth to doeuwite Stunde / ßoudtcze
Jeſus ſkannyge vnde ßatcy
ELI, ELI, LA-
MA ASABTHANI?
Tas gir vs muße Wallode
ßatcytcz :
Mans Dews / mans Dews / kapeetcz
ehſſe tu man atſtays ? Beth te czitte /
kattre tur ſtawey / kad the to czirdey / ßatcy the / tas
ßoutcz Eliam. Peetcz to / kad Jeſus ßynnaye ka
wueſſe lethe Jow pabeickte by / ka thas Raxtcz pepueldytcz
tapte / ßatcy thas.
Man twyxt : Tad ſtawey tur wens Troux
puelns Etticke / vnde tudelin tetczey wens no tims /
yeme wene Schwamme / vnd pueldy to ar Ecke
vnde Jſop / vnde dure to vs wene Nedre / vnd thurreye
to tam py to Mutte / vnde ſczirdye to / vnde ßatcy ar
tims czittims / Layd redtczeeth /Ja Elias nake / vnde
to ſemmen no yem. Kad nu Jeſus to Eticke / py ßöw
yemis by / ßattcy tas :
Tas gir pepueldytcz. Vnde thas ßoucze
whel wene kärth ſkannige vnd ßattcy :
Thews / es pawhel manne Garre
exkan touwe Roke : Vnde kad thas to ßatcys
by / nokäre thas to Galwe vnd noſkyre.
Vnd rouge tas preſchekaryams Autcz exkan
to Baſnitcze ßapliſe exkan duewims gabbolims / no
Auxtenes js tho Semme / vnde ta Semme tryſeye /
vnde te Ackmennes ßapliſe / vnde te Muerrunne
kappes atthweres ßöw / vnde doudtcze tös Sweetes /
kattre ayſmigguſſche by czeelhes auxkam / vnde gaye
aran tems Kappems / peetcz winge auxkam czelſchenne
/ vnde nätcze exkan to ſweete Pille / vnd paradyas
doudtczems.
Beth tas Galwenex / katters tur kläth ſtaweye /
tur prettibe Jeſum / vnde kattre py to by / vnde ßargaya
Jeſum / kad the redtczey / ka thas ar thade ßouckſchenne
noſkyre/ vnde redtczeye to Semme tryſſßeſchenne
/ vnde kas tur noticke / Jßabyas the lothe /
vnde patteitcze Dewe / vnde ßatcy : Patteſe / Schis
gir wens labs czilwhex buewis / vnde Dewe Dhels.
Vnde wueſſe te Loudes / kattre tur kläth ſtawey /
vnde lukoyas / kad the redtczey / kas tur noticke / ßitte
the py ßouwe kruthe / vnde greſhes atkal apkärth.
Beth wueſſe winge paſſiſtamme ſtawey no thalenes
/ vnde doudtcze Szewes / kattre tam aran Galilea
by no thalenesthalens peetcz ſtaygaiſche / vnde redtczeye
to wueſſe / ſtarpan kattrems by Maria Magdalena
/ vnde Maria tha maßako Jacobs / vnde Joſephs
Mathe / vnde Salome / ta Mathe Zebedei / kattre
tham arridtczan by peetcz ſtaygaiſche / kad thas exkan
Galilea by / vnde tham kalpuyſche / vnde doudtcze
czitte / kattre ar to tur vs Jeruſalem gayuſche by.
Beth te Judde loudis / peetcz to / ka ta / ta ßattyßamme
dene by / ka ta Meße Chriſti py to kruſte
neepallickte / pär to leledene Sweetke (aeſto ta patte
leledene Sweedene by lela) luudtcze the Pilatum /
ka winge lele louſte / vnde noyempte tapte. Tad
nätcze te Karyekalpe / vnde louſe tam pirmoyam
tös Lelees / vnde tam Otram / katters ar to kruſtan
ßiſtz by. Beth kad the py Jeſu nätcze / kad the redtczey
/ ka thas yow nomuerris by / nhelouße the tham
tös Lelees. Beth wens no tims karye Szullainims
/ atwhere tam winge Szane / ar wene Skeepe /
vnde tudelin tetczeye tur Aſſens vnde Vdens aran.
Vnde kas to redtczeys gir / tas gir to apledtczenays
/ vnde winge ledtczibe gir teſcham / vnde thas
patcz ßin / ka thas teſcham ßack / aeſto ka yuus arridtczã
titczeth. Aeſto tas gir notitczis / ka tas RaxtczRaxt
pepueldytcz
tapte. Jums nhe buuſe neewene koule
ßalouſth. Vnd whel wenkärth treß wens czitcz / the
redtczes exkan kattre the duruſſche gir.
Peetcz to tan Wackaran / ka tha / ta Szatayßamme
dene by / kattra gir ta paprexke Sweedene / Nätcze
Joſeph no Aramathia thäs Judde Pillis / wens
bagatcz / Wyrs wens godyx Rateſkunx / wens labs
rames Wyrs katters neeby neewene paddome doeuwis
exkan winge Runne / katters arridtczan vs
Dewe walſtibe gaydie / aeſto / thas by wens Maetczeklis
Jeſu / beth paßleppen no Jsbyſchenne prexkan
tems Judde loudems / tas edroſchenayas vnde
gaye py Pilato / vnde luudcze / ka thas to Nomuerruſſche
Meße Jeſu warreete noyempt.
Beth Pilatus Jßabrinoyas ßöw / ka thas yow
nomuerris by / vnde ßoudtcze to Galwheneke / vnd
Joutay tham / Ja thas ßen nomuerris by / vnde kad
thas no to Galwheneke ßayuttis by / doeuwe thas
Joſeph to Meße Jeſu / vnde pawheleye / ka tems by
to tam dothe. Vnde Joſeph pirke Linne wadmalle.
Beth tur nätcze arridtczan Nicodemus / katters
paprexke py tho Nackte / py Jeſu nätczis by / vnde
atneße Mirrhen vnde Aloen py ßumpte maertczinge.
Thad yeme the to Meße Jeſu / katters noyemptcz
by no to kruſte / vnde tinne to exkan wene ſkyſte Linne
wadmalle / vnd ßeeye tham wene Lynne pallage / ar
kräßenims Salims / kha the Judde loudis eradduſſche
by ßouwes Muerrones aprackt.
Beth tur by py to wete kur thas kruſtan ßiſtzßitz
tappe / wens Därſis / vnde exkan to Därſe by wens
kaps / tas by JoſephsJoſehps kaps / kattre thas by
lidtczis
czirſt exkan wene Ackmenne / exkan kattre wehl neewenkärth
kaſlabban elicktz bys / tur patte licke the
to / ka ta leledene Sweetke adgayuſſe by / vnde thas
Jeſum / pär to Szatayßamme dene tho Judde peetcz
kaps tur tuwe kläth by / vnde ayſwhele wene lele Ackmenne
/ prexkan to kappe durwe vnd gaye tur noſth.
Beth tur by Maria Magdalena / vnde Maria
Joſephs / te paßeedas ßöw prettibe tho kappe /
arridtczan czittes Szewes / kattre Jeſum by peetcz
ſtaygaiſche no Galilea / lukoyas / kurpu / vnde ka
winge Meße nolickta thappe. Beth the greſhes
apkärth / vnde ßattayſye täs Sales vnde Salwes
vnde pär to ſweedene by the kluſſe / peetc to Dewe
Boußle.
Than otran denan/ kattra nätcze / peetcz tho
Szattaißamme dene / nätcze te Auxtebaſnitczekunge
vnde Phariſeer wenlydtczige py Pilato / vnde
ßatcye / Kunx mhes ſinnam / ka ſchis No weddetays
ßatcy / kad thas whel cziwoye. Es grib peetcz
trims denims atkal auxkam czelthes. Tapeetcz
pawhel / ka tas kaps paßargätcz thope / Js to treſſche
dene / aeſto / ka winge Maetcekle nhe nake / vnde
ßoge tho / vnde ßacke vs tems Loudems / thas gir atkal
auxkã czeles no tims Muerronims / vnde ta peedige
Wiltibe thope lounake / nhe ka ta pirmaka. Pilatus
ßatcy vs tims Tur gir yums the Szarge /
eyeth vnde Szargat to / ka yuus ßinneth. The
nogaye vnd paßargaye to kappe ar
Szargims vnde apßimoyeapßimoyeto to
Ackmenne.
Ende der Hiſtorien des Leidens Chriſti.
Vndeudſche Euan-
gelia vnd Epiſteln / von Oſtern
an bis auffs Aduent.
Gedruckt zu Königsperg
bey Georgen Oſterbergern.
Anno
M. D. LXXXVII.
Die Epiſtel am heiligen Oſter-
tage / 1. Corinth. 5.
JVuſe leloſchenne nhe gir labba nheſinneth
yuus / ka wens mas Roux / tho wueſſe mykle
ßarouczey. Tapeetcz Jſmheſet to wetcze
rouge / ka Juus wena youna mykla eſſet / lydtcz kha
yuus neeroudtczeete eſſet. Aeſto mums gir arridtczan
wens leledeneyeers / tas gir Chriſtus / par
mums vppereetcz. Tapeetcz laidet mums leledene
thurreet / nhe exkan weetcze Rougu / nedtcz arridtczan
exkan Rougu täs lounibes vnde bleedibes / beth
exkan tho ßalde mykle täs tyribes vnde teſnibes.
Euangelium am heiligen Oſter-
tage / Marci am 16. Cap.
VNde kad ta leledene ſweeta ßetczen by / pirka
Maria Magdalena / vnde Maria Jacobi
vnde Salome / darges ſales / ka the näckte /
vnde ſwaiditeſwazdite to. Vnde the nätce py tho kappe / vs
wene ſweedene lothe aggre / kad ta Soule vs gaya /
vnde the treſſeey ßouwan ſtarpan / kas nowhel
mums to ackmenne no tho kappe durwe ? Vnde the
nomannye / ka tas Ackmens nowheldtcz by / aeſto
tas by warren lels.
Vnde the gaya tur exkan to Kappe / vnd redtczey
wene joune puyſe / py tho labbe roke ſeedamme /
tas by ar wene garye balte dreebe apteerptz / vnde the
Jßabias ßöw. Beth tas ßatcy vs tems / nhe Jßabyates
yums / yuus meckleeyet Jeſum no Nazareth
to kruſtan ßiſte / tas gir auxkam czeles / vnde nhe gir
ſcheit. Rougeth tur / to wete / kur te to no licke.
Beth noeyget / vnd ßacketh tho winge Maetceklims /
vnde Petro / ka tas prexkan yums no eſe exkan Galilea
/ tur yuus to redtczeeſeeth / kha thas yums ßatcys
gir.
Vnde te Jſgaye pepeeſche aran / vnde bhedtcze
no tho kappe / aeſto tims by wena drebbeſchenne vnd
jſſzabyaſchennejſſza byaſchenne vs nakuſſe / vnde nhe ßatcye neewenam
neeneke / aeſto the jßabyas ßöw.
Die Epiſtel am Oſtermontage /
Actorum 10. Cap.
BEth Petrus atwehre ßouwe Mutte / vnde ßatcy
/ Nu ßayute es to teſcham / ka Dews tho
czilwheke nhe vs luko : beth exkan wueſſadems
loudems / kattre to byſthas / vnd teſcham dar / tas
tyke tham. Juus ßinneth no tho Maetcybe / kattre
Dews py tems Bernims Jſrael ßutis gir / vnde
ßluddenath lidtczis to Mere czour Jeſum Chriſtum
(katters tur gir wens Kunx par wuſſe
lethe) katters czour tho wueſſe Judde ſemme notitcis
gir / vnd eſäcktz exkan Galilea peetcz tho Chruſtybe
/ kattre Johannes maetcye / ka Dews to patte
Jeſum no Nazareth / ſwaidis gir / ar to ſweete Garre
vnde tho ſpeeke / katters apkärth ſtaigais gir / vnde
gir labbedarris vnde weeſſelle darrys / wueſſe / kattre
no Whelne pärwarreethe bye. Aeſto Dews by ar
to. Vnde mhes eſſem Ledtczeneke wueſſe to / ko tas
darris gir exkan Judde ſemme / vnde exkan Jeruſalem.
To gir the nokouwuſſche / vnde py wene koke
pakaruſſche.
To patte gir Dews vſmodenays / than treſſchan
denan / vnde to lidtczis ßinnamme tapth / nhe wueſſems
loudems / beth mums / tims papreſche iſredtczeetims
ledtczenekims no Dewe / kattre mhes ar tho
eduſſche vnd ſczeruſſche eſſem / peetcz to / kha thas
auxkam czeeles gir no tims muerronims. Vnd thas
gir mums Boußlis to maetcyt tems loudems / vnd
Ledtczybe doth / ka thas gir eſtadytz no Dewe / wens
Szoge pär Czywems vnde murronems. No ſcho
dode wueſſe Prophetes ledtczibe / ka czour winge
wärde / wueſſe / kattre exkan to titcz / pammeſchen
thos greekes dabbuth buus.
Euangelium am Oſtermontage /
Luc. 24. cap.
VNde rouge / duewe no tims gaye to patte dene
exkan wene Jelgouwe / ta by no Jeruſalẽ duewe
yuudtcze thalumme / thäs wärdctz dhewey
Emmahus. Vnde the runnaye ſtarpan ßöw / no
wueſſims ſchims noticktims letims. Vnde tas noticke
/ kad the ta runnaye / vnde apyoutayas ßouwan
ſtarpan / ſteytczes ßöw Jeſus py tems / vnde
ſtaigay ar tims. Beth winge atczes tappe thurreete
ka the to nhepaßinne. Beth thas ßatcy vs tems /
kada gyr ta Wallode / kattre yuus ſtarpan yums
runnayath vs to Czelle / vnde eſſet tha noſkummuſſche
? Tad adbildey wens ar wärde Cleophas /
vnde ßatcy vs tho / Eſ tuEſtu wens ſtarpan tems Sweſſchennekems
exkan Jeruſalem / katters nhe ßin / kas
exkan ſchims denims tur exkan notitczis gir ? Vnd
thas ßatcy vs tems / kas ? Beth te ßatcy vs tho / tas /
no Jeſu no Nazareth / katters tur by wens Prophetz /
warrens nho darbims vnde wärdims prexkan
Dewe vnde wueſſims loudims / ka to muſſe Auxtebaſnicekunge
vnde wuerſſeneke nodoeuwuſſche gyr /
py noßodiſchennes thäs Nawes / vnde kruſtan czittuſſche.
Beth mhes czerreyam tham by Jſrael
atpeſtyth. Vnde pär to wueſſe / gir ſchodene ta treſſcha
dena / ka ſchade lethes notickuſſche gir. Arridtczan
gir mums Jsbedeiſche czitte no mußims Sewims
/ te gir aggre py tho kappe buewuſſche / vnde
nhe gyr winge Meße attraduſſche / nakenakevnde vnde ßacke /
the gyr wene wayge tho Engel redtczeiſche / katters
tur ßacke / thas cziwo. Vnde czitte no mums no
gaye py thothe kappe / vnde attradde tha / kha thäs Sewes
ßatcy / beth to nhe attradde the.
Vnde thas ßatcy vs tems / O yuus Jecke vnde kutre
no ßirdims py titczeſchenne wueſſe tho / ko the Prophete
ßatcyſche gyr / Nhe by Chriſtum tha ceeſth /
vnde py ßouwe Godibe e eth ? Vnde eſaka no Moſe /
vnde no wueſſims Prophetims / vnde Jslicka tims
wueſſe raxte / kattre no tho ßatcyte by.
Vnd the nätce tuwe prexkan to Jelgouwe / kur
the nogaya / Vnde thas thurreyas ßöw / ka gribbeth
thas whel talacke edth Vnde the luudtcze to / vnde
ßatcy / palledtcz py mums / aeſto tas grib wackars
tapt / vnde ta dene gir pabeickta. Vnde thas gaye
tur exkan / py tims tur pallickt. Vnde tas noticke /
kad tas ar tims py Galde ſeedeey / Jeme thas to
Mayſe / pateitcze / pärlouſe tho vnde doeuwe to
tims. Tad tappe winge Atczes attwherte / vnde paßinne
to. Vnde thas paßudde preſchan tems.
Vnd ßatcy ſtarpan ßöw / nhe dedtcze muſſa
Szyrdtcz exkan mums / kad thas ar mums treſſey
wuerßon tho Czelle / khad thas mums to Raxte attwhere
? Vnde the czeeles auxkam py to patte ſtunde /
greſhes atkal apkaarth vs Jeruſalem / vnde attradde
tös wene paddeſmetteſ kopanpaddeſmetteſkopan ſagayuſſches / vnde
tös kattre py tims by / kattre ßatcy / Tas Kunx gir
teſcham auxkam czeeles / vnde Simoni paradyes.
Vnde the paßatcy tims / kas wuerßon to czelle notitcis
by / vnd ka thas no tims paſſyſtz by / py to / kad
thas tims to Mayſe louſe.
Die Epiſtel am Oſterdinſtage
Acto. 13. cap.
JVus Wyre / mylige Brale / yuus Beerne tha
Radde Abraham / vnde kattre ſtarpan yums
Dewe byſthas. Jums gir tas Wärdtcz
thäs peſtiſchennes ſuutyttz. Aeſto the / kattre exkan
Jeruſalem cziwo / vnde wynge Wuerßeneke / peetcz
to / ka the to nhe paßinne / nedtcz tös Balxnes thös
Prophetes (kattre vs wueſſims Sweedenims laſſite
thope) gyr tös pattes ar ßouwe teſe pepueldiſche.
Vnde ka tomher the newene Wayne thäs Nawes
py to attradde / luudtcze the tomher Pilatum / to nokouth.
Vnd khad the pabeiguſſche by / wueſſe kas
no tho raxtytz gyr / yeme the to no tho koke / vnde
licke tho exkan wene kappe. Beth Dews gir to vs
modenays no tims muerrunnims / vnde thas gir
paradyes doudtcze dene / tims / kattre ar to auxkam
no Galilea vs Jeruſalem gayuſſche by / kattre gir
winge ledtczeneke py thems loudems.
Vnde mhes pasſluddenaiam yums arridtczan to
peßatciſchenne / kattra py muſſems Thewems notitczis
gir / ka tas patz Dews mums / ßouwims
Beernims pepueldys gir. Exkan to / ka thas Jeſum
vs modenais gir.
Euangelium am Oſterdinſtage /
Luc. 24. cap.
BEth kad the no to treßeye / ſtaweye Jeſus patcz
wueddon ſtarpan thems / vnd ßatcy vs tems /
Mers gyr ar yums. Beth the yßabyias ßöw /
vnde ſkytte / the redttzeete wene Garre. Vnde tas
ßatcy vs tems / ka eſſet yuus tha Jßabiuſſche ? Vnde
kapeetcz nake thade domaſchenne exkan yuuſims
Szirdims ? Redtczeth mannes Rokes / vnde mannes
kayes / es eſme thas patz. Touſteth man / vnde lukoyeth
/ aeſto wenam Garram nhe gir Meßa vnde
koule / kha yuus redtczeth / ka man gir. Vnd kad thas
to ßatcy / radye thas tims rokes vnd kayes. Beth kad
the weel nhe titczeye no lyxmibe / vnde ßöw Jßabrinoyas
/ ßatcy thas vs tems gir yums ſcheit
kas yaehde ? Vnde the licke tham wene gabballe
no czepte Suewe vnde Medde prexkan. Vnde thas
yeme to / vnde ehde tho prexkan tems.
Beth thas ßatcy vs tems / te gir te wärde / kattres
es vs yums ßatcy / kad es weel py yums by.
Aeſto tam buus wueſſenotal pepuelditam tapt /
kas no man raxtitcz gir / exkan to Boußle Moſi /
exkan tims Prophetims / vnd exkan tims czeſmims.
Tad attwhere thas tims to ßappraſchenne / ka the to
Raxte ßappratte / vnde ßatcy vs tems. Tha gyr
raxtitcz / vnd tha by Chriſtum czeſt / vñ atkal auxkam
czelt no tims muerronims / py tho treſſche dene / vnde
maetcith tickt / exkan wynge wärde atmitteſchenne /
no loune / vnde pammeſſchenne thös greekes / ſtarpan
wueſſems loudems / vnde eßaackt exkan Jeruſalem.
Die Epiſtel des erſten Sonta-
ges nach Oſtern / 1. Johan. 5.
AEſto wueſſe kas no Dewe peczimpctz gir / tas
pärwar to Paſſoule / vnde muße titczibe gir ta
pärwarreſchenne / kattra to Paſſoule pärwarreys
gir.
Beth kas gir / katters to Paſſoule pärwarre /
ka wene / kas tur titcz / ka Jeſus Dewe Dhels gir ?
Schis gir / katters tur nake / ar Vdenne vnde Aſſenne
/ Jeſus Chriſtus / nhe ar Vdenne wene / beth
ar Vdenne vnd Aſſenne. Vnde tas Gars gir / katters
tur Ledtczybe dode / ka tas Gars teſybe gir.
Aeſto trys gir / kattre tur Ledtczybe dode wuerßon
Semmes / Tas Gars / vnde tas Vdens / vnde tas
Aſſens / vnde te trys gir wenan kopan. Kad mhes
nu to Czilwheke Ledtczybe vs yemmam / thad gir
Dewe Ledtczybe lelake. Aeſto Dewe Ledtczybe gir
ta / ka thas Ledtczybe doeuwis gir no ßouwe Dhele.
Katters exkan to Dewe Dhele titcz / tam gir thada
LedtczybeLedtczzbe py ßöw.
Euangelium des erſten Sontags
nach Oſtern / Johan. 20. cap.
BEth py Wackerre to patte Sweedene kad the
Maetcekle ſagaiuſſche / vnd te durwes ayſleckte
by / No Jßabyſchenne prexkan tems Juddems
nätce Jeſus / vnde ſthawey exkan wuedde / vnde
ßatcy vs tems. Mers gir ar yums. Vnde kad thas to
ßatcy / radye thas tims tas Rokas / vnde ßouwe
Sane. Tad tappe te Maetcekle lyxme / ka the to
Kunge redtczeye. Tad ßatcy Jeſus whel wene kärth
vs tems. Mers gir ar yums. Lydtcz kha man tas
Thews ßutis gir / tha ſuute es yums. Vnde kad thas
to ßatcye / vs puute thas thös / vnde ßatcy vs tems /
Jemmeth to ſweete Garre / kattrems yuus tös
greekes pammeſſeth / tems gir the pammeſte / vnd kattrims
yuus thös patturreeſeth / tims gir the patthurreete.
Beth Thomas wens no tims duewepaddeſmettims
/ katters tur dhewey Dwynis / nhe by py
tems / kad Jeſus nätce. Tad ßatcy te czitte Maetcekle
vs tho / mhes eſſem to Kunge redtczeiſche. Beth
tas ßatcy vs tems / Ja tas ta ne notecke / ka es exkan
winge Rokims / redtczo täs Symes thös Naggles /
vnde leke manne Pirſte exkan winge Sane / neegrib
es to titczeeth.
Vnde pär aſtone denems / by winge Macekle
atkal tur exkan / vnde Thomas ar tims / Jeſus nake /
kad täs durwes aißlecktas by / vnde ſthawey wueddon
tems / vnde ßatcy / Mers gir ar yums / Peetcz to
ßatcy tas vs Thoma / ſtepe touwe pirſte ſchur / vnde
redtcz mannes Rokes / vnde ſtepe touwe Roke ſchur /
vnde ledtcz thös exkan manne Sane / vnde nhe eſſe
netitczyx / beth titczyx. Thomas ßatcy vs tho :
Mans Kunx vnde mans Dews. Jeſus ßatcy vs
tho / peetcz to / ka tu man redtczeys eſſe Thoma / thad
titcztu. Sweete gir the / kattre neeredtcz / vnde tomher
titcz.
Arridtczan darrye Jeſus doudtcze czitte Symes
preſchan ßouwems Maceklems / kattre nhe gir raxtyte
exkanerkan ſcho Gramatte. Beth ſche gir raxtyte / ka
yuus titczeth Jeſus gir Chriſt / tas Dewe Dhels /
vnd ka yums czour to Titczibe / ta cziwoſchenne gir /
exkan winge wärde.
Die Epiſtel am andern Sontage
nach Oſtern / 1. Pet. 2.
AEſto py to eſſeth yuus aitczenate / peetcz to
ka arridtczan Chriſtus czetis gir pär mums /
vnde mums wene preſke Syme atſthays / ka
yums buus peetcz ſtaigath winge kaye peedims.
Katters neewenes greekes darrys gir / arridtczan
gir tur ne wena Wyltybe exkan winge Mutte attraſta
/ katters prettybe nhe lammaya / kad thas
lammatcz tappe / nedtcz droudye / kad thas cethe.
Beth thas no doeuwe to tham / katters tur teſcham
ßode. Katters muſes greekes patz vppereys gir /
py ßouwe Meße / wuerßon to kruſte koke / ka mhes no
tims greekims nomuerruſſche eſſem / vnde tay Taiſnybe
cziwoyam. czour kattre Wathems yuus ſaczedenate
eſſet. Aeſto yuus byet / kha te alloyamme
Auwes / beth yuus eſſet nu atgreſthe / py to Ganne
vnde Pyſkope yuuſes Dwheſelles.
Euangelium am andern Sontage
nach Oſtern Miſericordia / Johan. 10. cap.
ES eſme wens labs Gans / Wens labs Gans
dode ßouwe Cziwibe pär tims Auwims.
Beth wens Szaſſpreſtcz Gans / katters wens
Gans nhe gir / kattram te Auwes pattim nhe peder /
redtcz to Wuelke nakamme / vnde atſtayeaſtaye tös Auwes /
vnde bhege. Vnde thas Wuelx ßagraab vnde Jſbaarſte
tos Auwes. Beth tas Szaſſpreſtcz Gans
bhege / aeſto thas gir wens Szaſſpreſtz Gans / vnde
nhe ola thos Auwes. Es eſme wens labs Gans /
vnde atßiſto tös mannes / vnde eſme paßiſtams
tims mannims. Lydtcz kha man mans Thews
paßyſt / vnde es paßiſto to Thewe / vnde es dome
manne Cziwybe par tims Auwims. Vnde man gir
whel cytte Auwes / te nhe gir aran ſcho kuute / vnde
thös pattes buus man arridtczan ſcheit klathe
neſth / vnde the czirdes manne Balxne. Vnde buus
wena Auwekuutz / vnde wens gans buuth.
Die Epiſtel am dritten Sontage
nach Oſtern / 1. Pet. 2.
MYlige Brale es peminno yums / kha tös
Sweſſchenekes / vnde egathnekes / nothurreetes
/ yums no meßige egribbeſchenne / kattre
prettibe to Dwheſel czinyas / vnde thurret wene labbe
buuſchenne ſtarpan tems Paggane loudems / ka
te / kattre yums aptreſſe / kha no lounedarretayems /
yuuſes labbes darbes redtcz / vnde Dewe teitcz / kad
tas nu py to dene nätczys.
Eſſeth packlouſſige wueſſe czilwhecige raddibe /
tho Kunge peetcz / tas gir tham Köningam / kha /
tham Wuerßenekam / yeb tims Galwenekims / kha
thös Szutites no to / py ßodiſchenne pär tems Lounedarretayems
/ vnd pär Slawe tims labbims.
Aeſto tas gir Dewe prätz / ka yuus ar labbe darriſchenne
aysbaſcheet / to neßapraſſchenne / tims
Jeckigims Czilwhekims / kha tös Swabbaddes /
vnde nhe ka buute yums ta Swabbadibe py apklaſchenne
täs lounibes. Beth kha te Dewe kalpe /
Parradeth yckwenam Gode / Thurret tös Brales
myle / byſtet Dewe / godet to Köninge.
Euangelium am dritten Sontage
nach Oſtern/ Jubila. Johan. 15. cap.
PAer wene maße bryde / thad yuus man nhe
redtczeeſeth / vnde atkal pär wene maße bryde /
tad yuus man redtczeeſeth / aeſto es emo py
Thewe. Tad ßatcy citte no winge Maetceklims
ßouwan ſtarpan / kas gir tas / ka thas vs mums
ßacke pär wene maße bryde / thad yuus man nhe
redtczeeſeth / vnde atkal pär wene maße bryde / thad
yuus man redtczeeſeth / vnde ka es py Thewe emo ?
Tad ßatcy the / kas gir tas ka tas ßack / pär wene
maße bryde ? Mhes neeſinnam / ko tas ßacke. Tad
nomannye Jeſus / ka the tham youthadt gribbey vnd
ßatcy vs tems / Juus abyoutayetes ſtarpan yums
peetcz to / ka es ßatcys eſme / pär wene maſſe bryde /
thad yuus man nhe redtczeeſeth / vnde atkal pär
wene maſſe bryde / thad yuus man redtczeeſeth.
Patteſe / patteſe / es ßack yums / Juus roudaſeeth
vnde kouckſeth / beth ta Paſſoule ßöw preczeſſes.
Beth yuus buuſeeth noſkummuſſche / beth yuuſe noſkumſchenne
buus pär preczybe tapt.
Wena Sewe / kad tha czem thad gir tay noſkumſchenne
/ aeſto winge ſtunde gir nakuſſe. Beth kad
tha to Bherne peczimmuſſe gir / thad nhe pemin
ta wayrs to ſape / thäs lyxmibes peetcz / ka tas
Czilwhex exkan tho Paſſoule peczimptz gir. Vnde
yums gir nu arridtczan noſkumſchenne / Beth es
grib yums atkal redtczeeth / vnde yuuſe Syrdtcz
ßöw lyxmoſes / vnde yuuſe Lyxmibe buus neewenam
no yums yempt. Vnde py to patte dene yuus
man neeneke Jouthaſeth.
Die Epiſtel am vierden Sontage
nach Oſtern oder Cantate / Jacobi 1.
NHe alloyet mylige Brale / wueſſe labbe dawane
/ vnd wueſſe puelnige dawane / nake no auxſches
ſemmen / no tho Thewe thäs Gayßibes /
py kattre gir neewena pärwerſchenne / nedtcz apmetoſchenne
thäs Gayßibes / vnde thäs tumßibes / Thas
gir mums peczimmis peetcz ßouweßouwepraathe praathe/ czour
to wärde thäs teſnibes / ka mhes butem te pirmige
winges raddibes. Tapeetcz mylige Brale / ickwens
Czilwhex gir pepeſſche py czirdeſchennes / beth paleene
py treſſeeſchennes / vnde lhenige py duſmibes /
Aeſto tha Czilwheke duſmibe nhe dar / kas Dewam
paprate gir. Tapeetcz ledtczeth noſth wueſſe neeſkyſtybe
/ vnde lounybe / vnde vs jemmeth to wärde
ar lheenpratibe / katters exkan yums eſtaditz gir /
katters war yuuſes dwheſelles ſweetes darryth.
Euangelium am vierden Sontage
nach Oſtern oder Cantate / Joh. 16. cap.
BEth nu no emo es py tho / kas man ſutis gir /
vnd neewens ſtarpan yums youtha man / kur
tu no eſſe ? Beth peetcz tho / ka es tho vs yums
treſſeys eſme / gir yuuſe Syrdtz puelna noſkumſchenne
tappuſſe. Beth es ßacke yums to teſcham. Tas
yums labbe / ka es no emo. Aeſto khad es nhe no
etho / thad nhe nake tas Eprecetays py yums. Beth
kad es no emo / grib es to py yums ſuutyth. Vnde
kad tas patcz nake / tas to Paſſoule ßodys / pär to
greeke / pär to tayſnibe / vnde pär to Szodibe. Pär
tems Greekems / ka the exkan man nhe titcze. Beth
pär to tayſnibe / ka es py Thewe emo. Vnde yuus
man yoproyam nhe redtczeeſeth. Pär to Szodibe /
ka tas Kunx ſchäs Paſſoules no teſaatz gir.
Man gir yums whel doudtcze yaßacke / beth
yuus nhe warreth taggadine panneſt / Beth kad
wyngs tas Gars täs Teſnibcs nätczys / tas yums
exkan wueſſe tayſnibe waddys. Aeſto thas no ßöw
pattim nhe treßees. Beth ko thas czirdees / to thas
treſſees / vnde kas nakams gir / to thas yums paßludenas.
Tas patcz man apſkaydrees / aeſto no
tho manne thas to yems / vnde yums paßluddenas.
Wueſſe kas tham Thewam gir / tas gir mans / tapeetcz
eſme es ßatcys / tas no tho manne jemps vnde
yums paßluddenas.
Die Epiſtel am fünfften Sontage
nach Oſtern oder Vocem jucundi. Jac. 1. cap.
BEth eſſeth darretaye tha Wärde / vnde nhewen
czirdetaye / ar kattre yuus yums paſſchems
pewilyates. Aeſto khad wens gir wens
czirdetays tha wärde / vnde nhe gir wens darretays /
tas gir lidtcz wenam Wyram / katters ßouwe meßige
Wayge exkan Spegel apluko / aeſto tur peetcz /
kad thas ßöw aplukoyes gir / edth thas tudelin
noſth / vnde ayſmirſth ka thas buewis gir. Beth
kas czour lukoyas exkan to puelnige Boußle täs
Swabbadibes / vnde tur exkan palleck / vnde nhe gir
wens ayſmyrſtams czirdetays / beth wens darretays
/ tas patcz buus ſweetcz exkan ßouwe darbe.
Beth kad ßöw wens ſtarpan yums czerre / thas
kalpo Dewam / vnde nhe tur ßouwe Mhele exkan
Emoute / beth pewille ßouwe Szirde / tha Dewe
kalpoſchenne gir wheltige. Wena ſkyſta vnde neapganite
Dewe kalpoſchenne / prexkan Dewe to
Thewe gir ta / katters Barynes vnde attraites
exkan wingims bhedims pemeckle / vnde ßöw no thäs
paſſoules neeapganite paſſargas.
Euangelium am fünfften Sontage
nach Oſtern oder Voc. jucun. Joh. 16. cap.
PAtteſe / patteſe / es ßackeßackc yums / khad yuus
tham Thewam ko luckßeete exkan manne
Wärde thad thas to yums dhos / Jſ ſchimJſſchim nee
eſſet yuus neeneke luguſſche exkan manne wärde.
Ludtczeeth / thad yuus dabbuſeeth / yuuſe lyxmibe
puelnige gir. Tades lethes eſſeme es vs yums
czour Lydtczibems treſſeys / Beth tas Layx nake / ka
es nhe wayrs czour lydtczibems ar yums treſſeeſcho
/ beth yums ſkaydre paßluddenaſcho no manne
Thewe. Py to patte dene yuus luckßhet exkan
manne wärde Vnde es nhe ßacke yums / ka es to
Thewe par yuus luckth grib / aeſto / tas Thews tur
yums patcz myle / Tapeetcz / ka yuus man myleeth /
vnde titczeeth / ka es no Dewe Jſgays eſme : Es
eſme no Thewe Jſgays / vnde nätczis exkan to Paſſoule
/ atkal atſthayo es to Paſſoule / vnde emo py
Thewe.
Wynge Macekle ßack vs to / Rouge / nu treſtu
ſkaydre aran / vnde ßack neewene Lydtczybe / Nu ßinnam
mhes / ka tu wueſſes lethes ßin / vnde nhe gir
wayage / ka thöw kaſlabban joutha. Tapeetcz titczam
mhes / ka tu no Dewe jſgays es.
Die Epiſtel am tage der Himelfart
Chriſti / Actorum ain 1. cap.
TO pirmake Wallode eſſeme / es teſcham
treſſeis myleis Theophile / no wueſſe to / kattres
Jeſus eſake darryth vnde maetcyt / js tay
dene / kad thas vſyemptcz tappe. Peetcz to ka thas
tims Apoſtolims (kattres thas by Jſredtczeys)
czour to ſweete Garre pawheleſchenne doeuwis by.
Kattrims thas ßöw peetcz ßouwe czeſchenne czywis
paradyes by / czour daſſchade paradiſchenne / vnde
lickaas ßöw redtczeeth par tems czettredeſmette denems
/ vnde treßeey ar tims no tho Dewe walſtybe.
Vnde kad thas thös ßackrays by / paweeley thas
tims / ka the no Jeruſalem nhe atſthate / beth gaydite
vs to peßatciſchenne tha Theewe kattre yuus (ßatcy /
tas) no man czirdeiſche eſſeth. Aeſto Johannes gir
ar Vdenne chruſtys / beth yums buus ar tho ſweete
Garre chruſtytims tapt / nhe jlge peetcz ſchims
denims.
Beth te / kattre kopan ſagaiuſſche by / jouthaye
tam vnde ßatcy. Kunx grib tu exkan ſcho laike atkal
vs tayßyth / to walſtybe no Jſrael ? Beth thas ßatcy
vs tems / yums nhe peder ſinnath totolayke layke nedtcz
ſtunde / kattre tas Thews exkan ßouwe warre patturreys
gir / Beth yuus to ſpeeke tha ſweete Garre
dabbuuſſeth / katters vs yums nätczys / vnd buuſeth
manne ledtczeneke exkan Jeruſalem / vnde exkan to
wueſſe Judea vnde Samaria / vnd js tam gallam
taes Semmes.
Vnde kad thas tha ßatcys by / tappe thas vs
jemptcz redttzite / vnde wena paddebbes yeme to auxkam
preſchan winge atczems. Vnde kad the tham
peetcz lukoyas vs debbeſſe kapyote / Rouge tad ſthawey
py to duewe Wyre / exkan baltims drebims /
kattre arridtczan ßatcy / Juus Wyre no Galilea / ko
ſthaweet yuus / vnd lukoyetes vs tho debbes ? Schis
Jeſus katters no yums gir vs yemptz exkan debbes /
thas nätczys / lidtcz kha yuus to redtczeiſſche eſſeth
vs debbeſſe broudtczote.
Euangelium am tage der Himelfart
Chriſti / Marci 16. cap.
WVeſſe peedige / kad te wene paddeſmette py
Galde ſeedeye / paradyas thas ßöw / vnde ladeye
winge neetitczybe / vnde winges ßyrdeſcetybe
/ ka te nhe by titczeiſche / kattre the to
redtczeiſche
by / atkal auxkam czeluſſche. Vnd ßatcy vs tems :
Eyth exkan tho wueſſe Paſſoule / vnde maetcet to
Euangelium wueſſe raddite lethe. Kas tur titcz
vnde chruſtitcz thope / tas taps ſweetcz. Beth kas
nhe titcz / tas taps paſſuddis.
Beth taes Symes / kattre tur peetcz nätcys /
tims / kattre tur titcz / gir the / exkan manne wärde the
whelnes Jſczys / ar younims mhelims treſſees /
czuuſkes noczys / vnde khad the ko nawyge ſczeers /
tas tims nhe kaythes. wuerßon thems nheweſſelems
the tas Rokas lidtczys / thad buus tas ar tims
thapt labbake.
Vnde tas Kunx peetcz tho / ka thas ar tims
treßeis by / tappe tas vs yemptz exkan debbes / vnde
ſeede py Dewe labbe Roke. Beth the Jſgaye vnde
maetcye exkan wueſſims mallims. Vnde tas
Kunx pallydtczeye tims / vnde apſtippreey to wärde /
czour peetcz nakammims Symims.
Die Epiſtel am Sontage nach der
Himelfart Chriſti oder Exaudi / 1. Petri 4.
THad eſſeth nu gaddige vnde modige py luckſchennes.
Beth pär wueſſems lethems thurreth
ſtarpan yums wene karſtige myleſtibe.
Aeſto ta myleſtibe apkla arridtczan tho Greeke kopybe.
Eſſet mayotaye ſtarpan yums bes kurneſchen.
Vnde kalpoyeth wens tham otram / yckwens
ar to dawane / kattre thas dabbuys gir / kha te
labbe Nammethurretaye thäs daſchades Dewe
ßeeleſtibes. Khad wens treße / tad thas to treße
ka Dewe Wärde. Khad wenam wens Ammaetcz
gir / ka thas to darre / aran tho ſpeeke ka Dews dode.
Ka exkan wueſſims letims Dews teycktz thope /
czour Jeſum Chriſtum / kattram gir Goodtcz vnde
Warre / muußige muußam / Amen.
Euangelium am Sontage nach der
Himelfart Chriſti oder Exau.Joh. 15. vnd 16.
BETh kad tas Eprecetays nätczys / kattre es
yums ßutiſcho no Theewe / tas Gars thäs
tayſnibes / katteers no Theewe Jſedth / tas
dhos Ledtczybe no man. Vnde yuus arridtczan
dhoſeth ledtczybe / aeſto yuus eſſeth no eſakumme /
py man buewuſſche.
Scho eſme es vs yums treßeys / ka yuus yums
nhe apgrekoyates. The yums exkan to Banne lidtczys.
Beth tas layx nake / ka tas / kas yums nokows
/ ſkyttis / ka tas dar Dewam wene kalpoſchenne.
Vnd to te yums tapeetcz darrys / ka the nedtcz
manne Thewe / nedtcz man atßyſth. Beth ſchös eſſeme
es vs yums treßeys / aeſto / kad tas layx nätcys /
ka yuus to peminneth / ka es to yums ßatcys eſſeme.
Beth ſcho nhe eſſeme es vs yums no eſakumme ßatcys
/ aeſto es by py yums.
Die Epiſtel am heiligen Pfingſta-
ge / Actorum 2. cap.
VNde khad thäs pecedeſmettes denes bi pepueldites
/ bye the wueſſe wenlydtczyge kopan.
Vnde tur noticka pepeeſche wena ruuckſchen
no debbes / Jten kha wene warrene wheye / vnde pepueldye
to wueſſe Namme / kur the ſeedeeye. Vnde
tappe redtceetz py thems dallites mheles / Jten kha
buute the vggenige. Vnde thas ſeedaas ßöw vs
yckwene ſtarpan thems / vnde tappe wueſſe puelne to
ſweete Garre. Vnde eſake maetcyt ar daſchadims
mhelims / peetcz to / kha tims tas Gars doeuwe
Jſtreßeet. Beth tur cziwoye Judde exkan Jeruſalem
/ the byhy Dewebyataye wyre aran wueſſenadims
loudims / kattre appeſkan to debbes gir. Khad nu
ſchis Balxnis noticka / nätce ta doudtcibeduodtcibe kopan /
vnd tappe ſtarpan ßöw jſtruzenate / aeſto yckwens
czirdeye / ka the ar ßouwe Wallode treßeye. Beth te
Jſſabyas ßöw wueſſe / vnd Jßabrinoyas ßöw / vnde
ßatcy ſtarpan ßöw / Rougeth / nhe gir ſche wueſſe /
kattre tur treſſe / aran Galilea ? ka czirdam mhes
tad / yckwens ßouwe wallode / kur mhes exkan czimmuſſche
eſſem. Parther vnd Meder / vnd Elamiter /
vnde kattre mhes cziwoyam exkan Meſopotamia /
vnde exkan Judea vnd Capadocia / Ponto vnd
Aſia / Phrygia vnde Pamphilia / Egypten / vnd py
tems eſſzams / to Libien / py Cyrenen / vñ Sweſſcheneke
no Rome / Judde vnde Juddeloudes / Kreter
vnd Araber / mhes czirdam thös ar muſſims mhelims
/ tös leles Dewe darbes treßotes.
The Jſſabyas ßöw / wueſſe / vnde jſſabrinoyas
ßöw / vnd ßatcy wens vs to Otre / kas grib tas
buuth ? Beth te citte apmhedidamme vnd ßatcy / the
gir tho ßalde wine puelne.
Euangelium am heilgen Pfing-
ſtage / Johan. 14. cap.
JEſus adbildey / vnde ßatcy vs to / kas man
miloy / tas manne wärde thurrees / vnde
mans Thews to mylees / vnde mhes py tho
nacyſem. Beth kas man nhe myloy / tas nhe tur
manne wärde. Vnde to wärde / kattre yuus czirdaat
/ nhe gir mans/ beth tha Thewe / katters man
ßuutys gir.
Tades wärdes eſſeme es vs yums treßeys / tickilge
ka es py yums buewis eſme. Beth tas Eprecetais
/ tas ſweetcz Gars / kattre mans Thews ßuutys
exkã manne wärde / tas patcz yums wueſſe lethe
maetcys / vnde yums peminnees wueſſe to / ka es
yums ßatcys eſſeme.
To Mere atſthayo es yums/ manne Mere
dome es yums / nhe ka tha Paſſoule dode / dome es
yums. Juuſe Syrdtcz nhe iſtruczenas / vnde nhe
jsbyſtas ßöw. Juus eſſeth czirdeiſſche / ka es yums
ßatcys eſſeme / Es no emo vnde nako atkal py yums.
Thurreete yuus man myle / thad yuus tapte lyxme /
ka es ßatcys eſſeme / Es emo py Thewe / aeſto thas
Thews / gir lelaax neeka es. Vnde nu eſſeme es to
yums ßatcys / pirms tas noteke / aeſto kad tas nu
notitczys / ka yuus titczath. Es nu Joproiam nhe
wayrs ar yums treßeeſcho.
Aeſto tas Kunx ſchäs Paſſoules nake / vnde
tham nee gir neeneke py man. Beth ka ta Paſſoule
atßyſth ka es to Thewe myley / vnd ka es tha dar /
kha man tas Thews boußlis gir.
Die Epiſtel am Pfingſtmontage /
Actorum 10. cap.
VNde tas gir mums paweleys maetczyt tös
loudes / vnde ledtczybe doth / ka thas gir licktz
no Dewe / wens Szoige pär cziwems vnd
nomuerruſſchems. Schim dode wueſſe Prophetes
ledtczybe / czour winge Wärde / wueſſe kattre exkan
ko tytcze / pammeſſchen thös greekes dabbauuth
buus.
Kad Petrus whel ſchos wärdes treſſey / kritte
tas ſweetcz Gars vs wueſſems tems / kattre to
wärde czirdeeye. Vnde te Titczige aran tho abgreſchenne
/ kattre ar Petro nakuſſche by / yſtrukas jeb
ysbyas ßöw / ka arridtczã vs tims pagane loudims /
tas Dawans ta ſweete Garre Jſledtcz thappe.
Aeſto the czirdeye / ka te ar mhelims treſſey / vnd
Dewe auxte patteitcze. Tad adbildey Petrus / war
arridtczan wens to Vdenne ays leckt / ka ſche chruſtyte
nhe tapte / kattre to ſweete Garre dabbuiſſche
gyr / lydtcz kha arridczan mhes ? Vnde pawheleye
tös chruſtyt / exkan ta wärde tho Kunge.
Euangelium am Pfingſtmontage /
Johan. 13. cap.
THa gir Dews to Paſſoule pemileys / ka thas
ßouwe wenige Dhele doeuwe / ka wueſſe the
kattre exkan to titcz / nhe thope paſſuſte / beth
to mußige cziwoſchenne dabbu. Aeſto Dews nhe
gir ßouwe Dhele ßutis exkan tho Paſſoule / ka thas
to Paſſoule ßode / beth ka ta Paſſoule czour to ſweete
thope. Kas exkan to titcz / tas nhe taps ßodytz.
Beth kas nhe titcz / tas gir yow noßodytz / aeſto thas
nhe titcz exkan to wärde tha wenyge peczimpte
Dewe Dhele.
Beth ta gir ta Szodibe / ka ta Gaiſme exkan to
Paſſoule nakuſſe gir / vnde te Czilwheke pemileye
to tumpßibe wairack / neeka to Gaiſme / aeſto winge
darbe by loune. Kas loune dar / tas enide to Gaiſme
/ vnde nhe nake py tho Gaiſme / ka wynge darbe
nhe thope ßodite / Beth kas teſcham dar / tas nake py
to Gaiſme / ka winge darbe ßinnamme thope / aeſto
the gir exkan Dewe darryte.
Die Epiſtel am Pfingſtdinſtage
Actorum 8. cap.
BEth kad te Apoſtele czirdeey exkan Jeruſalem /
ka Samaria to Dewe wärde vs yemuſſche
by / Szuuty the py tems Petrum vnde Johannem
/ kattre / kad the ſemmen nätce / luudtcze the pär
thems / ka the to ſweete Garre dabbuthe. Aeſto thas
by whel vs neewene krittis / Beth by wen Chruſtyte
exkan tho wärde Chriſti Jeſu / Tad licka the thäs
Rokes vs thems / vnde the dabbuy to ſweete Garre.
Euangelium am Pfingſtdinſtage /
Johannis / 10. cap.
PAtteſe / patteſe Es ßack yums / kas czour to
Durwe nhe e eth / exkan to Auwekuute / beth
kape czittur exkan / tas gir wens Sagglis
vnde Szlepkows. Beth tas / kas czour to Durwe
e eth / tas gir wens Gans / tho Aweyo. Tham
pattim attwherre tas Durwe ßarx / vnde the auwes
czirde winge Balexne. Vnde thas ßoudtcze ßouwes
pa wärdam / vnde Jſwhedde tös. Vnde kad thas
ßouwes Auwes gir yſlaidis / no edth thas prexkan
tems / vnde the auwes ſtaiga tham peetcz / aeſto the
paßyſth winge Balexne. Beth wenam Sweſſcham
nhe ſtaiga the peetcz / beth ſkrey no tho / aeſto the nhe
paſiſth tho Sweſſche balexne. Scho lydtczybe
ßatcy Jeſus vs tems / Beth the nhe ßappratte / kas
tas by / ka thas vs tems treßey.
Tad ßatcy Jeſus atkal vs tems / patteſe /
patteſe / es ßacke yums / Es eſme ta Durwis py
tems Auwems. Wueſſe kattre prexkan man nakuſſche
gir / te gir Saggle vnde Szlepkouwe buewuſſche.
Beth the Auwes nhe gir thos kloußiſche.
Es eſme ta Durwis / kad kas czour man e edth / tas
thope ſweetcz. Vnde tas e eſe vnde js eſee ſe / vnde gannibe
attras. Wens Saglis nhe nake czite peetcz /
ka wen / ka thas ſooge / noßnoudtcze vnde nomaetcze.
Es eſme nätczis / ka thems to cziwybe puelnibe vnde
to gaußybe dabbuut buus.
Die Epiſtel am tage der heiligen
Dreyfaltigkeit Röm. 11. cap.
O Kada wena czillibe thäs Bagatibes / lidtcz
thäs Guddribes / vnde Dewe atßiſchennes.
Ka wueſtim neeaptweryamme gir winge ßodibe
/ vnde nhe jſwaytczaiamme gir winge Czelle.
Aeſto kas gir ta Kunge prathe atßinnis ? Jeb kas
gir winge Paddome doeuwetays buewys ? Jeb kas
gir tham ko papreſche doeuwis / ka tas tham tapte
atkal atmackſatz ? Aeſto no tho / vnde czour tho / vnde
exkan tho / gir wueſſa letha / tam gir Goodtz mußige /
Amen.
Euangelium am tage der heiligen
Dreyfaltigkeit / Johan. 3. cap.
BEth tur by wens Czilwhex ſtarpan tems
Phariſeerems / ar wärde Nicodemus / wens
wuerßenex ſtarpan tems Judde loudems / tas
nätce py Jeſu py to Nackte / vnd ßatcy vs to / Meiſter.
Mhes ßinnam / ka tu es wens Maetcetays no
Dewe nätcys / aeſto neewens war täs Symes darrythdardyth
/ kattres tu dar / Dews gir tad ar to.
Jeſus adbildey vnde ſatcy vs to / patteſe / patteſe /
es ßack thöw / tas gir tad / ja wens no joune peczimptz
nhe thope / nhe war tas to Dewe Walſtibe
redtczeeth. Nicodemus ßatcy vs tho / ka war wens
Czilwhex peczimptz tapt / kad thas whetcz gir / war
thas arridtczan atkal exkan ßouwe Mathe Meße
edth / vnde peczimptz tapt ? Jeſus adbildey / patteſe /
patteſe / es ßack thöw / Tas gir tad ja nee wens peczimptz
thope aran to Vdenne vnde Garre / thad nee
war thas exkan to Dewe walſtibe naackt. Katteers
no Meße peczimptz thope / ta gir Meßa / vnde
katteers no Garre peczimptz thope / tas gir Gars.
Nhe yßabrinoyesyßabri noyes / ka es thöw ßatcys eſſeme /
jums buus no joune peczimptims tapt. Tas
Wheis puuſche kur tas grib / vnde tu czirde ganne
winge kauckſchenne / beth tu nhe ßin / no kurrenes tas
nake / vnde kurpo tas edth. Ta gir jckwens / katters
aran to Garre peczimptz gir.
Nicodemus adbildeye / vnd ßatcy vs to / ka war
tas notickt / Jeſus adbildey vnd ßatcy vs to / Eße tu /
wens Meiſters exkan Jſrael / vnde tu nhe ßin to ?
Patteſe / patteſe / es ßack thöw / mhes treßam ko mhes
ßinnam / vnde dodam ledtczibe / ko mhes redtczeiſſche
eſſem / vnde yuus nhe ſayemmath muße lidtczibe.
Nhe titczath yuus / kad es jums no Semmeſkims
letims ßacko / ka yuus tad titczeete / kad es yums no
debbeſkims letims ßatcyte.
Vnde neewens broudtcze vs debbes / ka wen tas /
kas no debbeſſe nätczis gir / ar wärde /tha czilwheke
Dhels / katteers exkan Debbes gir. Vnde lydtcz
ka Moſes exkan to Tuxniſſe / wene ßcuuſke patczelis
gir / tha buus ta Czilwheke Dhelam patczeltam
tapt / ka wueſſe / kattre exkan to titcz / nhe thope paſuſte
/ beth to mußige cziwoſchen dabbuu.
Die Epiſtel am erſten Sontage
nach Trinitatis / 1. Johan. 4. cap.
DEws gir ta myleſtibe / vnde kas exkan to myleſtibe
pallecke / tas pallecke exkan Dewe / vnde
Dews exkan to. Exkan to gir ta myleſtibe
puelnige py mums / ka mums wena droſchibe gir / py
to Dene thäs Szodibes. Aeſto lydtcz ka thas gir /
tha eſſem mhes arridtczan exkan ſcho Paſſoule.
Byaſchenne nhe gir exkan to myleſtibe / beth ta puelnige
myleſtibe js czen to byaſchen aran / aeſto tay byſchenne
gir bheda. Beth kas ßöw byſthas / tas nhe
gir pär puelne exkan to myleſtibe.
Laideth mums to myle thurreet / aeſto thas gir
mums pirmake myleis. Kad wens ßack / es tur
Dewe myle / vnde enyde ßouwe Brale / tas gir wens
Mheelkullis. Aeſto kas ßouwe Brale nhe tur myle /
kattre thas redtcz / ka war tas Dewe myle thurreet /
kattre thas nhe reedtcz ? Vnde ſchis Boußlis gir
mums no wynge/ AeſtoAſto kas Dewe myle tur / thas
thur arridtczan ßouwe Brale myle.
Euangelium am erſten Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Luc. 16.
BEth tur by wens bagaatz wyrs / tas apteerpees
ßöw ar ſide dreebims / vñ darge linnewadmalle
/ vñ thas cziwoye yckdennes kaarige vnd exkã
lyxmibe. Beth tur by wens Nabbax Wyrs / ar wärde
Lazarus / tas gulley preſchan winge durwe puelns
wahtes vnde egribbeyas ßöw pe ehdenams no tims
druſkims / katrre no tha bagathe Wyre galde krytte /
tomher nätce te Szunnis vnde laiſye winge wathes.
Beth tas notickas / ka tas Nabbax muerre /
vnde tappe neſtz no tims Engelims / exkan Abraham
kleepe. Beth tas baggatz nomuerre arridtczan
/ vnde tappe apracktz.
Kad thas nu exkan to Helle / vnde exkan to
moke by / czele thas ßouwes atcees auxam / vnd redtczey
Abraham no talene / vnd Lazarumme exkan
winge Kleepe / ßoutce vnde ßatcy / Thews Abraham
abßeelo thöw mannis / vnde ſuute Lazarum / ka thas
to puerſte galle exkan vdenne emhertcze / vnde czeſſena
manne mhele / aeſto es czeſcho lelas mokas exkan
ſcho vggunne leſme. Beth Abraham ßatcy / Pemin
Dhels ka tu touwe labbumme dabbuis eſſe exkan
touwe cziwibe / vnde Lazarus tur prettibe gir to
loune dabbuys. Beth nu thope thas eprecenaatz /
vnde tu thope moetcytz. Vnd pär to wueſſe / gir ſtarpan
mums vnde yums wena lela ſtarpybe / ka te /
kattre tur gribbeete nonoſchennes ſchennes ſemmen brouckt py
yums / te nhewar / vnde nedtcz arridtczan no turrenes
ſcheit py mums pare brouckt.
Tad ßatcy thas / Tad ludtcze es thöw Thews /
ka tu to ßuute exkan manne Thewe Namme / aeſto
man gir whel pece Brale / ka thas tims Ledtczibe
dode / ka the arridtczan nhe nake exkan ſcho wete täs
Moczybes : Abraham ßatcy vs to / thems gir Moſes
vnd the Prophete / layde the tös pattes czirdeeth.
Beth thas ßatcy / Nhe / Thews Abraham / beth kad
wens no tims muerronims py thems edthe / tad the
atſthate no Greekims. Tas ßatcy vs to / Nhe czirde
the Moſen vnde tös Prophetes / thad the arridtczan
nhe titczees / kad wens no tims muerronims auxam
czeelte.
Die Epiſtel am andern Sontage
nach Trinitatis / 1. Jon. 3.
NHe yſſabrinoyetes yums / manne Brale / khad
yums ta Paſſoule enyde. Mhes ßinnam / ka
mhes aran to Nawe exkan to Cziwoſchenne
nakuſſche eſſem / aeſto mhes thurram myle tös
Brales. Kas to Brale nhe tur myle / tas palleck
exkan to Nawe. Kas ßouwe Brale enide / tas gir
wens nokouweys. Vnde yuus ßinneth / ka wenam
Nokouweyam / nhe gir tha mußige cziwoſchenne py
ßöw pallekamme.
Py to eſſem mhes atßinnuſſche to mylleeſtibe /
ka thas ßouwe cziwybe pär mums doeuwis gir /
vnde mums buus arridtczan to cziwybe par tims
Bralims doth. Beth kad wenam ſchäs paſſoules
baggatibe gir / vnde redtcz ßouwe Brale bhedes czeſchote
vñ ays ßledtcze ßouwe ßirde prexkã to / ka palleck
ta Dewe myleſtibe py tho ? Manne Bherninge
nhe laideth mums myle thurreet ar wärdims / nedtcz
ar tho Mhele / beth ar to darbe vnde ar to tayſnibe.
Euangelium am andern Sontage
nach Trinitatis. Luc. 14. cap.
BEth thas ßatcy vs to / tur by wens Czilwhex
tas darrye wene lele wackarre ehdene / vñ aytczenaye
doudtcze tur kläth. Vnde js ſuutye
ßouwe kalpe / py to ſtunde tho wackarre ehdene / tims
aytcenatims ßatcyth nätcet / aeſto wueſſe lethe gir
ßattaiſyte. Vnde the eßake wueſſe / wens peetcz to
otre / ßöw adbildeetes. Tas pirmays ßatcy vs tho /
Es eſſeme wene Tyrumme pyrtczis / vnde man buus
js edth / vnd to aproudtczyt / es ludtce thöw / ays bilde
man. Vnde tas oters ßatcy es eſme pece yuge
Weerſche pyrtczis / vnde es no emo tagedine / thos
aproudtczit / Es ludtcze thöw aysbilde man. Vnd
tas treſſchais ßatcy / Es eſme wene Sewe yemis /
tapeetcz nhe war es näckt.
Vnd tas Kalps nätce / vnde atßatcy to ßouwam
kungam. Tad tappe tas Nammekunx duſmyx / vnd
ßatcy vs ßouwe kalpe / js ey pepeſche wuerßon tems
czellems vnde eleems thäs Pillis / vnd ewed tös nabbages
/ vnd kropls / vñ tiſlees / vñ ackles / ſcheit exkan.
Vnd tas Kalps ßatcy / kunx / tas gir notitczis / ko
tu pawheleis eſſe / beth tur gir whel wayrs wete. Vñ
tas Kunx ßatcy vs to Kalpe / js ey wuerßon tems
Semme elems vnd py tems Szeetems vnde ſpede
thos ſcheit exkan näckt / ka mans Nams puelns
thope. Beth es ßacke yums / ka te Wyre / kattre aytczenate
gir / neewens manne Wackarre ehdeneedhene
boudys.
Die Epiſtel am dritten Sontage
nach Trinitatis / 1. Pet. 5.
THa ſemmoyates yums nu appeſkan to ſpeetczyge
Dewe Roke / ka thas yums paauxtena
ßouwan laykan. Wueſſe yuuſſe Gadybe
mettet vs tho / aeſto thas gada par yums.
Eſſeth gaddige vnde nomodige / aeſto yuuſe Prettibenex
thas Whelns edth apkärth / kha wens ruudtczams
Szweers / vnde meckle / kattre thas war apryte.
Tam ſthaweet ſtippre prettybe. Exkan Titczybe
/ vnde ßinnet / ka yuuſe Bralims exkan tho
Paſſoule / ta patte czeſchenne gir.
Beth tas Dews wueſſes ßeeleſtibes / kas mums
aitczenays gir / py ßouwe mußige Godibe exkan
Chriſto Jeſu / tas patz yums / kattre yuus wene
maſſe laike czeſchaat / par puelne ßattaiſys / eſtipprenaas
/ ſpeetczige darris / duebbenas / Tam pattim
gir Goodtcz vnde Warre / no mußige mußam / Amẽ.
Euangelium am dritten Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Luc. 15.
BEth wueſſade Muyteneke vnde Greetceneke
ſteitczes ßöw py to / ka the to czirdeete. Vnd the
Phariſeer vnde Raxtmaetcetaye kurneye / vnd
treßey / ſchis vs jem tös greetcenekes / vñ ehde ar tims.
Beth thas treßey vs tems ſcho Lydtczybe / vnde
ßatcy / katters Czilwhex gir ſtarpan yums / kattram
ßumpte Auwes gir / vnd kad thas wene no tims
paſuude / katteers nhe atſtha / tös doeuwinge / vnd
doeuwingedeſmettes exkan to Tuxniſſe vnde no edth
peetcz to paßuſte / tekams ka thas to attrode ? Vnde
kad thas to attraddis gir / thad leke thas to vs ßouwe
kammeſe ar Lyxmibe. Vnde kad thas Mayas
nake / ſaßoutce thas ßouwes drouges / vnde Kaiminges
ßatcydams vs thems / lyxmoyet yuus ar mannim
aeſto es eſme manne Auwe attraddis / kattra
paßuſte by. Es ßack yums / Tha buus arridtczan
Lyxmibe exkan debbes buuth / pär wene Greedtceneke
/ katters no greekims admittas / par doeuwinge /
vnd doeuwinge deſmettes tayſnes / kattrems / tha
greeke atmitteſchenne nhe gir wayage. Jeb kattra
Sewe gir tur / kattre deſmette Groſſche gir / kad tha
no tims wene paſſude / kattra wene Swetcze / nhe
edegge / vnd mheeſche to Namme / vnde meckle tickuſſche
/ tekams ka tha to attrode ? Vnde kad tha to
attradduſſche gir / ſaßoutcze tha ßouwes drougaynes
vnd kaiminges / ßatczydamma / Lyxmoyeth yuusyues
ar man / aeſto es eſme manne Groſſche atkal attradduſſe
/ kattre es paßudduſſe by. Ta arridtczan ßacke
es yums / buus lyxmibe buuth prexkan tims Dewe
Engelims / pär wene Greetceneke / katters no greekyms
atſthaias.
Die Epiſtel am vierden Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Röm. 8. cap.
AEſto es titcz / ka ſcha laike czeſchenne täs Godibes
nhe czenige gir / kattra py mums buus redtczeta
tapt. Aeſto ta bhedige gaidiſchenne thäs
raddibes / gaide vs to apſkaidroſchenne tho Dewe
Beerne. Peetcz to / ka ta Raddibe padhota gir tay
wheltige lethe / prettibe winge prate / beth tapeetcz /
kas thos padoeuwis gir / vs czerrybe. Aeſto arridtczan
ta Raddite lethe ſwabbade tappys / no to
kalpoſchenne to laykige buuſchenne / vs to godige
Swabbadibe tho Dewe Bherne. Aeſto mhes ßinnam
/ ka wueſſa Raddiba ar mums gaide / vnde nopuuſchäs
/ ßöw whel allaßin.
Vnd nhe wen the / beth mhes paſſche arridtczan /
kattrims mums gir ta Garre pirmibe / vnde gaidam
arridtczan py mums / pattims peetcz tho Beernibe /
vnd gaydam vs mußes Meßes atpeſtiſchennes.
Euangelium am vierden Sontage
nach Trinitas / Luc. 6. cap.
TApeetcz eſſeth ßeelige / lydtcz ka arridtczan
yuuſe Thews ßelix gir / Nhe ßodeth / thad nee
tapßeeth yuus ßodite. Nhe paſſuddenath.
tad yus nhe tapſeet paſſuddenate / Pammettet / thad
taps yums pammeſtcz. Dodeth / thad taps yums
dhotz. Wens puelns / ßaſpeſtcz vnde pärledtczyx
Mhers / taps yums exkan yuuſe kleepe dhotz. Aeſto /
ar tho Mhere / ar kattre yuus Jſmheriſeeth / taps
yums atkal emherydtcz.
Vnde thas ßatcy tims wene Lydtczibe / warra arridtczan
wens acklis wenam acklam to czelle radyth ?
Nhe ßakryte the abbeduewe exkan to Beddre ?
Tas maetceklis nhe gir pär ßouwe Meiſter. Kad
thas maetceklis gir ka winge Meiſters / thad gir tas
pär puelne. Beth ko redtcze tu wene ßkabbarge
exkan touwe Brale Atcze / vnde tho Balcke exkan
touwe / Atcze tu nhe noman ? jeb ka war tu ßatcyt
vs touwe Brale / thur klus Brale es grib to ßkabbarge
aran touwe Atcze jswilckt / vnde tu nhe redtcz
patcz to Balcke exkan touwe Atcze ? Tu Wyltenex
wheltz papreſche to Balcke aran touwe Atcze / vnde
peluko tad / ka tu to ßkabbarge aran touwe Brale
atcze Jſwheltcze.
Die Epiſtel am fünfften Sontage
nach Trinitatis / 1. Pet. 3. cap.
BEth eſſeth wueſſenotal wen pratyge / lydtczczetige
/ Bralige / Szeelßyrdige / Laipne. Nhe
atmaxayeth loune ar loune / nedtcz ladiges /
wärdes ar ladigims wärdims. Beth tur prettibe
ſwetyet. Vnde ßinnet / ka yuus py to aytcenate
eſſeth / ka yuus to ſwetumme mantoyeth. Aeſto kas
cziwoth grib / vnde labbes denes redtczeeth / tas
kluſſena ßouwe Mhele / ka tha loune neetreß / vnde
ßouwes Luupes / ka the nhe pewil. Thas atgreßaas
ßöw no loune / vnde dar to labbe. Tas meckley
Mere / vnde czennas tay peetcz. Aeſto the Atczes /
tha Kunge / redtcz vs tems tayſnems / vnde winge
Außes vs winge Luckſchenne. Beth tas Wayx
tha Kunge / redtcz vs tems / kattre loune dar.
Vnde katters gir tur / kas yums loune darryth
war / khad yuus tam labbam peetcz ſtaygayeth ?
Vnde jeb yuus arridtczan czeſchat pär to Tayſnybe /
tad eſſeth yuus tomher ſweete. Beth nhe Jſſabyſtetes
yums pär winge lepnoſchenne / vnd nhe jſtrutzenates.
Beth ſweetyet Dewam tam Kungam exkan
yuußims Szyrdims.
Euangelium am fünfften Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Luc. 5.
TAs notickas / kad ßöw te loudis py tho ſpedhes
/ to Dewe wärde czyrdeeth. Vnde tas
ſthawey py to Eſſerre Genezareth / vnde redtczeye
duewe Laywes py to Eſſerre ſthawites / Beth te
Sweyneke by iſkapuuſſche / vnde maſgaya ßouwes
Tykles. Kape thas exkan to wene Laywe / kattra
Simonis by / vnde ludtcze tham / ka thas tho maſſe
no to Malle no weeſte / vnde thas ßeedas ßöw / vnde
maetcye tös loudes aran to Laywe.
Vnde khad thas by mitteis no treſſeſchenne /
ßatcy thas vs Simon / wedde vs to auxke / vnde jſmettet
yuuſes tykles / ka yuus wene Lome whelkäth.
Vnde Simon Adbildeye / vnde ßatcy vs to / Meiſter /
mhes eſſem to wueſſe Nackte ſtradayſche / vnd neeneke
dabbuiſche. Beth vs touwe Wärde / grib es tho
Tykle jſmeeſth. Vnde kad the to darrye / abwilcke the
wene lele kope no Szuewems. Vnde winge Tykle
ßapplyſe. Vnde the aytczenaye ßouwes drouges /
kattre exkan to Otre Laywe by / ka the nackte / vnde
pallydtczeete tims wilckt. Vnde the nätce / vnde pepueldye
abbes Laywes puelne / tha ka the grimme.
Kad to Simon Petrus redtczeyeredtczye / kritte thas Jeſu
py tems czellems / vnde ßatcy / Kunx / Ey no mannim
aran / es eſme wens greetczyx Czilwhex / aeſto tam
by wena Jßabyſchenne vs nakuſſe / vnd wueſſims
kattre ar to by / pär ſcho ßuewe wilckſchenne / kattre
the kopan darriſche / jeb wilckuſſche by. Ta lydtcz
arridtczan Jacobum vnd Johannem tims dhelims
Zebedei / Simonis bedredrougems. Vnde Jeſus
ßatcy vs Simon / Nhe Jsbyſtes thöw / aeſto peetcz
ſcho layke / buus thöw Czilwhekes guuſtyth. Vnde
thas wedde thos Laywes py tho malle jeb ſemmes /
vnde atſthaye wueße lethe / vnde ſthaygaye tham
peetcz
Die Epiſtel am ſechſten Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Rom. 6. cap.
KA nhe ßinneth yuus / ka wueſſe / kattre mhes exkan
Jeſum Chriſtũ chruſtyte eſſem / the gyr exkã winge
Nawe chruſtite. Tha eſſem mhesmehs nu ar tho aprackte
czour to Chruſtybe exkan to Nawe / aeſto / lydtcz ka
Chriſtus vs modenaatcz gir no tims muerronims /
czour to godibe ta Thewe / ta buus mums arrydtczã
exkan wene joune cziwoſchenne ſthaygath. Beth ka
mhes nu ar to eſthadyte thopam py lydtcze Nawes /
thad buus mums arridtczan tay auxkamczelſchenne
lydtcze buuth / peetcz to / ka mhes ßynnam / ka muße
wetczyx Czilwhex ar tho Chruſtan ßiſtz gir / ka ta
greetczige Meße no mittas / ka mhes nu joproyam
tims Greekims nhe wairs kalpoyam. Aeſto kas
nomuerris gir / thas gir tayſnootz no tims greekims.
Beth eſſem mhes ar Chriſto muerruſſche / Tad
titczam mhes / ka mhes arridtczan ar tho cziwoßem /
vnde ßinnam / ka Chriſtus no tims muerronims vs
modenaatz / un nhe wairs muerſt / ta nawe yoproyam
nhe wairs pär to waldys / aeſto ka thas muerris
gir / to gir thas to Greeke peetcz muerris / wen kärth /
beth ka thas cziwo / to cziwo thas Dewam. Tha
yuus arridtczan / thurreetes yums par tims / ka
yuus thos Greekes muerruſſche eſſeth / vnd Dewam
cziwooth / exkan Chriſto Jeſu mußam Kungam.
Euangelium am ſechſten Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Matth. 5.
AEſto es ßack yums / tas gir tad / Ja yuuſe Taiſnibe
nhe gir labbaka / nhe ka tho Raxtmaetcetayo
vnde Phariſeer / Thad yuus exkan to
Debbeſſe walſtibe nhe näckßeth.
Juus eſſeth czirdeiſche / ka vs tems wetczakems
ſatcytzſtatcytz gir / Töw nhe buus nokowth. Beth kas
nokow / tas buus tay Szodibe paradan. Beth es
ßacke yums / kas ar ßouwe BraleBarle duſmo / tas gir to
Szodibe pelnis. Beth kas vs ßouwe Brale ßack /
Racha / tas gir thäs Runnes parradan. Beth
kas ßack / tu Jeckis / tas gir to helles vggunne pelnis.
Tapeetcz kad tu touwe Dawanne wuerßon to
Altar vppere / vnde tu edoma / ka touwam Bralam
kaſlab prettibe thöw gir / Tad atſta tur prexkan tho
Altare touwe dawane / vnde noey papreſche / vnde
ßalydtczenayes thöw ar touwe Brale / vnde nätce
tad / vnde vppeere touwe Dawane.
Eſſe labpratyx touwam prettibenekam driſe /
tapeetcz ka tu whel ar tho wuerßon to czelle eſſe.
Ka thöw tas prettibenex / wen kärth nhe nodode
tham Sogem / vnde thas Szoge nodode thöw tham
Szullaynam / vnde tu thope exkan to Czetumme
emheſtz. Es ßack thöw patteſe / tu no turrenes nhe
Js eſee ſe / tekams ka tu to peedige kouſſe mackßaas.
Die Epiſtel am ſiebenden Sonta-
ge nach Trinitatis / Rom. 6. cap.
MAn buus czilwhetczige no to treßeth / thäs
Wagybes peetcz yuuſes Meßes. Lydtcze ka
yuus yuuſes Lootczekles / paddoeuwuſſche
eſſeth / py kalpoſchenne thas neſkyſtibes / vnde no
wene neetaiſnybe py to otre / Tha paddodeth nu
arridtczan yuuſes Lodtczeklees py kalpoſchenne
thay Taiſnybe / ka the ſweete thope. Aeſto kad yuus
thos greekes kalpe byet / tad byet yuus ſwabbade / no
tho Taiſnybe / kas by yums tad py to laike par augle /
kattre Juus nu kounates ? aeſto tas gals tho patte
gir ta Nawe. Beth ka yuus nu no tims Greekims
ſwabbade eſſeth / vnde Dewe kalpe tappuſſchetuppuſſche / gir
yums yuuſe augle / ka yuus ſweete thopet / Beth
tas Gals gir ta mußige cziwoſchenne. Aeſto / ta
Nawe gir tho Greeke alga / Beth tas Dewe dawans
gir ta mußige cziwoſchenne exkan Chriſto Jeſu
mußam Kungam.
Euangelium am ſiebenden Sonta-
ge nach Trinitatis / Marci 8. cap.
PY to layke / kad tur doudtcze loudes by / vnde
tems nhe by ya ehde / ßoutcze Jeſus ßouwes
Maetcekles py ßöw / vnd ßatcy vs tems / man
gir to louſcho ßeele / aeſto the gir nu tris denes py mã
pallickuſſche / vnde thems nhe gir neeneke yaehde.
Vnde kad es thos Jßalcktes no man lickte mayaas
edth / thad the wuerßon tho czelle / badde nomuerte /
aeſto czitte by no thalenes nakuſſche.
Wynge Maetcekle adbildey tham / kur yemmam
mhes ſcheitan / mayſes exkan to Tuxniſſe / ka mhes
thos pe ehdenam ? Vnde thas youtaye tems / czeke
Mayſes gir yums ? The ßatcye / Septinge. Vnde
thas pawheley thems loudems / ka the ßöw wuerßon
to Semme paſhedeete. Vnde thas yeme thos Septinge
Mayſes / vnde patteitcze / vnde pär louſe thos /
vnde doeuwe thos ßouwims Maetceklims / ka the
thos pattes preſchan lickte / vnde the licke thos tems
loudems preſchan / vnde thems by maſe Szuewetinge
/ vnde thas patteitcze / vnd pawheley thos pattes
arridtczan preſchan neſt. Beth the ehde / vnde tappe
pe eduſſche / vnde yeme thos pär atlicktes druſkas
auxam / Septinge kurwes / vnde tho by py czettre
tuxtoſche / kattre tur ehduſſche by. Vnde thas palayde
thos no ßöwim.
Die Epiſtel am achten Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Rom. 8.
THa eſſem mhes nu / mylige Brale / parradeneke
/ nhe thay Meße / ka mhes peetcz to Meße
cziwoyam / aeſto kad yuus peetcz tho Meße
cziwoßeth / thad yuus muerßeth. Beth kad yuus
czour to Garre thäs Meßes darryſchenne ſchlapeeſeth
/ thad yuus cziwoſeth. Aeſto kattres tas
Dewe Gars czen / the gir Dewe Beerne. Aeſto
yuus nhe eſſeth nhe wene kalpyge Garre dabbuyſche /
ka yuus yums atkal Jsbites buus. Beth yuus
eſſeth wene beernige Garre dabbuyſche / czour kattre
mhes ßoutczam / Abba myleys Thews. Tas patcz
Gars dode mußam Garram ledtczibe / ka mhes
Dewe Beerne eſſem / Eſſem mhes thad Beerne /
tad eſſem mhes arridtczan Manteneke / ar wärde
Dewe manteneke / vnde lydtcz manteneke Chriſti /
Ja mhes czittade lydtcze czetißem / vnd ka mhes arridtczan
lydtcz py Godibes paauxtenate thopam.
Euangelium am achten Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Matth. 7. cap.
SZargates yums par tims wiltigims Prophetims
kattre exkan Auwe drebims py yums
nake / Beth eſkige gir the pleeſige Wuelke. Py
winge auglims buus yums thos atßyth. War arridtczan
Wyne oges laſſyth no tims Ehrſchekokims
? Jeb Vyge oges no tims dadczims ? Aeſto / yckwens
labs Köx neeſſe labbes augles. Beth wens
ßappuwys kokes / neß lounes augles. Wens labs
köx neewar lounes augles neſth. Vnde wens ßappuwis
köx / nhe war labbes augles neſth. Jckwens
köx katters labbes augles neenees / thope noczirſtcz /
vnde exkan to vggunne mheſtcz.
Tapeetcz py winge auglims buus yums thos
adßydth.
Nhe wueſſe te / kattre vs man ßack / kunx / kunx /
exkan to Debbeſſe walſtibe nätczys / Beth te / kattre
to praate dar / manne Thewe exkã debbes. Doudtcze
vs man ßatcys winian denan / Kunx / Kunx / Nhe
eſſem mhes exkan touwe wärde Whelnes Js czinnuſſche
nhe eſſem mhes exkan touwe wärde doudtze
brinummes darriſche. Thad es vs tems ßatcyſchu /
Es nhe eſme yuus whel neewene kärth adßinnis /
atſthayetes wueſſe no man yuus loune darretaye.
Die Epiſtel am neunden Sonta-
ge nach Trinitatis / 1. Corinth. 10. cap.
BEth tas gir mums par preſche ſime notitczis /
ka mhes mums nhe ekaarotes lekam tho loune
/ lydtcz ka winge ekaroyas. Nhe thopeth
arridtczan Elkedewyge / lydtcz kha czitte no wingems
tappe / ka tur raxtytz ſthawe / Te loudis paſeedhas
ßemmen py eeſchennes vnde py czerſchennes /
vnde czeelees auxkam py meßloſchennes. Nhe laydeth
mums arridtczan nee wene Mouczybe czyth /
kha czitte no wingems Mouczybe czinne / vnd krytte
vs wene dene Duewedeſmette / vnde tris tuuxtoſche.
Beth nhe laydeth mums arridtczan Chriſtum
kärdenath / Ka czitte no tims to kärdenayekärdenye / vnde
tappe no tims Ozims jeb czuuſkims nomackte. Nhe
kurneth arridtczan / lydtcz ka czitte no tims kurneye /
vnd tappe nomaeckte czour to Nomaetcetaye.
Schis noticke wueſſe wynggims par preſche
ſime. Beth tas gir raxtytz mums par peminneeſchenne
/ vs kattrims tas gals thäs Paſſoules
nätcis gir. Tapeetcz / kas tur doma / ka thas
ſthawe / tas war labbe peroudtczyth / ka thas nhe
kryte. Tur nhe gir whel neewena / ka wen Czilwheke
kärdenaſchenne pär yums nakuſſe. Beth
Dews gir petitczyx / katters yums nhe leke kärdenath
/ par yuuſe warreſchenne / Beth dar ta / ka ta
kärdenaſchenne / wene galle yem / ka yuus tho warreth
panneſt. Tapeetcz manne mylige / bhetczeth
no tho Elkedewige / kalpoſchenne.
Euangelium am neunden Sontage.
nach Trinitatis / Luc. 16. cap.
BEth thas ßatcy arridtczan vs ßouwems
Maetceklems / Tur by wens bagaatcz Wyrs /
tam by wens Nammethurretays / tas tappe
prexkan tho apßatcytz / ka buute thas tham winge
Paddome Jſpoſtys. Vnde thas aytczenaye to /
vnde ßatcy vs to / ka czirde es to no thöw ? Dode lagadibe
no touwe Nammethurreſchenne / aeſto tu nhe
war nu yoproiam wens Nammethurretays wayrs
buuth. Tas Nammethurretays ßatcy py ßöw
patteme / ko buus man darryth ? Mans Kunx yem
to Ammatte no man / Rackte es nhe war / tha kounoos
es man dedelleeth. Es ßinno gan ko es darryth
grib / kad es no to Ammatte no celtz thope / ka
the man exkan ßouwims Nammims e yem.
Vnde thas ßoutce py ßöw wueſſes parradenekes
ßouwe Kunge / vnde ßatcy vs tho pirmako. Czicke
doudtcze eſſe tu mannam kungam parradan ? Thas
ßatcy / Szumpte mutcze Olie. Vnde thas ßatcy vs
to / Jem touwe gramatte / ſeedes thöw / vnde raxte
tudelyne pecedeſmette / peetcz to ßatcy thas vs to
Otre / Beth tu / Czick doudtcze eſſe tu parradan ?
Thas ßatcy ßumpte Mhere queſche. Vnd thas
ßatcy vs tho / Jem touwe Gramatte / vnde raxte
aſtonedeſmette. Vnd thas Kunx teitcze to neetayſnige
Nammethurretaye / ka tas guddrige darrys by.
Aeſto te Beerne ſchäs paſſoules gir guddrake / ne ka
the Beerne thäs gayßibes / exkan ßouwe Radde.
Vnd es ßack yums arridtczan / darreth yums drouges
/ ar to neetayſnige Mammon / kad yuus nu bhedees
czeſchat / ka the yums vs yem exkan to mußige
cziwokle.
Die Epiſtel am zehenden Sonta-Sonta
ge nach Trinitatis / 1. Corinth. 12. cap.
BEth no tims Garrigims dawanims / nhe grib
es yums mylige Brale paßleept. Juus ßinnath
/ ka yuus pagane loudis buewuſſche
eſſeth / vnd eſſeth nogayſche py tems mhemigems Elkedewems
/ kha yuusyuustad tad weeſte tappeth. Tapeetcz
buus yums ßinnath / ka neewens Jeſum no lade /
katters czour to Dewe Garre treſſe. Vnde neewens
war Jeſum wene Kunge dheweet / bes wene czour to
ſweete Garre.
Tur gir daſſchade dawane / beth tur gir wens
Gars. Vnde tur gir daſſchade Ammatte / Beth tur
gir wens Kunx / vnde tur gir daſſchada Speetczybe /
beth tur gir wens Dews / katters tur ſtrada wueſſes
lethes exkanerkan wueſſims. Exkan yckwene paradhas
ßöw te Dawane tha Garre / py thäs droudtczibes
labbummine. Tam wenam thope dodtz czour to Garre /
ta treßeeſchenne no tho Guddribe. Tam czittam
thope dodtz ta treßeeſchenne no tho adßiſchenne /
peetcz tho patte Garre / Czittam ta Titczybe / exkan
to patte Garre / Czittam Dawane wheſſelle
darryth / exkan to patte Garre. Czittam Brinumme
darryth. Czittam Szluddenaſchenne. Czittam
Garres noſkyrt. Czittam daſchada walloda. Czittam
täs Wallodes yslickt. Beth ſcho wueſſe dar
tas patz wenyx Gars. Vnde Jſdalle yckwenam to
Dawane / kha tas grib.
Euangelium am zehenden Sonta-
ge nach Trinitatis / Luc. 19. cap.
VNde khad thas tuwe klathe nätce / vs lukoye
thas to Pille / vnd roudaye pär tho / vñ ßatcy /
kad tu to ßinnate / thad buute tu py ſcho touwe laike
arridtczan apdomayſe / kas py touwe Mere wayage
buute. Beth nu gir tas prexkan touwems atczems
apßleeptcz. Aeſto tas laix pär thöw nätczys / ka touwe
Enaydeneke apkärth thöw / vnd touwe Beerne ar
thöw / wene ratte pille apkärth thöw ßittys / thöw apſeedes
/ vnd py wueſſems mallems apſpedys / vnd
thöw gluddenne darrys / vnd neewene ackmenne vs
tho otre atſthas / tapeetcz / ka tu nhe eſſe adßinnuſſe
to laike / kattran tu pemeckleeta eſſe. Vnde thas gaya
exkan to Baſnice / vnde eſaka Js czyth / kattre tur exkan
pärdoeuwe vnde pirka / vnde ßatcy vs tems.
Tur ſthawe raxtytz / Mans Nams gir wens Ludtczamme
Nams / Beth yuus eſſet tho par wene ßlepkouwe
beddre darriſche. Vnde maetcye deniſke exkan
to Baſnice. Beth te Auxtebaſnicekunge vnde Raxtmaetcetaye
/ vnde te Prawake ſtarpan tems loudems
/ gadhaye tam peetcz / ka the to nomaackte.
Vnde nhe attradde ka thems to darryth by. Aeſto
wueſſe te loudes / pekares tham / vnde czirdeye to.
Die Epiſtel am eilfften Sontage
nach Trinitatis / 1. Corinth. 15.
BEth es peminno yums / mylige Brale / tho
Euangelij / ka es yums paßluddenays eſſeme /
kattre yuus arridtczan vs yeemuſſche eſſeth /
exkan kattre yuus arridtczan ſthaweth / czour kattre
yuus arridtczan ßweete thopet / ka es to yums paßluddenays
eſſeme / Ja yuus to wen patthureiſche
eſſeth / tas buthe tad / ka yuus buutet welte titczeiſche.
