Aeſto es eſme yums ßäwiſke doeuwis / kattre es arridtczan
dabbuys eſme / ka Chriſtus nomuerris gir
par mußems Greekems / peetcz to Raxte / vnde ka
thas apracktz gir / vnde ka thas atkal auxkam czeeles
gir / tan treſſchan denan / peetcz to Raxte. Vnde ka
thas gir redtſheetcz taptz no Kephas / peetcz to no
tims duewepaddeſmettims. Peetcz to gir thas redſhetz
taptz / wairack nhe ka no peceßumptims Bralims
wenan kaartan / to paſſche whel doudcze cziwo /
beth czitte gir apgulluſſche. Peetcz to gir thas redſhetz
taptz no Jacobo. Turpeetcz no wueſſims
Apoſtelims.
Wueſſe peedige peetcz wueſſems / gir thas arridtczan
nonoman man / kha no wene neelaikyge czimptibe
redſhetz taptz. Aeſto es eſme tas maßakays ſtarpan
tems Apoſtelems / katters es nhe czenyx eſme / ka es
wens Apuſtullis Dhewe. Tapeetcz / ka es to Dewe
Droudtczibe pulgais eſſeme. Beth no Dewe Szeeleſtibe
eſme es / kas es eſme / vnde winge ßeeleſtibe py
man nhe gir whelte buewuuſe. Beth es eſſeme
doudcze wayrack ſtradays / nhe ka the wueſſe. Beth
nhe es / beth Dewe ßeeleſtibe / kattra exkan man gir.
Euangelium am eilfften Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Luc. 18. cap.
BEth tas ßatcy ßawiſke vs tems / kattre ßöw
pattems thurreyas / ka the Tayſne by / vnde
pulgay tös czittes / thade wene Lydtczibe :
Duewe Czilwheke no gaye auxam / exkan to Baſnice
vs luuckſchennes / Tas wens by wens Phariſeers
/ Tas Oters / wens Muitenex. Tas Phariſeers
ſthaweye / vnde ludtcze py ßöw pattim tha : Es
pateitcze thöw Dews / ka es nhe eſſeme / kha czitte
loudis / loupetaye / neetaiſnige / loulibes pärlouſetay /
jeb arridtczan kha ſchis Muitenex. Es gauwe
duewe kärth exkan tho Neddelle / vnde domo to
Deſmetto / no wueſſe kas man gir. Vnde thas Muitenex
ſthawey no thalenes / nedtcz gribbey ßouwes
Atczees czelth vs Debbeſſe / beth ßitte prexkan ßouwe
kruute / vnde ßatcy / Dews eſſe man Greetczenekam
ßeelix. Es ßack yums / Schis no gaya ſemmen tayſnis
exkan ßouwe Namme / prexkan winge. Aeſto /
kas ßöw pattim auxtenayas / tas thope ſemmootcz.
Vnde kas ßöw pattim ſemmoyas / tas thope paauxtenaatz.
Die Epiſtel am zwölfften Sonta-
ge nach Trinitatis / 2. Corinth. 3. cap.
BEth thada petitczibe gir mums czour Chriſtum
py Dewe / nhe ta / ka mhes ko labbe derram
no mums pattims / tur peminneet / ka no
mums pattims / Beth Ja mhes ko derram / tas gir
no Dewe / katters mums arridtczan czeniges darris
gir / to ammatte pabeickt / thäs Jounes Eſtadiſchennes
/ Nhe tho Boußle / beth to Garre. Aeſto tas
Boußlis nokow / beth tas Gars darre cziwes.
Beth ka tas Ammatz / katters czour to Boußele
nokouwe / vnd exkan tims Ackmennims eßimootz
gir / Skaydribe by / Tha / ka the Beerne Jſrael nhe
warrey vs lukooth to Wayge Moſi / thäs Skaydribes
peetcz winge wayge / kattra tur mittas / ka
nhe by tad doudtcze wayrack tham Ammattam /
katteers to Garre dode / ſkaydribe buuth ? Aeſto kha
nu tas ammatz / katters to paßuſſchenne maetcza
ſkaydribe gir / Whel doudtcze wayrack gir tham Ammattam
/ katters to Tayſnibe maetcze / pär warreene
Skaydribe.
Euangelium am zwölfften Sonta-Sonta
ge nach Trinitatis / Marci 12. cap.
VNde kad thas atkal Jsgaya / no tims Eßyms
Tyri vnde Sydon / nätce thas py to Galileiſche
Juure / wueddon ſtarpan tems Eßems
thos deſmette Pilles. Vnde the neſſe wene kurle py
to / katters tur mhems by. Vnde the luudtcze to / ka
thas to Roke vs to lickte. Vnde thas yeme to no
tims loudimes ßawiſke py malles / vnde licke tam tös
pyrſtes exkan tims Außims / vnde Js ſplawe / vnde
ayſkare winge Mhele / vnde redtczey vs tho Debbes /
no puuthes / vnde ßatcy vs tho / Hephetah / tas gir /
atwerres thöw. Vnde tudeline atwherees ßöw
winge Außes / vnde tas Szaytz winges Mheles
thappe ſwabbadtz / vnde treßey teſcham. Vnde thas
ayſledtcze tims / thems nhe by to neewenam ßatcyth.
Beth yo thas to wayraack ayſledtcze / yo the to
wayraack yſplattye / vnde Jßabrinoyas ßöw / pär to
warrene lothe / vnde ßatcy : Thas gir wueſſe notal
lab darrys. Thos Kurles / gir thas czirdames darrys
/ vnde thos beſwallodiges / treßames.
Die Epiſtel am dreyzehenden Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Gal. 3. cap.
MYlige Brale / es grib peetcz Czilwheke dabbe
treßeth. Nhe wens pulga wena Czilwheke
Eſtadiſchen (kad tha apſtippreeta gir) vnde
nhe leke tur arridtczan neeneke klathe. Nu gir yo ta
Szoliſchen Abrahe / vnde wingam Szheklam peßatcita.
Tas nhe tres / exkan tims Szheklims / kha
czour doudtcze / beth ka czourzour wene. Czour touwe
Szhekle / katters gir Chriſtus. Beth es ßacke no
tho / Ta Eſtadiſchenne / kattra no Dewe papreſche
apſtipprota gir vs Chriſtum / nhe thope jſardyta / ka
tay peßatcyſchenne by czour to Boußle mitthet /
katters tur peetcz dhotz gir par czettreßumpte / vnde
trisdeſmette gaddems. Aeſto ja ta Beerne mantibe
czour to Boußle no pelnita tapte / thad nhe thope
ta czour to peßatciſchenne dhota.
Beth Dews gir to Abraham czour to peßatciſchenne
abdawenays. Ko buus tad tam Boußlam
? Tas gir tur klathe nätczis / to Greeke peetcz /
tekams ka ta Szekla näckte / Tam kattram ta peßatciſcheenne
notickuſſe gir / Vnd gir nodhotz no tims
Engelims / czour to Roke tha Wueddetaye. Beth
wens Wueddetays nhe gir wena wenige Wueddetays
/ beth Dews gir wenyx. Ka ? Gir tad tas
Boußlis prettibe Dewe peſſatciſchenne ? Tas gir
thale. Beth kad tur wens Boußlis dhotz buuthe /
katters cziwes darryth warrhete / Thad näckte ta
Taiſnybe teſcham aran to Boußle. Beth te Raxte
gir to wueſſe apßleeguſſche appeſkan tems Greekems
/ ka ta peßatciſchenne näckte / czour to Titczibe
exkan Chriſto Jeſu / dota tems / kattre tur titz.
Euangelium am dreyzehenden
Sontage nach Trinit. Luc. 10.
VNde thas greſhes ßöw py ßouwems Maetceklems
/ vnde ßatcy ßawiſke / Sweete gir te
Atczes / kattre tur reedtcz / ko yuus redtczath /
Aeſto es ßacke yums / doudtcze Prophetes vnde Köninge
/ gribbey redtczeth / ko yuus redtczath / vnde
nhe gir redtczeiſche. Vnd czirdeet / ko yuus czirdaath /
vnde nhe gir czirdeiſche.
Vnde rouge / tad czhelees wens Raxtmaetcetays
auxam / kärdenaye to / vnde ßatcy / Meiſter / ko
buus man darryth / ka es to mußige Cziwoſchenne
dabbu / Beth tas ßatcy vs tho / Ka ſthawe exkan
Boußle raxtytz ? Ka las tu ? Thas adbildey vnde
ßatcy / Thöw buus Dewe touwe Kunge myleth / no
wueſſe Szirde / no wueſſe Dwheſelle / no wueſſe
Speeke / vnde no wueſſe Praate. Vnd touwe Tuwako
ka thöw pattim. Beth tas ßatcy vs tho / tu
eſſe teſcham adbildeys / dar to / thad tu czywos.
Beth thas gribbeye ßöw pattim tayſnotes /
vnde ßatcy vs Jeſu / kas gir tad mans Tuwakays
? Tad adbildeye Jeſus vnde ßatcy / Tur by
wens Czilwhex / tas jſgaye no Jeruſalem vs
Jericho / vnde kritte ſtarpan thems Szlepkouwems /
te jſwilke to / vnde ßitte to / vnd gaya tur noſth / vnde
atſthaye to pus nomuerruſſche gullite. Beth tas
leedtczes ßöw no nhe youſche / ka wens Baſnicekunx
to patte Ele broudtcze / vnde kad thas nätce py
to wete vnde redtczey to / gay thas zetczen. Ta lydtcz
arridtczan wens Leuitcz / kad thas nätce py to wete
vnde redtczeye to / gay tas zetczen.
Beth wens Samariters broudtcze vnde nätce
tur. Vnde kad tas to redtczeye / abßeeloy thas to /
gaye py to / ßaſſeye tham winge Waates / Vnde
lheye tur exkan Olye vnde Wyne. Vnde licke to vs
ßouwe Lope. Vnde wedde to exkan to Mayewete /
vnde glabe tho. Tan Otran denan broudtcze
thas nhoſt / vnde Jſwilcka duewe Groſſches / vnde
doeuwe thos tham Szaimenekam / vnde ßatcy vs
tho. Glabba to / vnde ja tu ko wayrack jſdhos / grib
es to thöw atmackßat / kad es atkal nackſcho. Kattere
czerre tu / kas no ſchims trims tas Tuwakays gir
buewis tham / katteers ſtarpan thems Szlepkouwems
kryttis by ? Tas ßatcy / tas / katteers ßeeleſtibe
py to darrye. Tad ßatcy Jeſus vs tho / Tad no
ey / vnde dar tha arridtczan.
Die Epiſtel am vierzehenden Son-Son /
tage nach Trinitatis / Gal. 5. cap.
BEth es ßacko / Staygath exkan Garre / thad
yuus thas Meßes karibe / nhe pepueldyſeet /
Aeſto tay Meße ekaras prettibe to Garre /
vnde tham Garram prettibe to Meße. The paſſche
gir prettibe wene otre / ka yuus nhe darreth / ko yuus
gribbet. Beth walde yums tas Gars / thad nhe
eſſeth yuus appeſkan to Boußle.
Beth the Darbe thäs Meßes gir / Sinnamme /
kha tur gir Loulibe pärkäpſchenne / Moutczybe /
neeſkyſtibe / neekounibe / Elkadewibe / Burwibe
Enaydibe / Baarſchenne / Nydeſchenne / Duſmybe /
Naraſchen / neßadderreſchen / neetickla macibe / enaydibe
/ Szlepkouwibe / Periſchenne / Ryſchenne / vnde
tha lidtcze. No kattrims es yums paprexke ßatcys
eſſeme / vnde ßacko whel paprexke / ka te / kattre to dar /
to Dewe walſtybe pär Beerne Mantibe nhe
dabbuus.
Beth tas auglis tha Garre gir / Mileſtibe /
Lyxmibe / Meribe / Paczeſchenne / mylibe / Laypnibe /
Titczibe / Lhenpratybe / Skyſtibe / prettibe thadems
nhe gir thas Boußlis. Beth kattre Chriſto peder /
te Szlape ßouwe Meße / vnd to karibe vnde egribbeſchen.
Euangelium am vierzehenden Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Luc. 17. cap.
VNd thas notickas ßöw / kad thas gaya vs Jeruſalem
/ ſthaigaye thas wueddon czour Samarien
vnde Galileam / vnd kad thas exkan
wene Jelgouwe nätce / ßaſtappe tam deſmette Spittale
Wyre / te ſthaweye no thalenes / vnd czelle ßouwes
Balxnes auxkam / vnde ßatcy / Jeſu / myleys
Meiſter / abßeelo thöw muße / Vnde khad thas thos
redtczeye / ßatcy thas vs tems / No eyet / vnde radetes
yums tims Baſnicekungims. Vnde thas noticke /
kad the nogaye / tappe the ſkyſte.
Beth wens no tims / kad thas redtczeye / ka thas
wheſſels tappis by / greſhes thas atkal apkaart vnde
teitcze Dewe / ar ſkanye balxne / vnd kritte vs ßouwe
Wayge py winge kagims / vnde patteitcze tham.
Vnde thas by wens Samariters. Beth Jeſus
adbildeye vnd ßatcy / Nhe gir tur deſmette ſkyſte tappuuſche
? Beth kurku r gir the doeuwinge ? Nhe gir tur
cytcz neewens attraſtcz / katters atkal greſthe / vnde
dote Dewam to Gode / ka wen ſchis Sweſſchenex ?
Vnde thas ßatcy vs tho / Czelles auxam / ey proyam
/ touwa titcziba gir thöw pallydtczeis.
Die Epiſtel am funffzehenden Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Gal. 6.
JA mhes exkan Garre cziwoyam / thad laideth
mums arridtczan exkan Garre ſtaigath.
Nhe laideth mums peetcz wheltige Gode neegoußigems
buuth / nedtcz apduſmotes ſtarpan
mums / nedtcz enidhetes. Mylige Brale / khad wens
Czilwhex no wenas waynes tapte pärſteycktz / thad
pallydtczet tham atkal vs to taiſne czelle / ar Lhenpratige
Garre / kattre yuus Garryge eſſeth. Vnde
lukoyes vs thöw pattim / ka tu arridtczan nhe thope
kärdenaatz. Wens pannes tha Otre Naſthe /
thad yuus to Boußle Chriſti pepueldyſeth. Beth
khad wens domate / ka thas buuthe kaſlabban / ka
tomher thas nhe neke gir / tas pewilyas ßöw pattim.
Beth yckwens luko vs ßouwe patte darbe /
vnde tad buus tham py ßöw pattim Goodtcz / vnde
nhe py wene czitte. Aeſto yckwens ßouwe Naſte
neßys.
Beth tas katters pammatcytz thope ar to wärde /
tas dalla ar tho wueſſade labbumme / tam katters
to pammaetce. Nhe alloyeth / Dews nhe leke ßöw
apmhedites. Aeſto ko tas Czilwhex ßheye / to thas
plows. Kas vs to Meße ßheye tas no to Meße to
ßammaytaſchenne plows. Beth kas vs to Garre
ßheye / tas no to Garre to mußige cziwoſchenne
plows. Beth laideth mums labbedarryth / vnde nhe
pekuuſte tapt. Aeſto ßouwan laikan mhes arridtczan
ploußem / bes mitteſchenne. Kad mums nu
layx gir / tad laideth mums labbe darryth py yckwene.
Beth wueſſe wayrack py tems titcibes
drougems.
Euangelium am funffzehenden Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Matth. 6.
NEewens war duewims Kungims kalpooth /
jeb thas wene enidees / vnde to Otre mylees /
Jeb thas wenam pekaarſes / vnde to otre pulgas.
Juus nhe warreth Dewam kalpooth vnde
tham Mammon. Tapeetcz ßacke es yums / Nhe
gadayeth par yuuſe cziwybe / ko yuus ehſeth vnde
ſczerſet / nedtcz arridtczan pär yuuſe Meße ko yuus
aptherpſeth. Nhe gir ta cziwybe wayrack neeka ta
Barribe ? Vnde ta Meße wayrack neeka ta aptherpſchenne
? Vs lukoyeth tös Putnes appeſkan tho
Debbeſſe / The nhe ßheye / the nhe plouwe / the nhe ßakraaye
exkan to Sküne / vnd yuuſe Debbeſſe Thews
baryo thös tomher. Nhe eſſeth yuus tad doudtcze
wayrack / neeka the ? Kas gir tur ſtarpan yums /
katters ßouwe garyumme / wene Oleckte pelickt war /
kad thas jow / tapeetcz bhedayas.
Vnde kapeetcz Gadayeth yuus pär to aptherpſchenne
? vs lukooyeth tös Lilies / wuerßon tho louke /
ka thäs Auge. The nhe ſtradha / the arridtczan nhe
wherpye. Es ßacko yums / ka arridtczan Salomon /
exkan wueſſe ßouwe Godibe / tha nhe gir aptherptz
buewis / ka to paſſcho wena. Ja tad Dews to Saale
wuerßon tho louke tha apterpeye / kattra ſchodene
ſthawe / vnde rytan exkan to kraaſene emheſta thope.
Nhe by tham tad yums to doudtcze wayrack darrith ?
O yuus maße titczige.
Tapeetcz nhe buhs yums Gadath / vnd ßatcyth /
ko mhes ehſem / ko mhes ſczerſem / Ar ko mhes mums
aptherpſemes. Peetcz tade wueſſe gada te pagane
loudis. Aeſto yuuſe Debbeſſe Thews ßin to / ka
yums tade wueſſe wayage gir. Gadayeth pirmaack
peetcz tho Dewe walſtibe / vnd peetcz winge Tayſnibe
/ Tad yums ſche wueſſe notal pekrittis. Tapeetcz
nhe gadayeth par to Otre Rythe / Aeſto ta
Rytha dena pär ßöuwe pattem gadhas. Tas gir
ganne / ka yckwene Dene ßouwa paſſcha bheda gir.
Die Epiſtel am ſechzehenden Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Epheſ. 3. cap.
Tapeetcz ludcze es / ka yuus nhe thopet pekuſſuſſche
/ mannes bhedaſchennes peetcz / kattres es
pär yums czeſcho / kattre yums wens Goodtcz
gir. Tapeetcz loczye es mannes czellees prexkan
tho Thewe muße Kunge / Jeſu Chriſti / katteers tas
jſtens Thews gir / pär wueſſims kattre Thews dhewe
/ exkan Debbes vnd wuerßon Semmes. Ka thas
yums ſpeeke dode peetcz tho Baggatibe ßouwe Godibe
/ ſtipprims tapt czour ßouwe Garre / py tho
eſchige Czilwheke / vnde Chriſtum cziwoth / czour
to Titczibe exkan yuuſims Szirdims / vnd czour to
mylibe eßacknote / vnde eduebbenate thopet / ka yuus
apthwert warreth ar wueſſims Sweetims / kattra
tur gir tas plattums / vnde tas garyums / vnde tas
czillyums / vnde ta Auxtibe. Arridtczan atßyt / ka
Chriſtum myle thurreet / doudcze labbake gir / ne ka
wueſſe ßinnaſchenne / ka yuus pepueldyte thopet / ar
wueſſe Dewe puelnibe.
Beth tham / katters pär warrene wairack darryth
war / neeka wueſſe / ko mhes ludtczam yeb ßapprotam
/ peetcz to Speeke / katters exkan mums ſtrada.
Tam gir Goodtcz exkan to Droudtczibe katters
exkan Chriſto Jeſu gir / py wueſſe layke / no mußige
mußam / Amen.
Euangelium am ſechzehenden Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Luc. 7. cap.
VNde tas notickas ßöw peetcz to / ka tas exkan
wene Pille / ar wärde Nain gaya / vnd winge
Maetcekle gaye doudtcze ar tho / vnd doudtcze loudes.
Beth kad thas tuwe py tems Pylle Wärtems
nätce. Rouge / tad jſneſſe the wene Muerrone / katteers
wens wenyx Dhels by ßouwe Mathe / vnde ta
by wene Attraitne. Vnde doudtcze loudis aran thas
pilles gaye ar to. Vnde kad tho thas Kunx redtczeye /
Abßeeloyas thas täs / vnde ßatcy vs to / Nhe roude.
Vnd gaye tur kläth / vnde aiſkare to muerrone ſkyrſte
vnd the Neſſetaye ſthawey kluſſe. Vnd tas ßatcy / puyſe
/ es ßacke thöw / czelles auxkam. Vnde tas Muerronis
czeelhes auxkam / vnde eßaka treßeth. Vnde
thas doeuwe to ßouwe Mathe. Vnde wena Jſſabyaſchenne
vs nätce thems wueſſems / vnde teitcze
Dewe / vnde ßatcye / Tur gir wens lels Prophetcz
ſtarpan mums vs czheles / vnde Dews gir ßouwes
loudes pemeckleis. Vnde ſcha Walloda no tho / tappe
ßinnamme / pär to wueſſe Judde Semme / vnde exkan
wueſſims apkaarth gullammims ſemmims.
Die Epiſtel am ſiebenzehenden Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Epheſ. 4. cap.
TA peminno es yums nu / es czetumman
guuſtytcz exkan tho Kunge / ka yuus ſthaygaget
ka ßöw peklayas yuuſe aitczenaſchenne
peetcz / exkan kattre yuus aitczenate eſſeet / ar wueſſe
Semmoſchenne / vnde Lhenpratybe / vnde ar paczeſchenne
: vnd panneſſet wens to Otre exkan tho myleſtibe
/ vnd eſſeth tickuſſche / thurreet to wenaydibe
exkan Garre / czour to ßaite ta mere. Wena Meßa /
vnde wens Gars / ka yuus arridtczan aitczenate
eſſeth / vs wenadige czerribe yuuſe aitcenaſchenne.
Wens Kunx / wena Titczibe / wena Chruſtibe / wens
Dews vnde Thews (muße) wueſſe / katters tur gir
pär yums wueſſims / vnde czour yums wueſſems /
vnde exkan yums wueſſims.
Euangelium am ſiebenzehenden Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Luc. 14. cap.
VNde tas notickas / ka thas nätce exkan wene
Namme wene wuerßeneke / vs wene ſweedene
to Mayſe ehſt. Vnd the gluneye vs to. Vnde
rouge / tur by wens Czilwhex prexkan tho / tas by
Vdenne ßerdtczyx. Vnde Jeſus adbildeye / vnd ßatcy
vs tems Raxtmacetayems vnde Phariſeerems / vnd
ßatcy : Peklayas tas arridtczan / vs to Sweedene
ßaczedhet ? Beth the czete kluſſeklüſſe . Vnde thas yeme /
vnde czedenaye to / vnde pallayde to. Vnd adbildeye /
vnde ßatcy vs tems / katters gir tur ſtarpan yums /
kattram winge Wherſis jeb Eſels exkan tho Acke
krythe / vnde ka tas to tudelin nhe Jſwhelke than
Sweedenan. Vnde the neewarreye tham neeneke
vs to adbildhet.
Beth thas ßatcy wene Lydtcybe vs tems / Weſims
/ kad thas nomanni / ka the ßöw wheleyas tan
auxtan wetan ſeedhet / vnde ßatcy vs tems / kad tu
no khade aytczenaatz thope / kaaſas / thad nhe ſeedes
thöw auxtan wetan / ka tur nhe wens Czenigax
nake / neeka tu / katters no to aytcenaatz gir. Vnde
khad thas tad nake / kas thöw vnde winge aytcenays
gir. vs thöw ßacke / wirſees ſchim / vnde thöw buus
tad ar koune ſemmoyan wetan ſeedhet. Beth kad tu
aytcenaatz thope / thad no ey / vnde ſeedes thöw ſemmoyan
Wetan / kad tas tur nake / katters thöw aytcenays
gir / vs thöw ßacke. Drougs / wirſees tur
auxam. Tad buus thöw Goodtcz prexan tems
kattre ar thöw py to Galde ſeede. Aeſto kas ßöw
pattim auxtenayas / tam buus ſemmotam tapt.
Vnde kas ßöw pattim ſemmoyas / tam buus auxtenatam
tapt.
Die Epiſtel am achtzehenden Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / 1. Corinth. 1.
ES patteitce mannam Dewam allaßin / yuuße
peetcz / par to Dewe ßeeleſtibe / kattra yums
dotha gir exkan Chriſto Jeſu. Ka yuus eſſeth
czour to exkan wueſſims gabbalims bagate darryte
/ py wueſſade maetcibe / vnde exkan wueſſade atſiſchenne.
Kha tad ta maetciſchenne no Chriſto exkan
yums ſpeetczige tappuſſche gir / Tha / ka yums
neewena petruckſchenne gir py neewenade Dawane
/ Vnde gaydeth wen vs to paradiſchenne muße
Kunge Jeſu Chriſti. Katters yums arridtczan
apſtipprenäs / Js to galle / ka yuus neeßodamme
eſſeth / vs to dene muße Kunge Jeſu Chriſti. Aeſto
Dews gir petitczyx / czour kattre yuus aytcenate
eſſeth py Szaddroudtczibes ßouwe Dhele Jeſu
Chriſti / muße Kunge.
Euangelium am achtzehenden Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Matth. 22. cap.
BEth kad te Phariſeer czirdeey / ka thas tems
Saduceerims to Mutte aisbaſis by / ßackrayas
the ßöw. Vnde wens ſtarpan tems /
wens Raxtemacetays / kärdenaye to / vnde ßatcy /
Meiſter / katters gir tas prawakais Boußlis exkan
tho Boußle ? Beth Jeſus ßatcy vs to / Thöw buus
Dewe touwe Kunge myleeth no wueſſe Szirde / no
wueſſe Dhweſel / no wueſſe praate. Tas gir tas
prawakays / vnde lelakays Boußlis. Beth tas
Oters gir tam lydtcz. Thöw buus touwo Tuwake
myleeth / kha thöw pattim. Exkan ſchims duewims
Boußlims / karras tas wueſſe Boußlis / vnde the
Prophetes.
Kad nu the Phariſeer kopan bye / Joutaye tims
Jeſus vnde ßatcy / ko domaath yuus no Chriſto ?
ka Dhels gir tas ? The ßatcy / Dauides / Thas
ßatcy vs tems / ka dhewe to tad Dauidz exkan Garre
wene Kunge ? Kur thas ßack / Tas Kunx gir ßatcys
vs manne Kunge / Szeedes thöw py manne labbe
Roke / Tekams ka es touwes Enaidenekes leke par
pammheßle / touwems Kayems. Kad to nu Dauidz
wene Kunge Dhewe / ka gir tas tad winge Dhels ?
Vnde neewens dryſthey tham neewene wärde adbildeth.
Vnde neewens dryſthey tham arridtczan
no thäs Denes wairs Jouthat.
Die Epiſtel am neunzehenden Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Epheſ. 4. cap.
THa no ledtczeth nu no yums / peetcz to papreſchye
Buuſchenne / to whetcze Czilwheke / katters
ßöw czour Egribbeſchenne / exkan apalloſchenne
Szammaitayas. Beth payounayet yums
exkan Garre yuuſes praates / vnde apwheldtczet to
youne Czilwheke / katters peetcz Dewe raddytz gir /
exkan Jſtenne tayſnibe vnde Sweetybe. Tapeetcz
noletczeth tös Mhelles / vnde treßet to teſchammybe /
yckwens ar ßouwe Tuwake / peetcz tho kha mhes
ſtarpan thems Loczekle eſſem / duſmoyeth vnde nhe
greekoyet. Nhe laidet to Soule pär yuuſe duſmibe
noreeſth. Nhe dodeth arridtczan neewene wete tam
Szaimotayam. Kas ſadczys gir / tas nhe ſoge wayrake
/ beth ſtrada / vnde pelnye ar tims rokims / kas
godige gir / ka thas warwardhot dhot / tam Wayatczygam.
Euangelium am neunzehenden Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Matth. 9. cap.
TAd kaapekapee thas exkan to Laywe / vnd broudtcze
atkal pär / vnde nätce exkan ßouwe Pille.
Vnde rouge / tad neße the py tho wene Mhelmenne
ßerczige / tas gulley vs wene Gulte. Kad
nu Jeſus winges Titczibes redtczey / ßatcy thas vs
to Mhelmenne ßertczige / thur wene labbe prathe /
Mans Dhels / touwe Greeke gir thöw pammeſte.
Vnde rouge / czitte ſtarpan thems Raxtmaetcetayems
/ treßey py ßöw pattems / Schis ßaimo
Dewe. Beth kad Jeſus winges domaſchennes
redtczey / ßatcy thas / kapeetcz domath yuus tick loune
exkan yuuſims Szirdims ? Katteers gir lhetake
ßatcyt / Thöw gir touwe Greeke pammeſte / Jeb ßatcyt
/ Czelles auxkam / vnde ſtayga ? Beth ka yuus
ßinnat / ka tam Czilwheke Dhelam warre gir wuerßon
Semmes / tös Greekes pammeſt / ßatcy thas vs
to Mhelmenneßertczyge / Czelles auxkam / yem
touwe Gulte / vnde ey Mayas. Vnde thas czelees
auxam / vnde gaya Mayas. Kad to te loudis redtczey
/ Jßabrinoyas the ßöw / vnde teytcze Dewam /
katters thade Speeke tims Czilwhekims doeuwis
gir.
Die Epiſtel am zwantzigſten Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Epheſ. 5. cap.
THa pelukoyeth nu / ka yuus abdomyge ſtaigayet
/ nhe ka te Neeßappratige / beth ka te ßapprattige
/ vnde ßattaiſetes yums exkan to Layke
/ aeſto tas gir louns Layx. Tapeetcz nhe thopet
neeßapprattige / kas tha Kunge praatz gir. Vnde
nhe peryetes yums puelne Wyne / aran kattre wena
loune buuſchenne nake / Beth thopet puelne Garre /
vnde treßet ſtarpan yums no Czeſmims / vnde patteitczybe
Czeſmims / vnde Garrige Czeſmims / czedeth
vnde Meßloyet tam Kungam exkan yuußims
Szirdims / vnde ßacketh patteitczybe allaßin / par
wueſſe lete / Dewam vnde tham Thewam / exkan to
wärde muße Kunge Jeſu Chriſti / vnde eſſeth ſtarpan
yums packlouſige / exkan to Dewe byaſchenne.
Euangelium am zwantzigſten Son-
tage nach Trinitatis / Matth. 22. cap.
VNde Jeſus adbildeye / vnde treßey atkal czour
Lydtczybe vs tems / vnde ßatcy / ta Debbeſſe
walſtibe gir lydtcz wenam Köningam / katters
ßouwam Dhelam kaſas darrye. Vnde ßutye
ßouwes kalpes aran / ka the tös Weßes kaſas aytcenate.
Vnde the nhe gribbey näckt. Atkal Jßutye
thas czittes kalpes / vnd ßatcy / ßacket tims Weßims /
Rouget / mans ehdenegaldtzehdenegadtz gir pattayſytz / manne
Wherſche vnde manne Baryomelope gir nokoute /
vnde wueſſa letha ßatayßyta / nätcet kaſas. Beth the
polgaye to / vnde nogaye / Tas wens vs ßouwe Tyrumme
/ tas Oters py ßouwe Darbe. Beth te czitte
guuſtye winges Kalpes / Szaimoye / vnde nokouwe
tös. Kad to tas Köninx czirdeye / tappe thas duſmyx
/ vnde Jßuutye ßouwe karye / vnde licke ſchös
Szlepkouwes nomaackt / vnde ededtczenaye winge
Pille.
Tad ßatcy thas vs ßouwems kalpems. Ta
kaſa gir teſcham ßattayßita / beth te Weßes nhe by
czenige. Tapeetcz eyeth vs tems Elems / vnde aytczenayet
kaſas / kattres yuus attrodeth. Vnde te
Kalpe Jſgaye / vs tems Elems / vnd ßakraye kopan /
kattres te attradde / lounes vnde labbes / Vnde te
Galde tappe wueſſe puelne. Tad gaya tas Köninx
exkan / tös weßes approudtczyt / vnde redtczey tur
wene Czilwheke / tas nhe by ar kaſa dreebe aptherptz.
Vnd ßatcy vs to / Droux / ka eſ tueſtu ſcheit exkan nätcis /
vnde tu nhe es ar kaſa dreebe aptherptzapthreptz ? Beth tas
tappe Mhems. Tad ßatcy tas Köninx vs ßouwims
kalpims / Szeneth tham Rokas vnde kayas /
vnde Jſmeettet to exkan to Tumpßibe / tur buus
buuth kouckſchenne / vnde Sobe triſeeſchenne. Aeſto
doudtcze gir aytczenate / beth mas gir jſredtczhete.
Die Epiſtel am 21. Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Epheſ. 6. cap.
TAlake manne Brale / eſſeth ſtippre exkan to
kunge / vnd exkan to warre / winges ſtippribes.
Apwheltzet to Dewe Brunye / ka yuus warret
prettybe ſtawhet / thay wiltyge vs tetceſchenne to loune
whelne. Aeſto mums nhe gir ar meße vnd aſſenne
ja czyxthas / beth ar kungims / vnde warrhenims / ar
wärde / ar tims kungims thas paſſoules / kattre exkan
tho tumpßibe ſchäs paſſoules walda /ar tims lounims
Garrims appeſkan to Debbes. Tapeetcz yemmet
to Dewe Brunye / ka yuus warreth prettybe
ſtawhet exkan to loune Dene / vnde wueſſes lethes
lab jſtaiſyt / vnde to vs warreſchenne patthurreet.
Tad ſthaweet nu ap yoſuſſche yuuſes Gurnes
ar taiſnibe / vnde apwilckte ar to kruute Brunye täs
tayſnibes / vnde apßabagothe py tems khagims / ar
to Euangelium tha Mere / ar kattre yuus ßattaiſyte
eſſeth. Beth par wueſſems lethems twerreth to
Brunye jeb Skyde thäs Titczibes/ ar kattre yuus
warreth Jſczheſt / wueſſe vggenige Wylytczes tha
Bhleedeneka. Vnde yemmeth to brunye czeppurre
thäs peſtyſchennes / vnde to Sobenne tha Garre /
katters gir tas Dewe wärdtcz.
Euangelium am 21. Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Johan. 4. cap.
VNde tur by wene Köninge Galwenex / tha
Dhels gulley neeweßels exkan Capernaum.
Schis czirdeye ka Jeſus nätce no Judea exkan
Galileam / vnde no gaya py tho / vnde ludtcze to /
ka thas Semmen näckte / vnde pallydtczeete winge
dhelam / aeſto thas by lydtcz to Nawe neeweſſels.
vnde Jeſus ßatcy vs to / kad yuus neeredtczeth Simes
vnde Brinummes / thad yuus nhe titczeet. Tas
Köninge Galwenex ßatcy vs tho / Kunx / Naatz ſemmen
pirms mans Bherns muerſth. Jeſus ßatcy
vs tho / Ey proiam / tows Dhels cziwo. Tas
Czilwhex titczey tham Wärdam / kattre Jeſus vs
to ßatcy / vnde nogaya.
Vnde exkan to khad thas nogaya / Szattappe
tam winge kalpe / paßluddenaye tham / vnd ßatcy /
Tows Bherns cziwo. Tad Jſwaytczaya thas no
tims to Stunde / exkan kattre tas labbaack ar to
tappis by. Vnde the ßatcy vs to / wackar apkaarth
to Septite ſtunde / pallayde to tas Drudtczis.
Tad nomannye tas Thews / ka tas apkaarth to
ſtunde by / exkan kattre Jeſus vs to ßatcys by / Tows
Dhels cziwo. Vnde tas titczeye ar ßouwe wueſſe
Namme / Ta gir nu ta otra Syme / kattre Jeſus darrye
/ kad thas aran Judea / exkan Galileam nätce.
Die Epiſtel am 22. Sontage
nach Trinitatis Philip. 1. cap.
ES patteitz mannam Dewam czekärth es
yuuſo peminno (kattre es allaßin dar / exkan
wueſſe manne luckſchenne / par yums wueſſims
/ vnde darro to luckſchenne ar lyxmibe) pär
yuuſe droudtczibe py to Euangelio / no pirmas denes
vnd Jſſcho laike. Vnde eſme exkan labe Czerribe
/ ka thas / katters exkan yums eſätczis gir to labbe
darbe / tas to arridtczan pabeidtczys / js to dene
Jeſu Chriſti / kha tas man tad peklayas / ka es vs tho
mhere no yums wueſſims thurro. Tapeetcz ka es
yums exkan manne ßirde thurro / exkan ſcho manne
czetumme / ka es to Euangelium aysbildo vnde apſtippro
/ ka yuus wueſſe ar man thäs Szeeleſtibes
pedallige eſſeth.
Aeſto Dews gir mans Ledtczenex / ka man peetcz
yums wueſſems jlgoyas / no Szirdes duebbenne exkan
Jeſu Chriſto / vnde par to ludtcze es / ka yuuſe
myleſtibe / yo wayrs vnd wayrack Baggatake thope /
exkan wueſſe atſyſchenne / vnde exkan wenadige ßaiuſſchenne
/ ka yuus ßinnath warreeth kas labbax
gir. Ka yuus tyre vnde nhe nodouſſige eſſeth / Js
tay dene Chriſti / pepueldyte ar auglims thäs Tayſnibes
/ kattra czour Jeſum Chriſtum (exkan yums)
notitczis py Gode / vnde Dewe Szlawe.
Euangelium am 22. Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Matth 18. cap.
TApeetcz gir ta Debbeſſe walſtibe lydtcz wenam
Köningam / katters ar ßouwims kalpims
lagadyth gribbeye. Vnde khad thas eßaka
lagadyth / nätce tham wens preſchan / tas by
tham deſmette tuuſtoſche Poodo parradan. Kad
thas nu nhe warreye tho mackßaat / pawheeley tas
Kunx paardoth / ßöw / vnde ßouwe Sewe / vnde ßouwes
Bhernes / vnde wueſſe nothal kas tham by / vnd
mackßate. Tad kritte thas kalps ſemmen / vnde peludtcze
to / vnde ßatcy / Kunx es ar man ar mere /
Es grib thöw wueſſe notal mackßaath. Tad ßeeloyas
tham kungã ta patte kalpe vnd pallaide to ſwabbadde
/ vñ to parrade pedoeuwe thas tham arridtczã.
Tad nogaye tas patz kalps aran / vnde attradde
wene ßouwe bedre kalpe / tas by tham Szumpte
Groſſche parradan. Vnde tas twhere to / vnde
ßnedtcze py to Rykle / vnde ßatcy / mackßa man / ko
tu man parradan eße. Tad kritte winge bedre kalps
ſemmen / vnde ludtcze to / vnde ßatcy / Es ar man ar
mere / es grib thöw wueſſe notal mackßat. Vnde
thas nhe gribbeye / Beth thas nogaya / vnde mette to
exkan to czetumme tekams ka thas mackßate / ko thas
parradan by.
Beth kad winge bedre kalpe ſchäs lethes redtczeye
/ tappe te lothe bhedige / nätce vnd paßatcye to
ßouwam kungam / wueſſe kas tur notitczis by. Tad
aytcenaye to winge Kunx preſchan ßöw / vnde ßatcy
vs to / Tu bhledyx kalps / wueſſe ſcho parrade / eſme
es thöw pedoeuwis / kad tu man ludtcze / nhe by
thöw tad arridtczan abßeeloht / par touwe bedre
kalpe / Lydtcz ka es man pär thöw abßeeloyes eſme ?
Vnde winge Kunx tappe duſmyx / vnde no doeuwe
to tims mocetagims / tekams ka thas mackßate wueſſe
ko thas tham parradan by. Tha yums mans
Debbeſſe Thews arridtczan darrys / khad yuus nhe
pammeßeth no yuußims Szirdims / Jckwens ßouwam
Bralam ßouwe wayne.
Die Epiſtel am 23. Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Philip. 3. cap.
STaygath peetcz man / mylige Brale / vnde
lukoyeth vs tems / kattre tha ſtayga / kha mhes
yums eſſem pa preſche Syme. Aeſto doudtcze
ſtayga / no kattrims es yums daſſche kärth ßatcys
eſſeme. Beth nu ßacko es yums arridtczan roudadams.
Te Enaydeneke tha Chruſte Chriſti /
kattre Gals gir ta paſſuſchenne / katre Dews tas
Wheders gir / vnde kattre Goodtcz kounan thope /
tho / kattre ſemmiſke doma. Beth mußa buſchenne
gir exkan Debbes / no kurrenes mhes arridtczan
pagaydam tha Peſtitaye Jeſu Chriſti tha Kunge.
Katters muße neczige Meße apſkaydros / ka ta
lydtcze thope ßouwe apſkaydrote Meße / peetcz to
darbe / ar kattre thas ßöw arridtczan wueße lethe
war packloußige darryt.
Euangelium am 23. Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Matth. 22. cap.
TAd nogaye te Phariſeer / vnde thurrey wenes
Runnes / ka the tho warrethe guuſtyt exkan
winge wallode. Vnde ßutye py tho ßouwes
Maetcekles / ar Herodis kalpims / vnde ßatcy /
Meiſter / mhes ßinnam ka tu tayſnis eſſe/ vnde
maetce to Dewe czellye teſcham / vnde tu nhe ola
peetcz neewene / aeſto tu nhe bheda to vs lukoſchenne
/ tho Czilwheke. Tapeetcz ßack mums ko doma
tu ? ka mhes tham Keyſeram Nome dodam jeb nhe ?
Kad nu Jeſus winge Bleedibe nomannye / ßatcy
thas / juus Wilteneke ko kärdenat yuus man / radeth
man to Nome kouſſe. Vnde the no doeuwe tham
wene Groſſche / vnde thas ßatcy vs tems / ka gir ta
Syme / vnde tas wuerße raxtcz / The ßatcyßatty vs tho /
tha Keyſere. Tad ßatcy tas vs tems. Tad dodeth
tham Keyſeram / kas tham Keyſeram pedeere / vnde
Dewam / kas Dewe peder. Kad the to czirdey /
Jßabrinoyas the ßöw / vnde atſthaye to / vnde gaya
nohſt.
Die Epiſtel am 24. Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Coloſſ.1. cap.
TApeetcz mhes arridtczan / no to Dene kad
mhes tho czirdeiſche eſſem / Nhe mitteyam
mhes kluſſe / par yums luuckt / ka yuus pepueldyte
thopet / ar atſiſchenne winge prathe / exkã wueſſe
garrige guddribe vñ ßappraſſchenne / ka yuus ſtaygayeth
czenige tham Kungam / py wueſſe papratibe.
Vnde auglige eſſeth exkan wueſſims labbims darbims
/ vnde auget exkan tho Dewe atſiſchenne / vnde
eſtippreete thopet ar wueſſade warre / peetcz winge
Godige Speeke / exkan wueſſade paceſchenne / vnd
lhenpratibe / ar Lyxmibe / vnde patteitczybe ßackãm
tham Thewam kas mums tickuſſchus darrys gir /
py to Bherne mantibe / thös ſweetes exkan gaißumme.
Katters mus peſtys gir / no thäs warres thäs
Tumpßybes / vnd gir mums pär ſtattys / exkan to
Walſtibe ßouwe myle Dhele / py kattre mums gir
ta peſtiſchenne czour winge Aſſenne / ar wärde ta
pammeſſchenne thos Greekes.
Euangelium am 24. Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Matth. 9. cap.
KAd thas tha ar tims treßeye / rouge / tad nätce
wens no thems Wuerſenekems / vnde kritte
preſchan to ſemmen / vnde ßatcy / Kunx /
Manna Meitha gir tagadine nomuerruſſe / Beth
nätce / vnde ledtcze touwe Roke vs thäs / tad taps ta
Cziwe. Jeſus czelees auxam / vnde ſtaygaye tham
peetcz / vnde winge Maetcekle.
Vnde rouge wena Sewa / kattra duewepaddeſmette
Gadde to Aſſenne ßerge czetuſſe by / gaya no
aiſmuggerre py to / vnd aiſkare winge Drebes Wyle.
Aeſto tha ßatcye py ßöw pattim / warreete es wen
winge Dreebe ayſkärth / thad tapte es weſſella.
Tad greßes ßöw Jeſus apkarth vnde vslukooye
to / vnde ßatcy. Thur wene labbe prate manna
Mheita / Touwe Titczibe gir thöw pallidtczeyſe.
Vnd ta ſewa tappe weeſſella than pattan ſtundan.
Vnde kad thas exkan tho Wuerßeneke Namme
nätce / vnde redtczeye thös Stabbelnekes / vnde to
Trooxne tho louſcho / ßatcy thas vs tems / Atſthayetes
/ Aeſto ta Meytinge nhe gir nomuerruſſe / beth
ta gir aiſmigguſſe. Vnde the apßmeye to. Beth
kad te loudes Jſczyte by / gaya thas tur exkan / vnde
thwere tho py tho Roke. Tad czelees ta Meytinge
auxam. Vnde tha Szlawe tappe ſkanniga / pär to
patte wueſſe Semme.
Die Epiſtel am 25. Sontage
nach Trinitatis / 1. Theſſal. 4. cap.
BEth mhes nhe gribbam yums mylige Brale /
paßlhept / no tims / kattre tur aiſmigguſſche
gir / ka yuus nhe noſkummuſche eſſeth / ka the
czitte / kattrims nhe wena Czerribe gir. Aeſto ka
mhes titczam / ka Jeſus nomuerris / vnde atkal auxkam
czheles gir / jten tha Dews arridtczan / kattre
tur ayſmigguſſche gir / czour Jeſum / ar tho weddys.
Aeſto / to ßackam mhes yums / kha wene wärde
tha Kunge / ka mhes / kattre mhes cziwoyam / vnde
pär pallekam / exkan tho atnäckſchenne tha Kunge /
tems nhe näckſem preſchan / kattre tur aiſmigguſſche
gir. Aeſto thas Kunx patcz ar wene ßouckumme /
vnde Balexne tha warrenne Engele / vnde ar tho
Dewe Baſſune ſcheit ſemmem nätcis no Debbes.
Vnde te Muerrone exkan Chriſto / pirmack atkal
auxam czhels. Tad peetcz / kattre mhes cziwoyam /
vnde pär pallekam / tapſem lydtcze ar tims pattims
noroute exkan to paddebbes / tham kungam prettibe
exkan to Gaiſe / vnde buuſem tha py tho Kunge
buuth allaßin. Tha elyxmoyetes yums nu ar ſchims
wärdims ſtarpan yums.
Euangelium am 25. Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Matth. 24. cap.
KAd yuus nu redtczheſet to Breſmibe thäs
yſpooſtiſchennes / no kattre tur ßatcytz gir /
czour to Prophete Daniel / ka thas ſthawe
exkan to Sweete wete. Kas to laſſe / tas abdoma
to labbe. Tad bhege wuerßon tems kalnems / kas
exkan Judde Semme gir / vnd kas wuerßon tho
jumpte gir / tas nhe kapye ſemmen / ko atneſt aran
ßouwe Namme. Vnde kas wuerßon to Louke gir /
tas nhe greshas atkal apkaarth ßouwes Dreebes
atneſth. Beth way tims abgrutenatims / vnde ßidigims
/ than laikan.
Beth ludtczet / ka yuuſa Bheckſchenne nhe noteke
Seman jeb Sweedenan / Aeſto tur buus tad wena
lela Noſkumſchenne buut / kha nhe gir buewueſſe no
Eſakumme thas Paſſoules ys ſcho laikeliake / vnde ka arridtczan
nhe buus notickt. Vnde Ja ſchäs denes
nhe tapte payſenate / thad nhe tapte neewens Czilwhex
ſweetcz. Beth thos Jſredtczeetes peetcz / taps
täs denes payſenate.
Ja tad kas vs yums ſatcys / Rougeth / ſcheit gir
Chriſtus / jeb tur / Thad nhe buus yums to titczeeth.
Aeſto tur buus wiltige Chriſti / vnd wiltige Prophetes
te vs czhelſes ßöw / vnd leles Szimes vnde Brinummes
darrys / ka arridtczan te ysredtczeete (Ja
tas ta warreth buuth) exkan to apalloſchenne eweeſte
tapte. Rougeth / es eſme yums to papreſche ßatcys.
Tapeetcz / kad te vs yums ßatcys / Rougeth /
thas gir exkan tho Tuxniſſe / Thad nhe eyet aran /
Rougeth / thas gir exkan Kammer / thad nhe titczeeth.
Aeſto lydtcz kha tas Sybbens Jſedth no
Rite puſſes / vnde ſpydejs to wackere puſſe. Tha
buus arridtczan buut / tay atnäckſchenne tha Czilwheke
Dhele. Aeſto kur wena Mayta gir / tur
ßackrayas ßöw te Ehergle.
Die Epiſtel am 26. Sontage
nach Trinitatis / 2. Pet. 3.
VNde ßinnet to wueſſe pirmake / ka exkan tims
peedigims denims nätczys Apmhedetaye / kattre
peetcz ßouwe egribbeſchenne ſtaygas / vnd
ßatcys / kur gir ta peßatcyſchenne winge at näckſchenne
? Aeſto peetcz to ka te Thewe aiſmigguſſche
gir / palleck wueſſas lethas / ta kha te no Eſakumme
tho radiſchenne buewuſſche gir. Beth nhe gribbedamme
neegribbeye the ßinnat / ka tas Debbes exkan preſche
laikims arridtczan bye / vnde arridtczan ta ſemme
/ aran Vdenne vnde czour Vdenne paſthaweiſſe /
czour Dewe Wärde / vnd tomher tappe py tho laike /
ta paſſoule czour to patte ar tho Vdenne apßlickſchenne
ßammaytata. Tha arridtczan tas Debbes /
katters tagadine gir / vnde ta Semme / thope czour
winge Wärde ßoudtczeeta / ka the py Vggunne paßargate
thope / py tho Dene thäs Szodibes / vnde
py paßuddenaſchenne thös beſdewiges Czilwhekes.
Beth wena letha nhe gir yums apßlhepta / yuus mylige
/ ka wena dena prexkan tho kunge gir / kha tuuxtoſche
gadde / vnde tuuxtoſche gadde / kha wena dena.
Tas Kunx nhepaweltczena to peßatcyſchenne / kha
to czitte par wene paweltczenaſchenne thur / Beth
thas gir lhenpratyx ar mums / vnde nhe grib / ka kaſlabban
paſſuſtcz thope. Beth kha ßöw yckwens no
greckims atſthayas.
Beth ta Dena tha Kunge nätcys / kha wens ſaglis
exkã tho nackte / exkã kattre te debbeſſe paßuddys /
ar lele Brackſteſchenne / Beth thäs Debeſſes ſtipprums
te no karſtume Jſkuſſys / vnde ta Semme /
vnde the Darbe / kattre tur exkan gir / taps Szadedtczenate.
Kad nu tam ta wueſſe buus paßuſth / ka buuſe
yums tad ßattaiſitims buut ? Ar ſweetige czywoſchenne
/ vnde Dewe ſweete buſchenne ? ka yuus gaydet
/ vnde ſteidtczates py to nakamme Dene tha kunge
? Exkan kattre te Debbeſſe ar vggunne paßuddys
/ vnde te Debbes ſtipprumme / no karſtumme
Jſkuſſys. Beth mhes pagaidam wene youne debbes /
vnde wene youne Semme / peetcz winge peßatciſchenne
/ exkan kattre Tayſnibe cziwo.
Euangelium am 26. Sontage
nach TrinitatisTeinitatis / Matth. 25. cap.
BEth kad tha Czilwheke Dhels nätcis exkan
ßouwe Godibe / vnde wueſſe Engele ar tho /
Thad thas ſeedes wuerßon tho Kreeßle ßouwe
Godibe / vnde wueſſe loudes tappis prexkan tho
ßackrate / vnde thas tös no ſkyrſe / lydtcz kha wens
Gans tös Auwes / no tims Aazims ſkyr / vnde te
Auwes taps py winge labbe Roke lickte / Beth te
Aaze py kryſe roke.
Rouge / tad thas Köninx ßatcys vs tems / py
ßouwe labbe roke / nätcet ſchur yuus ſweetite manna
Thewa / apſeedet to Walſtibe / kattre yums ßattaiſita
gir / no Eßakumme thäs paſſoules.
Aeſto es eſme yßaltczys buewis / vnde yuus
eſſeth man pe ehdenaiſche. Es eſme Jſtwytczis / buewis
/ vnde yuus eſſet man czirdenaiſche. Es eſme
wens Weſys buewis / vnde yuus eſſet man mayo
doeuwuſſche. Es eſme Nöx buewis / vnde yuus eſſeth
man aptherpuſſche. Es eſme nheweßels vnde Cetumman
buewis / vnde yuus eſſet py man nakuſſche.
Tad tham te Taiſnyge adbildhes / vnd ßatcys /
Kunx / kad eſſem mhes thöw yßalkuſſche redtczeiſſche /
vnde eſſem thöw pe ehdenaiſche ? Jeb Jſtwixtuſſche /
vnde eſſem thöw czirdenaiſche ? Kad eſſem mhes
thöw wene Weſe redtczeiſche / vnde mayaſche ? Jeb
nogo / vnde eſſem thöw aptherpuſſche ? Kad eſſem
mhes thöw nheweßalle jeb Cetumman redtczeiſche /
vnde eſſem py thöw nakuſſche ? Vnde tas Köninx
adbildhes / vnde vs tems ßatcys / Patteſe es ßacke
yums / ko yuus darriſche eſſet wenam no ſchims
mannims Maſſakims Bralims / to eſſeth yuus
man darriſche.
Tad thas arridtczan ßatcys vs tems / pa kreyſe
Roke / Eydth nhoſt no man yuus noladhete / exkan
to mußige vggunne / katters tur ßattaiſytz gir tam
Whelnam / vnde wingims Engelims. Es eſme
Jßaltczis buewis / vnde yuus nhe eſſet man pe ehdenaiſche
/ Es eſme Jſtwitczis buewis / vnde yuus nhe
eſſet man czirdenaiſche / es eſme wens weßis buewis /
vnde yuus nhe eſſet man mayaſche / Es eſme Nöx
buewis / vnde yuus nhe eſſet man aptherpuſſche / Es
eſme nheweßels vnd Cetumman buewis / vnde yuus
ne eſſet man pemeckleiſche.
Tad te arridtczan adbildees / vnde ßatcys :
Kunx / kad eſſem mhes thöw redczeiſche Jßalkuſſche /
jeb wene Weſe / jeb nogo / jeb nheweßalle / jeb Cetumman
/ vnde nhe eſſem thöw kalpuyſſche ? Thad thas
adbildees vnde ßatcys / Patteſe / es ßacke yums / ko
yuus nheneh eſſet darriſche / wenam no ſchims Maſakaims
/ to nhe eſſet yuus man arridtczan darriſche.
Vnde te eſe exkanexan to mußige mocybe. Beth te Tayſnige
exkan to mußige Cziwoſchenne.
Die Epiſtel am 27. Sontage
nach Trinitatis / 2. Pet. 1. cap.
TApeetcz nhe grib es tho atſthat / yuus allaßin
peminneet / ka yuus to ßinneth / vnde eſtipprote
eſſet / exkan to preſche eſſote tayſnibe. Aeſto
es czerre to labbe eſſamme / tick ylge kha es exkan to
Buude eſme / yums vs modenath vnde peminneet.
Aeſto es ßinno / ka man buus manne Buude driſe
nolickt / kha man to arridtczan muße Kunx Jeſus
Chriſtus ßinnamme darris gir. Beth es grib
tickuſſche darrit / ka yums wueſas mallas / peetcz
manne noſkyrſchenne / tade exkan peminſchenne patthuret.
Aeſto mhes nhe eſſem tems guddrems Paßackems
peetcz ſtaygaiſche / kad mhes yums ßinnat
lickam to Speetczibe vnde to atnäckſchenne / muße
kunge Jeſu Chriſti / beth mhes eſſem winge Godybe
paſſche redtczeiſche / kad thas dabbuye no Dewe to
Thewe / Gode vnde Szlawe / czour wene Balxne /
kattra py to noticka no to lele Godibe / vs ſcho mhere /
Schis gir mans myleis Dhels / py kattre man wens
labs praatz gir. Vnde ſcho Balxne eſſem mhes czirdeiſche
/ no Debbeſſe atneeſto / kad mhes ar tho biam /
wuerßon to Sweete kalne.
Euangelium am 27. Sontage
nach Trinitatis / Matth. 17. cap.
VNde peetcz ſcheſſems denims / yeme Jeſus py
ßöw / Petrum vnde Jacobum / vnd Johannem
winge Brale / vnde wedde thos vs to malle /
wuerßon wene auxte kalne / vnde tappe prexkan tems
apſkaydrootz. Vnd winge Wayx ſpydeye / ka ta Soule
/ vnde winge Drebes tappe Baltes / ka wena gaiſma.
Vnde Rouge / Tad paradyas tims Moſes vnde
Elias / te treßeye ar tho. Beth Petrus adbildeye / vnd
ßatcy vs Jeſu / Kunx / ſcheit gir labba buuſchenne /
grib tu / thad gribbã mhes ſcheit tris buudes darryt.
Thöw wene / Moſi wene / vnde Elia wene. Kad thas
whel tha treßeye. Rouge / tad pär ſpideye thos wena
Gaiſcha paddebbes / Vnde rouge / wena BalxnisBalnix
aran tho paddebbes ßatcy / Schis gir mans myleis
Dhels / py kattre es wene labbe praate thurro / To
buus yums klouſyt. Kad to te Maetcekle czirdeye /
kritte te wuerßon ßouwe Wayge / vnde Jſtrukaas
ßöw. Beth Jeſus gaya py tems / ayſkare thos / vnde
ßatcy / czelletes auxam / vnde nhe Jſſabyates yums.
Beth kad the ßouwes Atczes pa Czhele / nhe redtczeye
the neewene / ka Jeſum wene. Vnde kad the no
to Kalne ſemmen gaye / ayſledtcze tims Jeſus vnde
ßatcy / Jums nhe buus ſcho / ko yuus redtczeiſche
eſſet / neewenam ßatcyt / Tekams
ka tha Czilwheke Dhels no tims
Muerronims atkal auxkam
czhelees gir.
Folgenetliche Euan-
gelia vnd Epiſteln auff die fürne-
meſten Feſte im Jar.
Anno
Die Epiſtel am tage der Opfferung
Chriſti im Tempel / Malach. 3. cap.
ROuge / es grib manne Engel ßutyt kattram /
prexkan man to Czelle ßattayſit buus / vnde
tudelyn nätcis / py ßouwe Baſnicze tas kunx /
kattre yuus meckleyath / vnde tas Engels tho Eſtadiſchenne
/ kattre yuus gribbath / Rouge thas nake /
ßacke thas Kunx Zebaoth. Beth kas warres to
dene winge atnackſchenne paczeſt / vñ katters pasſtawhes
/ kad thas paradyßes ? Aeſto thas gir ka tas
Vgguns wene Sziddrabe kalleye / vnde kha ta Sepe
täs Maſgatayes / thas ſeedes vnde kuſſenaas / vnde
to Sziddrabe mheſys. Thas tös Bhernes Leui
mheſys / vnde tirys kha Sziddrabe / vnde tad the
tham Kungam barrybe vpperre neſſys / exkan taiſnibe
/ vnde tham Kungam labbe pattix / tas Barribe
vppers Juda vnd Jeruſalem / kha paprexke vnd no
ylge gaddems.
Euangelium am tage der Opfferung
Chriſti im Tempel / Luc. 2. cap.
VNd kad thäs denes thäs ſkyſtiſchennes peetcz
to Boußle Moſi nätcze / neße te to exkan Jeruſalem
/ ka te to no opperete tam Kungam / kha tad
raxtytcz ſthaw / exkan to Boußle tha Kunge. Wueßade
Wyrige / kattre tur pirmack ta mathe peczem /
buus tham Kungam ſweetam dheweth. Vnde ka
the dothe to vpperre peetcz tho / kha tur ßatcytz gir /
exkan to Boußle tha Kunge. Wene par Vbelleballoſche
/ yeb duewe youne Balloſche.
Vnde rouge / wens Cilwhex by exkan Jeruſalem
ar wärde Simeon / vnde tas patcz Czilwhex by
räms vnde Dewe byatays / vnd gaidye vs to precibe
Jſrael / vnde tas ſweetcz Gars by exkan to / tam by
wene adbildeſchenne tappuſſe No to ſweete Garre /
tham nhe bye to Nawe redtczeeth / pirmacke thas tad
to Chriſt tha Kunge redtczeete. Vnde nätcze aran
edoſchenne tho ſweete Garre / exkan to Baſnitcze.
Vnde kad te Whetczake to Bherne Jeſum exkan
to Baſnitcze neße / ka the par tho darryte / ka Eraddums
by / peetcz to Boußle / Tad yeme thas to vs
ßouwe kleepe / vnde teitcze Dewe vnde ßatcy :
Kunx / nu laide touwe kalpe exkan Mere brouckt
tha tu ßatcys eſſhe.
Aeſto mannes atczes gir touwe Peſtitaye redtczeiſche.
Kattre tu ßattayſys eſſe / prexkan wueſſems
Loudems.
Wene gaiſme par apgaiſmoſchenne tös Paggane
Loudes / vnde par Slawe touwes Loudes Jſrael.
Die Epiſtel am tage der Verkün-
digung Marie / Eſai. 7 cap.
VNde tas Kunx treßeye atkal vs Achas / vnde
ßatcy : praſſe no man wene Szime no kunge
touwe Dewe / tas gir appeſkan exkan to
Helle / jeb tur wuerßon exkan to Auxtibe. Beth
Achas ßatcy / es negrib praſſith / ka es to Kunge nhe
kärdena. Tad ßatcy tas / tad czirdeth yuus no to
Namme Dauid. Gir jums tas mas / ka yuus tös
Loudes apnewath / yums buus arridtczan manne
Dewe apkaitenäth. Tapeetcz yums tas Kunx
patcz wene Szime dhoſe / Rouge / wena Jumprouwe /
gir apgrutenata / vnde wene Dhele peczimps / to ta
Dhewes Jmmanuel / Sweſte vnde mhedde tas
ehdys / ka thas Szinne to loune nomheſt / vnde to
labume yſlaſſit.
Euangelium am tage der Verkün-
digung Marie / Luc. 1. cap.
VNde exkan to Szeſte Mheneſſe / tappe tas Engels
Gabriels ſuutytcz no Dewe / exkan wene
Pille exkan Galilea / tha dhewe Nazaret / py
wenes Jumprouwes / kattra paßolita by / wenam wyram
/ ar wärde Joſeph no to Namme Dauid / vnde ta
Jumprouwe dheweye Maria. Vnde tas Engels
nätce py täs exkan / vnde ßatcy / Summenata eſ tueſtu
Sweetiga / tas Kunx gir ar thöw / tu es ßwetita
ſtarpan tems Szewems. Beth kad ta to redtczeye /
yſtrukaas tha pär winge Wallode / vnde domaye /
kada gir ta par wene Summenaſchen ? Vnde tas
Engels ßatcy vs täs / nhe byſthes thöw Maria / tu
eſſe ßeeleſtibe py Dewe attradduſſe / Rouge / tu taps
apgrutenata exkan meße / vñ wene Dhele peczimps /
tha Wärde buus thöw Jeſus dhewet / tas buus lels /
vnd taps wens Dhels tha wueſſe auxtaka dheweetcz
vnd Dews tas Kunx dhos / tham tho Krheſele ßouwe
Thewe Dauid / vnde tas buus wens Köninx /
pär tho Namme Jacob mußige / vnde winge Köninge
walſtibe nhe buus gals.
Tad ßatcy Maria vs to Engele / ka buus tam
notickt ? Peetcz to / ka es no neewene Wyre ßinne ?
Tas Engels adbildeye vnde ßatcy vs täs / Tas
ſweetcz Gars pär thöw nätczys / vnde thas ſpeex tha
wueſſe auxtaka thöw ap ehnoos / tapeetcz arridtczan
tas ſweetcz / katters no thöw peczimptzt / taps Dewe
Dhels dheweetcz. Vñ rouge / Eliſabeth touwa meßige
drougaina / gir arridtczan apgrutenata / ar wene
Dhele exkan winge Wetczibe / vnde edth nu exkanexan
Szeſte Mheneſſe / kattra exkan tade Szlawe gir /
ka tha neeaugliga yr. Aeſto py Dewe gir wueſſes
lethes warrenne. Beth Maria ßatcy : Rouge / Es
eſme ta Kunge Kalpune / man noteke / kha tu ßatcys
es. Vnde tas Engels ſkyrees no täs.
Epiſtel am tage Johannis des
Teuffers Eſai. 40. cap.
EPretczenayet / epretczenayet manne Loudes /
treße yuuſe Dews / treßeth ar Jeruſalẽ laipnige
/ vnde maetceth tay ka winge Kunczybe wens
Gals gir/ Aeſto winge Noßedcybe gir pammheſta /
Vnde ta gir duewekärtige dabbuyſe no to Roke tha
Kunge / par ßouwims Greekims.
Tur gir wens Balxnis wene Maetcetaye exkan
to Tuxniſſe / Sattaiſeth tham Kungam to Czelle /
darreth wuerßon to Louke wene gluddanne Czelle /
mußam Dewam / wueſems Eleyems buus paauxtenatims
tapt / vnde wueſſems Kalnems / vnd maſſems
Kalnems buus noſemmotims tapt / Vnde kas
nhe gluddans gir / buus gluddannam / vnde kas neelitcze
gir / buus litczam tapt. Aeſto ta Godibe tha
Kunge buus ßinnamme tapt / vnd wuſſa meßa redtczees
ka tha Kunge Mutte treß.
Euangelium am tage Johannis
des TeuffersTeuffees / Luc. 1. cap.
VNd Eliſabethes Layx nätcze / ka thay czimpte
by /vnde tha czimme wene Dhele. Vnde
winge Kayminge vnde Meßige drouge czirdey
/ ka tas Kunx lele Szeeleſtibe / py täs darrys by /
vnde preczeyas ar tho. Vnde tas notickas ßöw tan
aſtotan denan / nätcze the abgreſth to Bherninge /
vnde dheweye to peetcz winge Thewe / Zacharias.
Beth winge Mathe adbildeye / vnde ßatcy : Neenekade
/ beth tham buus Johannes dheweet. Vnde the
ßatcy vs thäs : Tur nhe gir neewens exkan touwe
Radde / kas ta dhewe ?
Vnde the ſymenaye winge ThewamTehwam / ka thas to
gribbeete dhewet lickt ? Vnd tas praßy wene Galdinge
/ raxtye vnd ßatcy / Thas dhewe Johannes. Vnd
the brinoyas ßöw wueſſe / Vnde tudelin tappe winge
Mutte vnde Mhele attwherta / vnde tahs ßatcy /
vnd ßlaweye Dewe. Vnde wena Jsbyaſchenne
nätce pär wueſſems Kayminems. Vnde wueſſe
ſcha Notickſchenne tappe Szinnamme par to wueſſe
Judde kalne. Vnde wueſſe te kattre to czirdeye / yeme
py Szirdes / vnde treßeye / ko ſkete tu / kas grib no ſcho
Bherninge tapt ? Aeſto ta Kunge Roka by ar to.
Vnde winge Thews Zacharias tappe tha Sweete
Garre puelns / ßluddenaye vnde ßatcy / Slawetcz
gir thas Kunx / tas Dews Jſrael / aeſto thas gir pemeckleis
/ vnde peſtys ßouwes Loudes.
Vnde gir mums paczelis wene Toure thäs Peſtiſchennes
/ exkan to Namme ßouwe kalpe Dauid.
Ka thas exkan preſchelaikims treßeis gir / czour
to Mutte winges ſweetes Prophetes.
Ka thas mums peſtyte no mußims Enaydenekims
/ vnde no to Roke / wues kas mums enide.
Vnde to Szeeleſtibe parradite mußims Thewims
/ vnde peminneete py ßouwe ſweete ßadereſchenne.
Tas gir py to Szoliſchenne / kattre thas ßolis
gir / mußam Thewam Abraham / mums doth.
Ka mhes peſtyte thopam / aran to Roke mußes
Enaydenekes / vnd tham kalpoiam bes byaſchenne
mußes Cziwibes Laike.
Exkan ſweetibe vnde tayſnibe / kattra tham
paprate gir.
Vnde tu Bhernings taps wens Prophetcz tha
wues auxtakadhewetcz / tu eſe preſchan to Kunge /
ka tu winge Czelle ßattaiſe.
Vnde atſiſchenne thäs Peſtyſchennes dothe ßouwims
loudims / kattra tur gir exkan pammeſſchen
winges greekes.
Czour to Szirdeduebbenige Szeeleſtibe muße
Dewe / czour kattre mums pemeckleis gir / tas ßeelige
peſtitais no thäs Auxtybes.
Ka tas paſpidhete / tems / katre tur ßeſche exkan
to tumßibe / vnde Ehne thäs Nawes / Vnde Jſtaiſyte
mußes Kayes wuerßon to Czelle tha Mere.
Vnde thas Bherninx auga / vnde tappe ſtippris
exkanexan Garre / vnde by exkan tho Tuxniſſe / tekams /
ka tham by preſchan näckt / prexkan tems Loudems
Jſrael.
Die Epiſtel am tage der Heim-
ſuchung Marie / Rom 13. cap.
TA Mylibe nhe gir wiltiga. Nydeth to loune /
pekarretes tham labbam. Ta Bralige mileſtibe
ſtarpan wen otre gyr Szirdtzduebeniga. Wens
nake tham otram ar Godennaſchenne preſchan.
Nehe eſſeth kuutre exkan to / ko yums darryt buus.
Eſſeth karſte exkan Garre. Szattaißetes yums
exkan to Layke. Eſſeeth precige exkanerkan to Czerribe /
Paczeſdamme exkan Noſkumſchenne. Nhe atſtayetes
no Luuckſchenne. Vs yemmeetes yums thös
Sweetes Bhedaczetiges. Mayoyet labprath.
Sweetyget tös / kattre yums polga. Sweetiget vnd
nhe ladeth. Lyxmoyet yums ar tims Lyxmims /
vnde roudeth / ar tims Roudammims. Thurreth
wenadige prathe ſtarpan weneotre. Nhe gadath
peetcz auxtems Lethems / Beth thurreetes yums py
tems Semmooſkems.
Euangelium am tage der Heim-
ſuchung Marie / Luc. 1. cap.
BEth Maria czheles auxã / exkan tims denims /
vnde gaya vs to Kalne pepeeſche / vs to Pille
Juda / Vnde nätce exkan to Namme Zacharia
vnde Summenaye Eliſabeth. Vnde tas notickaas /
Khad Eliſabet to Sum̃enaſchenne Marie czirdeye
lhedtcze tas Bherns exkan winge Meße. Vnde
Eliſabeth tappe ta ſweete Garre puelne / vnde ßoutcze
ſkannige / vnde ßatcy. Sweetita eſ tueſtu ſtarpan
tems ßewems / vnde ſweetcz gir tas Auglis touwes
Meßes / Vnd no kurrenes nake man tas / ka tha Mathe
manne Kunge py man nake ? Rouge kad es to
Balxne touwes ſummenaſchennes czirdeye / lhedtcze
tas Bherns ar precibe exkan manne Meße. Vnde
O ſweeta eſ tueſtu / kattra tu titczeiſſe eſſhe / Aeſto tas
taps pepueldytcz / katters thöw ßatcytcz gir no to
Kunge.
Vnd Maria ßatcy :
MAnna Dhweſel dar lele to Kunge / Vnd mans
Gars lyxmoyas ßöw Dewe manne Peſtitaye.
Aeſto thas gir ßouwe ſemmiſke Kalpune vs
redtczeis / Rouge no ſcho laike / man ſweete teyx /
wueſſe Bherno bherne.
Aeſto thas gir lele lethe py man darrys / katters
tur warens gir / vnd tha Wärdtcz ſweetcz gir.
Vnde winge Szeeleſtibe palleck mußige / no wene
Radde lidtcze Otre / py tems / kattre to bya.
Thas darr warre ar ßouwe Elke / vnde Jſkayſe /
kattre tur greeſne gir / exkan ßouwe Szyrde prathe.
Thas ſtumye tös Warreenes no to Krheßle
vnde paauxtena tös Semmoſkes.
Tös Jßalcktees puelde thas ar paddome / vnde
atſthaye tös Baggates tuckſches.
Thas pemin thäs Szeeleſtibes / vnde pallydtcz
ßouwam Kalpam Jſrael auxkam.
Ka thas treßeis gir mußems Thewems / Abraham
/ vnde winge Szhekle mußige.
Vnd Maria pallicke py täs py trims Mheneſſims
vnd peetcz to gaya tha mayas.
Die Epiſtel an S. Michaelis
tage aus der Offenbarung
Johan. am 14. cap.
VNde tur paczheles ßöw wena czyxteeſchenne
exkan Debbes / Michael vnde winge Engele
czyxteye ar tho Sathana / vnd thas Sathanas
czyxtey vnd winge Engele / vnd neepärwarreye /
nedtcz tappe arridtczan winge weta wayrs attraſta
exkan Debbes. Vnde tas lels Sathanas / ta weetcza
Odze / katteers dhewe tas whelns / vnde Sathanas
tappe Jſmheſtcz / katters to wueſſe Paſſoule ar wiltibe
wadda / vnde tappe meeſtcz wuerßon to Semme /
vnde winge Engele tappe tur arridtczan no meeſte.
Vnde es czirdeye wene lele Balxne / tas ßatcye
exkan Debbes / Nu gir ta Peſtiſchenne / vnde tas
Speex / vnde ta Walſtibe / vnde tha Warre muße
Dewe / vnde ta Chriſtus tappuſſe / petcz to / ka tas
Jſmheſtcz gir / katters thös apßuudtczeye dene vnde
nackte prexkan DeweDewee . Vnde the gir to pärwarreyſche
czour to Jeere aſſen / vnde czour to Wärde ßouwes
Ledtczibes / vnd nhe gir ßouwe Cziwibe myleis /
js tay Nawe. Tapeetcz lyxmoyet yuus Debbeſſe /
vnde kattre tur exkan cziwoye.
Euangelium an S. Michaelis.
tage / Matth. 18. cap.
THan pattan ſtundan gaye te Maetcekle py
Jeſu vnde ßatcy : Kas gir tas Lelakays exkan
Debbeſſe walſtibe ? Jeſus aytczenaye wene
Bherne py ßöw / vnd licke to wueddon ſtarpan tems /
vnde ßatcy : Patteſe es ßacke yums / Ja yuus yums
nhe apgreſchates / vnde thopet ka te Bherne / thad
yuus exkan to debbeſſe walſtibe nhe näckſeeth. Kas
ßöw pattim paſemmoyas kha ſchis Bherns / tas gir
tas lelakais exkan Debbeſſe walſtibe. Vnde kas
tade wene Bherne vſiem exkanexan manne Wärde / tas vs
yem man. Beth kas wene no ſcho wueſſe maſſako
apgretczi kattre exkan man titcze / tam buute tas labbake
/ ka wensmens Czirne ackmens py winge rykle pakaartz
tapte / vnd apßlydtzenaatz tapte exkan Juures /
kur ta wueſſe czilyake gir.
Way tay Paſſoule thäs apgreetczibes peetcz.
Tur buus yo apgretczibe näckt / beth tomher way
tam Czilwhekam czour kattre ta Apgreetczibe näck.
Beth kad thöw touwa Roka libe touwe Kaya apgreetczyas
/ thad no czerte to / vnde mette to no
thöwim / tas gir thöw labbaack / ka tu py Cziwoſchennes
Tyſlis / lib wens Kroplis e eße / neeka thöw
duewe Rokas / lib Kayas gir / vnde thope exkan to
mußige Vggunne emheeſtcz. Vnde kad thöw touwa
Atcz apgreetczyas / thad pleeſe to aran / vnde mhet to
no thöwim / Tas gir thöw labbaack ka tu wenatczyx
py Cziwoſchennes e eße / nhe ka thöw duewe
Atczes gir / vnde tope exkan to Helles Vggunne
e meeſtcz.
Perougeth / ka yuus neewene no ſchims pulgageth.
Aeſto es ßack yums : Winge Engele exkan
Debbes / reedtcz allaßin to Wayge manne Thewe
exkan Debbes.
Aeſto ta Czilwheke Dhels gir nätczis / ſweete
darryt tös Paſſuſtes.
Euangelium von der Tauffe
Chriſti / Matth. 3. cap.
PY tho laike nätcze Jeſus aran Galilea py to
Jordan py Johanne / kha thas ßöw no to kruſtyt
lyckte. Beth Johannes ledtcze tham / vnd ßatcy
/ man gir wayage / ka es no thöw kruſtytz thope / vñ
tu nätce py man ? Jeſus adbildeye / vnd ßatcy / layde
nu to tha buut / Tha peklayas tas mums / wueſſe
taiſnybe pepueldyth. Tad pelayde thas to.
Vnd Kad Jeſus kruſtytz by / js kape thas dryſe
aran tho Vdenne. VndVd rouge / tad atwheres ßöw
tas debbes par tho. Vnd Johannes redtczeye to
Dewe Garre / lydtcz kha wene Ballode / no debbeſſe
broudtczote / vnde par to nakote. Vnd rouge /
wena Balxnis no Debbeſſe ßatcy / Schis
gir mans Myleis Dhels py kattre
man labs praatcz gir.
Soli Deo Gloria.
